name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000001
text: Bokor. You've chosen a difficult path. {nl}Refer to the instructions in your Adventure Journal and make your own doll.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000002
text: You must make a doll by yourself. {nl}Check your Adventure Journal to see how you can make the doll.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000003
text: Congratulations, a new Bokor is born. {nl}When I first chose the path of a Bokor, I started by creating a doll of my own.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000004
text: Peltasta Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000005
text: If you want to receive my teachings then you have to prove your worth first.{nl}Here's a challenge: Defeat some Vubbes on the 1st Floor of the Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000006
text: How can you bear the title of Peltasta if you can't even handle that much?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000007
text: Good. {nl}I hope your new growth leads to you saving the world.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000008
text: Highlander Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000009
text: I'm so thankful that you want to be the successor of my swordsmanship, but I suspect that you won't follow my teachings well.{nl}I will test you by having you defeat the Vubbes that are occupying the 1st floor of the Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000010
text: Hurry. {nl} Although this is your initiation challenge, the Vubbes are a threat to the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000011
text: Good work, you've completed your initiation in becoming a Highlander. {nl} Keep up the hard work and dedication.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000012
text: Pyromancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000013
text: I can see that you want to learn magic from me, but I can't teach just anyone. {nl}I will see how well you can assist my research and then decide.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000014
text: Good work. Thanks to you I can start the next step of my research. {nl}I will teach you Pyromancer magic as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000015
text: Good, you're here. I need you to defeat the evil spirits that I will summon. {nl}I will record the unique wavelength that is transmitted in the process.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000016
text: I am doing research on the 4th state of matter. {nl}It is impossible without the cooperation of the Bokor Master, who deals with spirits.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000017
text: Yes, splendid. {nl}Tell the Pyromancer Master that we have all the materials we need.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000018
text: Good. {nl}That study is being done with the Bokor Master. So go pay her a visit and she'll tell you what to do.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000019
text: Cryomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000020
text: You want to learn Cryomancer magic from me? {nl}Sure, I'll teach you, but only if you take care of something first!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000021
text: The Pyromancer Master should not be around. {nl}So it'll be an easy task.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000022
text: Don't feel guilty about it. You did a good job. {nl}I've got your back from now on, so you don't need to worry.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000023
text: It's sneaking into the Pyromancer Master's room and opening a box. {nl}As for what's inside the box...Well, you'll just have to kill it off.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000024
text: This will be enough. {nl}My magic is not easy, so you will need to work hard to keep up.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000025
text: Your will to learn from me is good, but first I have a favor to ask. {nl}We can continue our talk if you are up for it. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000026
text: Lydia Schaffen's gears are like divine materials to us archers. {nl}I would give up my entire fortune just to have them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000027
text: I never imagined that I would see this myself. {nl}Thank you. I will teach you thoroughly from now on, so you better be prepared.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000028
text: I heard the lost telescope lens from the Astral Tower is in Crystal Mine 1F. {nl}Get me that lens before the other masters find out and I'll teach you my techniques.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000029
text: So you want to learn the way of the arrow from me...Then I have a mission for you. {nl}I will base my decision on how well you accomplish the mission.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000030
text: Evoniphon...I will never forgive him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000031
text: Hunter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000032
text: You collected all the books. Good job. {nl}I will teach you the way of a Hunter as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000033
text: You got some good results. I will teach you from now on. {nl}I hope you live up to my expectations.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000034
text: I heard the bats in Crystal Mine 1F have a special type of venom. {nl}I'm sure it's the same venom used by the assassin Evoniphon. Bring me that venom.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000035
text: Barbarian Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000036
text: You can understand an opponent's abilities by facing them sword to sword. {nl}Prove to me that you are a true warrior, and I will lead you in becoming a real Barbarian.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000037
text: You indeed qualify as a warrior. {nl}I will make you become a true Barbarian.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000038
text: I understand that you want to be stronger with a spear. {nl}Complete the mission I assign to you, and I will teach you my spearmanship.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000039
text: Please bring me Groll Leather from Spineheart Dale, Chafperor Poison Darts from the Fallen Worry Forest, and Jukopus Black Powder from Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000040
text: I understand your will to become stronger. {nl}I also see that you may have what it takes to be good with spears.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000041
text: Psychokino Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000042
text: If you want to understand Psychokino, then how about you work as my assistant?{nl}I will guarantee you that it is an attractive job.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000043
text: Please, first defeat Matsums from Spineheart Dale and collect their flower alcohol.{nl}They break easily so it's hard to get the decent ones.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000044
text: Good. The flower alcohol from the Matsums is okay.{nl}You will see something interesting soon.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000045
text: Now go to Gintara Highway at Spineheart Dale.{nl}Sprinkle this liquid medicine onto the experimental Matsum doll that I installed and let me know the result.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000046
text: The Matsums attacked you? {nl}Since the Matsums accepted the Matsum dolls as their friends, I consider it successful.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000047
text: Good work. {nl}You've done a good job as my assistant, so I'll teach you what being a Psychokino truly means.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000048
text: My research is about the methods of shifting psychokinesis to the substance of matter. {nl}In other words...It's a method of brainwashing by using medicine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000049
text: Linker Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000050
text: Temperament is very important for Linkers. {nl}While it may be easy to shut out one's heart, opening it up requires a special kind of temperament. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000051
text: I will test you to see if you have such temperament.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000052
text: Good. However, you must prepare some materials before taking the test.{nl}Bring me Thornball Thorns and Fragments of Velwriggler from the Gate Route.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000053
text: Excellent! {nl}But this is just to prepare you for the test. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000054
text: I will start the test now. {nl}Behind the Gate Route is a rip in the space of the world.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000055
text: Normal people are only capable of seeing reality as is, but if you have the temperament of a Linker, {nl}you should be able to perceive a hidden world. {nl}Find the book from there and bring it to me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000056
text: Have you gone there yet? {nl}Just go to the Gate Route and check. I've marked the location on the map.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000057
text: Looks like you found the book. With this, you have passed my test. {nl} Nevertheless, please read that book to demonstrate your determination as a Linker.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000058
text: So you want me to teach you the skills of a Sapper... well then you must customarily pay a fee for my service. {nl}Not to me. But rather, I want you to give a donation to the Cleric Master in Klaipeda. {nl}Let's say, around 5000 silver?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000059
text: Wait, there's one more thing. {nl}I hid some objects at Flude Island in the Siauliai Western Woods.{nl}Before you go to Klaipeda, find the objects first and return them to their original owners in Klaipeda.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000060
text: Oh, this. I saw it somewhere...hmm...it looks familiar...{nl}Well I'll take it with gratitude since you're giving it to me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000061
text: Ah, this is the tool I lost. {nl}Thanks. Where was it?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000062
text: Did you forget about the donation? {nl}It's 5000 silver.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000063
text: Cleric Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000064
text: Thank you, in the name of the goddess.{nl}I promise the donations will be used for those injured by monsters. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000065
text: I used to be a thief, but I came to realize certain things and I stopped my criminal life. {nl}But there is a small matter left on my mind... and I want to resolve it now. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000066
text: Anyway, you did a good job. {nl}Let's cooperate from now on, teaching and learning from each other.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000067
text: I'm looking for a book. Four books by Lydia Schaffen. {nl}If you help me find the books, I will teach you my skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000068
text: The book used to be in Miners' Village, but it was lost when the Vubbes raided. {nl} Try visiting the Vubbe Outpost.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000069
text: This is the book. You will need this book if you dream to be the best Archer. {nl}I will make you a copy if you can gather the entire book collection.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000070
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master holds the next book. {nl}He was looking for Merog leather earlier. Maybe you can try making a deal with him using that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000071
text: Do you have the Merog leather yet from the Hunter Master?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000072
text: This is of good quality. The Hunter Master will be pleased. {nl}You can take the book. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000073
text: Merogs are in the Fallen Worry Forest, and the Quarrel Shooter Master is in Klaipeda. {nl}Someone might get ahead of you, so better hurry.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000074
text: The Archer Master in Klaipeda has the next book. {nl}He's not a mean person, so he will give you the book if you ask nicely. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000075
text: He is helping with the repair of the damaged city wall. {nl}I heard the rocks are delivered from the Miners' Village, so bringing some to him can be a way to ask.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000076
text: Did the Hunter Master tell you to send this? {nl}If you're looking for Lydia Schaffen's book, you could have just asked. But thanks anyway.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000077
text: The last book is with the Ranger Master in Klaipeda. {nl}Give her this pouch. {nl}I could go myself, but we're not really comfortable seeing each other.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000078
text: Don't ask why. Work is work, and it's a fact that we don't want to see each other.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000079
text: This pouch...Did you come from the Hunter Master? {nl}Here. Take this book to her.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000080
text: Although that woman acted humble to you, she's pretty scary whenever she approaches me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000081
text: This will be enough leather. {nl}Bring them to the Quarrel Shooter Master before someone else does.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000082
text: This rock will be useful in repairing the wall. {nl}Bring it to the Archer Master quickly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000083
text: Are you the one who wants to learn my skills? {nl}Great, I was just looking for someone to help me find Lydia Schaffen's book. {nl}You're going to help, right?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000084
text: There was one volume in the Miners' Village, but it was lost when the Vubbes raided. {nl} I'm pretty sure it's in the Vubbe Outpost now.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000085
text: Ho-ho yep, this is it. {nl}This will be helpful for people like you, who dream of becoming a Quarrel Shooter. {nl}I will give you a copy if you collect the entire book collection.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000086
text: Three more left. {nl}I think you can get one of them by giving some money to the Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000087
text: The problem is, I'm broke.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000088
text: You mean Lydia Schaffen's book that I have? {nl}I'll hand it over for 5000 silver.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000089
text: You heard me right, please pay the price . {nl}Around 5000 silver will do. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000090
text: 5000 silver...Yup, that's right. {nl}I'll give you the book as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000091
text: Well...the Archer Master must have the next book. {nl}He's still helping repair the wall, so wouldn't he appreciate it if you got him some rocks? {nl}I could take them to him myself, but...owwww...my back.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000092
text: The Archer Master has the next book. {nl}He's not a mean person, so he will give you the book if you ask nicely. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000093
text: I heard he is helping repair the damaged city wall. {nl}Rocks were delivered from the Miners' Village, and he'll be moved if you bring him one.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000094
text: Did the Hunter Master told you to send this? {nl}If you're here for Lydia Schaffen's book, you could have just asked. But thank you anyway.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000095
text: Now, for the last book. {nl}Give this pouch to the Ranger Master and get the book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000096
text: Did the Quarrel Shooter Master send this? {nl}Thanks. I'll hand over the book as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000097
text: Bring the book quickly. {nl}I can't hold it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000098
text: Great, it's this one! {nl}I'll teach you the skills of a Quarrel Shooter as promised. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000099
text: This rock will be useful in repairing the wall. {nl}Bring it to the Archer Master quickly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000100
text: If you want to learn more of my skills, there is a condition. {nl}I want you to help me find the four books by Lydia Schaffen.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000101
text: I heard the first book was with a resident in Miners' Village before the Vubbes attacked. {nl}So I think it could be in the Vubbe Outpost now.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000102
text: I'm surprised you found it so fast! {nl}And it's in good condition. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000103
text: I think you might be able to buy the next book from the Hunter Master...{nl}I'm broke after paying to fix the wall. Haha...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000104
text: You mean the second book by Lydia Schaffen? {nl}I'll hand it over for 5000 silver.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000105
text: I think around 5000 silver will do. {nl}I heard that's the book's value.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000106
text: Ah, you came at the right time.{nl}If you could take Merog leather to the Quarrel Shooter Master, he will make you a copy of the next volume.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000107
text: Did the Merog leather come from the Archer Master?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000108
text: You will find Merogs at the Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}Take those to the Quarrel Shooter Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000109
text: The quality is fine enough. The Archer Master will be pleased. {nl}Here, I've prepared a copy, so take it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000110
text: Now there is one book left. {nl}Give this pouch to the Ranger Master and get the book. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000111
text: Did the Archer Master send you? {nl}Well, good work. I'll give you the book as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000112
text: Isn't the book ready yet? {nl}I want to see all of Lydia Schaffen's book as soon as possible...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000113
text: Finally, it's all here. {nl}I'll teach you my skills as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000114
text: I have some books to collect. They're Lydia Schaffen's books. {nl}I'll teach you my skills if you collect the books. What do you say?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000115
text: The first book was in the Miners' Village, but it disappeared after the Vubbes attacked. {nl}I assume the book is in the Vubbe Outpost?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000116
text: Oh, that's pretty good. {nl}It will be helpful for you to read it too.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000117
text: The problem is the Hunter Master. I really don't want to see her face. {nl}So you go and get the next book from her.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000118
text: You mean the book I have? {nl}Well, okay. I'll hand it over for 5000 silver.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000119
text: I think around 5000 silver will do. {nl}Can you spare that much?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000120
text: You came at the right time.{nl}The Quarrel Shooter Master told you that if you could bring Merog leather, he will make you a copy of the next volume.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000121
text: Didn't the Ranger Master tell you anything?{nl}I asked him for Merog leather.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000122
text: Merogs are at the Fallen Worry Forest and the Quarrel Shooter Master is in Klaipeda. {nl}Someone may go there and get the book faster than you, so please hurry.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000123
text: The book is in good condition.{nl}Now, bring the book to the Archer Master. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000124
text: The Archer Master in Klaipeda has the last book. {nl}I heard he is repairing the wall, so this might help you get the book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000125
text: I heard there is a rock that will be useful for repairing the wall in the Miners' Village. {nl}Bring that to the Archer Master as a present.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000126
text: Did the Hunter Master told you to send this? {nl}If you're here for Lydia Schaffen's book, you could have just asked. But thank you anyway.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000127
text: You finally collected them all. Good work. {nl}I will teach you my skills as promised, but it's your job to keep track and follow along.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000128
text: You got some good quality leather. {nl}Bring it to the Quarrel Shooter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000129
text: Why did you bring that to me? Take it to the Archer Master quickly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000130
text: Sculptor Tesla

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000131
text: A sculptor's talent is important, but so is having an eye for seeing important materials. {nl}I will help you learn my skills if you bring me the blue crystals I'm looking for.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000132
text: That is the problem. {nl}The Yekub swallowed it as soon as it was found on the 2nd Floor of the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000133
text: Oh, this is it. {nl}I have a lot of time, so I will teach you thoroughly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000134
text: You want to learn the swordsmanship of a Highlander from me? {nl}I will consider it if you can get cooperation from the Peltastas.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000135
text: As compensation for seeking cooperation, just support 5 boards of wooden buckler type.{nl}Defeating Upents at Indigo Trees Plateau will be enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000136
text: Thank you for the supplies, but the Highlander Master wouldn't have sent you for just that. {nl}Tell me what you want. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000137
text: An overall cooperation between the Masters? Certainly. {nl}Tell him that the Peltastas will cooperate.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000138
text: If the Masters unite, it won't be long until the kingdom rises again. {nl}You did a good job. I will teach you my swordsmanship.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000139
text: That should be enough. {nl}Now go seek the cooperation with the Peltasta Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000140
text: We Peltastas promised the Highlanders we would lend our forces to rebuild the kingdom.{nl}So if you want to learn from me, you should also be responsible.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000141
text: Meet Uska and lend your force.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000142
text: So you came here at the request of the Peltasta Master.{nl}The Highlander Master once guaranteed that he would get support from the other masters. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000143
text: We, Peltastas, consider our duties as humans to be most important.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000144
text: We, Peltastas, consider our duties as humans to be most important.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000145
text: I was about to ask for aid in the search. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000146
text: I sent 4 scouts to the Spineheart Dale, but they all disappeared.{nl}Maybe they didn't think the Thorn Forest was that dangerous... Please find them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000147
text: Some issue may have emerged.{nl}Please go to the Spineheart Dale quickly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000148
text: These...were their keepsakes. {nl}We can at least give the keepsakes to their families. Thank you. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000149
text: I will tell the Highlander Master myself, so please go back. {nl}Good work.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000150
text: It might not be a pleasant feeling, but that's good enough. {nl}I will allow you to learn the way of the Peltasta as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000151
text: I need to gather the energy of fire for my research, but I just don't have time. {nl}If you gather it for me, I will help you learn the magic of Pyromancers.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000152
text: Be careful. The pot will break if you don't keep an eye on it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000153
text: Please put this pot on the ground when you go to the Descended Tree Garden.{nl}After that, when you defeat the enemies nearby, energies will be accumulated in the pot.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000154
text: There is an important book that I'm looking for. {nl}If you get me that book, I will help you learn the magic of Cryomancers.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000155
text: Did you say you'll find the book? {nl}Sorry, but you're late.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000156
text: I heard rumors that it's in the Miners' Village, but I don't know the exact location of it. {nl}Maybe the Mayor would know...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000157
text: The Vubbes took all the books when they attacked. {nl}Maybe they will use it for fire in their outpost.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000158
text: If there was something like that, we would have taken care of it. {nl}You can go and try looking for it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000159
text: You found it. Great job. {nl}You'll have to work really hard to follow my training.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000160
text: I heard the book was last seen in the Miners' Village. {nl}It's a very important book, so maybe the Mayor might know something about it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000161
text: You must have found the book. I don't know how, but congratulations. {nl}Why don't you go back to the one who's waiting for that book?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000162
text: Krivis Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000163
text: A Krivis should be free from the constraints of humans and dedicate themselves to the clergy. {nl}This is done by offering dedication prayers to all the Goddess Statues in Siauliai. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000164
text: Repent. {nl}Ask the goddess for forgiveness and be born anew.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000165
text: I can feel that you are full of the goddess' blessings. {nl}Welcome to your new life as a Krivis.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000166
text: Swordsman Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000167
text: An old saying goes, fight to the death and you will survive. {nl}I will be able to teach you if you come to realize what it means.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000168
text: You haven't realized what it means. {nl}Fight a bit more.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000169
text: Right... Now do you understand? {nl}Remember that you're a Swordsman and devote yourself to being one.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000170
text: Then fight against Mentiwood at the Seven Hues Mesa.{nl}You may learn something from doing this.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000171
text: The most important thing for a Priest is to believe in the goddess, and prove it. {nl}Exorcise the soldiers possessed with evil spirits in the name of goddess.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000172
text: The soldier is being taken care of in the Miners' Village. {nl}Your sincerity will become your strength.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000173
text: Your sincerity has been proven. {nl}We will walk together in the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000174
text: Learning magic from me comes after helping my research. {nl}Let's talk about the talent problem afterwards.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000175
text: First get me Skins of Grolls from the Spineheart Dale, Feelers of Chafperors from Fallen Worry Forest, {nl}And lastly, the nuclei from Jukopus. I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000176
text: You've gathered everything. {nl}Now let's move on to the next step.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000177
text: Klaipeda is far from the capital and was barely attacked by the monsters. {nl}I paid attention to that point, and I am studying to make a great magic circle. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000178
text: And for that, I need to accumulate data. {nl}Can you use this scroll around the city?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000179
text: I've marked on the map where you need to install it. {nl}You need to use it on every single point.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000180
text: Good work. I've gathered some useful data with your help. {nl}My research is complete so you can come to train anytime.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000181
text: You must have come to learn the faith of Clerics. {nl}I will teach you if you help by treating the injured soldiers of Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000182
text: The Cleric Master shines light on many at such a young age. {nl}Take this holy water and go to the patients quickly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000183
text: You need holy water to treat them. {nl}You should get holy water from the Priest Master and Krivis Master first.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000184
text: If it's for the Cleric Master, take as much holy water as you need. {nl}She has a beautiful heart that even this old priest would envy.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000185
text: Please send my regards to the Cleric Master. {nl}May the blessings of the goddess be with you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000186
text: Please send them my regards while you get holy water from the masters.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000187
text: Service is what you do for others, but it is also a way of cleansing your own reflection. {nl}I hope your wandering soul will be cleansed as you treat patients.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000188
text: Good job. {nl}I will teach you the faith of Clerics, as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000189
text: I think that you may not have a great spear right away, {nl}but you must have a spear that you are strongly attached to. {nl}What do you think about it?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000190
text: Spears are the pride of Hoplites. {nl}A strong spear is something that Hoplites can boast, like their name.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000191
text: That's great. {nl}Alright. You have what it takes to learn spearmanship from me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000192
text: Alright. {nl}If you want my recognition, show me a spear upgraded to level 6.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000193
text: The reality changes as you think. And only thoughts make it possible.{nl}That's called supernatural power. {nl}And the intensity of it will vary based on how much one trusts himself...{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000194
text: Ah, I only told you boring things.{nl}You want to be a Psychokino, right?{nl}If you could help me a bit, then I will help you so that you can release the strong supernatural power that is hidden inside of you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000195
text: Go to the Nardymo Twin Waterfall in the Goddess' Ancient Garden. {nl}Please bring me the Essence of Demons there.{nl}Okay... I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000196
text: Okay. This is it.{nl}By looking at its color, I can see it is full of demonic power.{nl}Haha! I will teach you the true power of a Psychokino from now on, so be ready!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000197
text: You want to learn Quarrel Shooter Skills from me? {nl}Right on time. I was also looking for someone to help me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000198
text: You were sent by the Quarrel Shooter Master, right? {nl}You must find a map. A map hidden with the Fletcher's secrets.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000199
text: The Sapper Master says he found some information about the book I'm looking for. {nl}Go to the East Siauliai Woods and meet him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000200
text: The colleague of mine who sneaked into the Mage Tower some time ago told me that he saw a strange map.{nl}I think the map is what I am looking for.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000201
text: He told me a Minotaur has it somewhere on the 3rd floor.{nl}He had troubles because of that monster, so you should prepare yourself well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000202
text: Oh, is this the map? Good job. {nl}I'll teach you my skills as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000203
text: Is this the map? I really can't tell. {nl}Take it to the Quarrel Shooter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000204
text: So you came to learn more skills from me. {nl}Then go help the Rodelero Master in Fedimian. I will evaluate you based on that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000205
text: Did the Archer Master send you?{nl}Klaipeda is becoming stable but Fedimian is still at risk.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000206
text: I hear that most of Fedimian, aside from Holy District, is buried and in need of help.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000207
text: I want you to defeat the boss monster in the Mage Tower. {nl}Monsters are pouring out of the tower {nl}and we are having troubles as it is rebuilding Fedimian.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000208
text: According to the scout who made it in, there was a Minotaur on the 3rd Floor of the Mage Tower. {nl}Defeating it will be good enough to serve as a warning.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000209
text: Well done. Thanks to you, the monsters have been warded off. {nl}Extend my gratitude to the Archer Master as well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000210
text: Well done. {nl}I will train you to be stronger as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000211
text: You want to learn the skill of a Ranger from me? {nl}Okay. If you help me, I'll consider it depending on how you do.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000212
text: Evoniphon. {nl}It seems that the Ranger Master still has some regrets.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000213
text: I saw the Elementalist Master talking to the man in a hoodie.{nl}I can't guarantee if that was him, but I can't forget that unique fragrance.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000214
text: I heard you're looking for someone who wears a hoodie and has a unique scent. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000215
text: Of course I remember. It was a man with a dangerous scent. {nl}He asked about materials that not many people know about so I thought he was strange. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000216
text: Evoniphon... I will never forget it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000217
text: After talking with the Elementalist Master briefly, he disappeared into the darkness.{nl}Please go see him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000218
text: How would I know his whereabouts. {nl}He asked about materials I did not have so I told him where he could get it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000219
text: I told him that he would be able escape from the 3rd floor of Mage Tower.{nl}That is the place where the famous Rodelero's search squad also ran away from.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000220
text: This scent... yes, it's Evoniphon's.{nl}This will be enough. I will teach you my skills as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000221
text: Yes, this is the scent. {nl}It was very unique so I couldn't forget it even if I wanted to. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000222
text: I am looking for traces of one man. His name is Evoniphon.{nl}I heard the Squire Master in Fedimian has information about him so please go see him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000223
text: Hey, if you came here to be stronger, you've come to the right place. {nl}But you can't have it for nothing. You have to do me a favor. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000224
text: It's not a big task. I want you to help one of my experiments...{nl}First defeat Drakes at the 1st Floor of the Mage Tower and collect flame catalysts.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000225
text: Drakes are actually nothing, but the problem is that the monsters nearby are more dangerous.{nl}Umm... Cheer up!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000226
text: Oh, right. You should be able to do it easily if you want to become a Sapper. {nl}Now you just have to help with the experiment.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000227
text: Well, it's pretty simple. {nl}Check how effective this bomb is on the monsters in East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000228
text: I hope it works this time...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000229
text: They fell back without much damage? {nl}Hmm, what could the problem be...I'll need to check from the beginning again. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000230
text: Anyways, Thanks. {nl}You can come back anytime if you want to learn my skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000231
text: You want to learn about the Bokors? {nl}Then first, get me a card from a powerful monster out there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000232
text: It doesn't matter which card it is as long as it's from a powerful monster. {nl}What you will bring to me is already decided.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000233
text: Complete. Traveler. Promised victory. Perfected world. {nl}Finding a full interpretation is up to you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000234
text: Sometimes the destined, harsh fate can lead to a dark future. {nl}I will lead you through the path of the Bokor as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000235
text: I'm looking for a cat that can model but I'm old and it's not easy. {nl}Bring a suitable cat and I'll teach you my skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000236
text: Grandpa Tesla wants a cat? {nl}There are plenty of cats over at Klaipeda Plaza, but {nl}it won't be easy to catch one without special food.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000237
text: I like cats because they do the basics. {nl}The cats have all lines.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000238
text: I can give you special cat food for catching a cat. {nl}If you find my father, I will give it to you for free!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000239
text: My father is a merchant who used to often come to Fedimian.{nl}He told me he would go to the Mage Tower to do some trades and never returned.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000240
text: One of Fedimian's soldiers told me that he saw a merchant's luggage on the 3rd floor of the Mage Tower.{nl}You are the only one I can ask for a favor. I am counting on you!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000241
text: This is the symbol that I engraved on my father's sleeve..{nl}This is very precious to me. Thanks.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000242
text: I'll give you the special cat food as promised. {nl}It's made with stuff that the cats like so it should work.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000243
text: Oh oh, it's that cat. {nl} As promised, let me lead you to a higher ground. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000244
text: I've traded for a long time with a Klaipeda Item Merchant, so they might help you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000245
text: I want you to do something in return for learning magic from me. {nl}It's simple but a little dangerous. Would you like to give it a try? {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000246
text: Just put this pot in the reading room that is at the 1st floor of the Mage Tower.{nl}The problem is that there are Chapparition that are standing in the reading room... I think you would be more than able to defeat them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000247
text: If you find it dangerous, please get out quickly. {nl}I'll just have to find another disciple.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000248
text: Good work. {nl}I will teach Pyromancy as promised. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000249
text: I can promise you a higher level of strength. {nl}Of course, it won't come for free.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000250
text: Please bring the Beaks of Cockatrices from the Crystal Brook, and Scales of Arma from the 3rd floor of the Mage Tower.{nl}It shouldn't be too hard for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000251
text: Well done. {nl}I'll help you become stronger.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000252
text: You've come to the right place if you want to practice stronger magic. {nl}But you can't learn from me with your weak determination.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000253
text: I can see your passion, but what about your abilities? {nl}Bring me a Phyracon Fragment and a Green Drake Scale in the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000254
text: Great job. But I still have my doubts. {nl}I'll decide depending on how well you assist my work.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000255
text: I used to do research on town defense magic and I think we can try that in Fedimian. {nl}But in order to do that I'll need a lot of data. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000256
text: Your job is to use this data recording scroll in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000257
text: I've marked on your map where you should use it. {nl}Use it at each location.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000258
text: Good work. You wanted to take magic to the next level right? {nl}I'm very strict so I hope you follow along well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000259
text: Healing the body also heals the soul. {nl}If you want to take yourself to the next level, then service others by healing them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000260
text: There are still many people who need treatment. {nl}Share your kindness with them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000261
text: The goddess helps those who help. {nl}It may not be much, but I hope I can be of assistance in taking you to the next level.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000262
text: Cataphract...{nl}I'm not sure if you have the strength to learn.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000263
text: I like your courage.{nl}Show your skills by defeating Sparnasman in the Rhombuspaving Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000264
text: Great work. You seem qualified to learn my skills. {nl}Oh, and I apologize for underestimating you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000265
text: A Cataphract is the one who stands at the front lines and fights.{nl}Destroy everything that is an obstacle to completing your task.{nl}I just remembered something appropriate.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000266
text: There are monsters that attack tourists in Sunset Flag Forest.{nl}You should eliminate such dangerous monsters as quickly as possible.{nl}If you complete the task without any problems, I will acknowledge your skill.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000267
text: Congratulations on passing the test.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000268
text: Put all of your focus on one point and pierce the enemy. {nl}Of course, you're not yet at that level so I'll approve if you just defeat it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000269
text: Sorcerer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000270
text: If you want to learn magic from me, you must show me how strong you are. {nl}It's simple, win a magic duel against me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000271
text: Don't be scared. I'll take it down to your level. {nl}I'll meet you in the vacant area of the plaza.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000272
text: Alright. You seem tough enough. {nl}You can come to me anytime you want to learn magic.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000273
text: Necromancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000274
text: Necromancer spells will devour the spell caster if their soul is not well trained. {nl}Fight me and prove how strong your soul is.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000275
text: Wait in the vacant area of the plaza.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000276
text: Well, that's good enough to start. {nl}I'll teach you the spell of Necromancers.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000277
text: Druid Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000278
text: You need to awaken your senses first if you want to become a Druid. {nl}I'll awaken your senses to flow with nature through a duel.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000279
text: There's not enough space here so I'll see you at the vacant area of the plaza.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000280
text: You have some special senses. {nl}If I can lead you well as a Druid, your future will look promising.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000281
text: Only combat makes us stronger. {nl}Prove yourself if you want to learn from me!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000282
text: Our ways are simple. {nl}If you live, you have what it takes and if not, you don't. {nl}Since you are alive, you are worth it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000283
text: If you're qualified, I'll take your mana to the next level as a Linker. {nl}It doesn't matter which magic it is. I'll test you through a duel.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000284
text: I tested you at your level and you appear qualified. {nl} As promised, I will help you sharpen your mana.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000285
text: Hunters talk only with arrows. {nl}I will tone it down to your level so if you want to learn from me, {nl}you have to overcome me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000286
text: You won this duel. {nl}I will train you as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000287
text: You must have strength if you want to learn the Highlander's sword. {nl}Show me what you have. {nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000288
text: I see that you have the bravery and strength that suits a Highlander. {nl}I will take you to the next level with the honor of becoming a Highlander.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000289
text: I heard Sparnasman at the Rhombuspaving Dale is threatening people.{nl}It will not be easy, but it will be enough to test your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000290
text: When you're holding a shield, your courage is important since you should not avoid enemy's attack, but return the attack instead.{nl}Before you learn from me, you should show me how brave you are.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000291
text: Defeat Chapparition at the 1st floor of the Mage Tower.{nl}That bleakness will be enough to test your courage.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000292
text: I understand your bravery from this. {nl}Always make yourself a proud one for your shield.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000293
text: Sincerity is the strength of a Krivis. {nl}Prove your sincerity through a duel with me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000294
text: The duel will take place in my Training Room. {nl}I will see you there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000295
text: Your sincerity is as firm as stone pillars. {nl}I'll lead you to a higher level as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000296
text: The faith of a Priest should be unshakable no matter what. {nl}I will test you to see how strong your faith is through a duel. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000297
text: The duel will take place in my Training Room. {nl}You go first.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000298
text: I see that your faith is strong from the outside but deep inside, I still see hesitation. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000299
text: Throw away the hesitation and fill it with the grace of the goddess. {nl}I will help you reach a higher level through this grace.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000300
text: A Swordsman should swing their sword with no hesitation. {nl}Hesitation is a gap in one's heart. The enemy will always be looking for that gap. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000301
text: There's a Minotaur on Mage Tower 3F. {nl}Fight it and throw away any hesitation of the sword.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000302
text: Hesitation is a dangerous weakness. {nl}I hope you are able to realize that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000303
text: Alright... You have what it takes to further develop yourself. {nl}Keep devoting yourself to training.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000304
text: Centurion Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000305
text: The path of a Centurion, is by no means an easy path to take. {nl}But it's a different story if you win a duel with me. What do you think?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000306
text: The duel will take place in the vacant area of the plaza, so be there first.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000307
text: That is enough. {nl}I will take the responsibility of teaching you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000308
text: Sadhus train by training their soul to become stronger. {nl}I will check through a duel...to see if your soul is prepared enough to take on our training.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000309
text: Let's duel at the empty lot in the square.{nl}I will adjust to your level so don't worry too much.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000310
text: I can see your will. {nl}Welcome to the Sadhu.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000311
text: Hackapell Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000312
text: It's good that you want to learn my combat skills, but first I need to check your abilities. {nl}I'll need to know your weaknesses in order to teach you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000313
text: I'll see you at the vacant area in the plaza. {nl}Be there first.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000314
text: This seems enough. {nl}Harsh training will begin now.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000315
text: Wugushi Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000316
text: Wugushis don't hesitate to use poison. {nl}Before you learn anything, I'll show you how we fight. {nl}Arrows or airguns, I'll show you with whatever it takes.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000317
text: Let's meet in the vacant area of the plaza. {nl}This place is too small, others might get hurt.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000318
text: See that? This is how Wugushis fight. {nl}You'll need to throw away your guilt of using foul methods if you want to be a Wugushi.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000319
text: If you really want to be a Rodelero, check your shield again. {nl}When I first chose the path of Rodelero, I began with getting a Level 6 Shield.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000320
text: Prepare a Level 6 Shield. {nl}I need to check your will at least.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000321
text: You have perseverance unlike the rest of the youth nowadays. {nl}Come by anytime you want to learn.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000322
text: I trust my judgment more than anybody. {nl}I will check through a duel if you have what it takes to be with the Squires.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000323
text: The sword is sharper when you believe in yourself.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000324
text: I can see your skills. {nl}I hope you will become even greater from now on with my teachings.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000325
text: Thaumaturge Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000326
text: Thaumaturge magic is one of the most difficult magic but I can lead you well. {nl}Do me a favor and I will guide you in the path of the Thaumaturge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000327
text: There are many research documents which the Magicians left at the Mage Tower when they ran away from the tower.{nl}Please bring back the research documents from the 3rd floor of the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000328
text: You completed it faster than I expected.{nl}That's good. I'll help you pull out the abilities of the Thaumaturge inside you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000329
text: Put aside the boring theories and get to the actual battle. {nl}It's a simple mission. Go back if you don't wish to fulfill it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000330
text: Please collect the body fluids of Slimes, and bone fragments from Hallowventers at the Crystal Brook,{nl}and lastly activate the nucleus of Grave Golems at Remaining Tree Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000331
text: Good work. {nl}Since you've completed your mission, let's begin the duel right away.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000332
text: Scout Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000333
text: Being a Scout doesn't mean you're only good at hiding and infiltration. {nl}You also need to have combat skills to be a true Scout. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000334
text: Prove yourself in a duel against me, then I'll teach you my secret skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000335
text: You have pretty good senses. {nl}But my training can't be done by sense alone so better keep up.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000336
text: Paladin Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000337
text: We have followed the goddess and fought for justice and belief.{nl}If you truly want to learn from the Paladins, you need to prove your faith.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000338
text: Sparnasman at Rhombuspaving Dale would be enough for your reputation. {nl}Please show us the power of the knight who serves the goddesses.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000339
text: At least you weren't bluffing. {nl}Good. You're approved to learn as a Paladin.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000340
text: So you want to learn from the Highlanders. {nl}Alright. But there is a condition.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000341
text: You're the support from the Highlander Master. {nl}It's urgent so I'll get straight to the point.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000342
text: There's a problem in the Crystal Mine and Commander Uska asked us for support. {nl}But we, the Peltastas, don't have the time right now.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000343
text: So I want you to help Commander Uska for us.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000344
text: A pledge is important. {nl}I cannot accept anything that breaks the trust in the current confusing state.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000345
text: I thought it would be difficult even when we were asking for support. {nl}But now we're relieved that you're the support.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000346
text: The Highlanders and Peltastas' honor is on the line. {nl}Please help Commander Uska.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000347
text: There are rumors that a huge monster is roaming around the Crystal Mine 2F. {nl}The mines are an important industry for Klaipeda so we can't just idly stand by. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000348
text: So please check the Crystal Mine' 2nd Floor and get rid of the source of the rumors.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000349
text: The safety of the villagers is on the line. {nl}Please search it thoroughly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000350
text: I can't believe there's still that kind of thing left...{nl}It's a relief that no one was hurt. {nl}We should consider sending the elite troops until the Crystal Mine is stable.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000351
text: Anyway, thank you for the hard work and send my thanks to the Highlander Master. {nl}I will thank the Peltasta Master when I meet her soon.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000352
text: Good work. Now the Pelatastas owe me another one.{nl}I will lead you as the Highlander Master promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000353
text: Seems like I get your help a lot. {nl}Please take care of Klaipeda in the future too.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000354
text: You want to learn from me? {nl}Alright, I'll accept you if you do me a favor.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000355
text: Did the Peltasta Master send you? {nl}If it's about the shield, I already know.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000356
text: If we don't get the supplies then we don't have to keep the pledge with the Highlanders. {nl}Also, our trust will be broken.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000357
text: I should have sent a letter of apology but I wasn't able to. {nl}There will be word from a client soon so wait for a while.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000358
text: How many times has this occurred!{nl}I am sorry, but please go meet the Fletcher Master and find out what happened.{nl}Go to the Remaining Tree Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000359
text: Fletcher Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000360
text: Did you come from Klaipeda? {nl}You can't even if you rush it. Go back.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000361
text: Did you not hear me? {nl}It will be a long time before it is your turn.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000362
text: I haven't been this mad since that tree took my workshop to the sky {nl}Four years ago on Medzio Diena.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000363
text: Did you get rid of it? That's great to hear. {nl}One less reason for the lazy Fedimian merchants.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000364
text: I will be able to send the rest of the stuff soon, as promised. {nl}You can go back now. I need to concentrate.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000365
text: I can keep a good relationship with the Highlanders with your help. {nl}I will lead you as the Peltasta Master has promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000366
text: I will send my disciple to the Highlander Master so don't worry about that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000367
text: It's emotional to see that there's someone willing to learn from a person like me. {nl}Alright, if you get my things back, I will teach you the skills of Corsair.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000368
text: That idiot of an assistant captain took everything and fled to the Great Cathedral.{nl}Monsters may have them. I hope so.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000369
text: Now that's something! {nl}I will teach you the skills of a Corsair, as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000370
text: Fight with all that you've got. I will show you how to fight with sword and shield. {nl}Remember that it depends on your abilities, whether I teach you or desert you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000371
text: Do you think otherwise even when your best is not enough?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000372
text: You have a bad habit. But it could be changed. {nl}I teach strictly so you better be prepared.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000373
text: Teaching you skills will not be a problem as long as you do me a favor. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000374
text: There's something I requested of the Fletcher Master but there's no news yet. {nl}I want you to check on it. I'm more worried about the person than the thing...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000375
text: Did the Archer Master worry? I'm fine. {nl}If there's a problem, it's that the materials can't follow my crafting speed.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000376
text: Well he's hot tempered so... Please take care of it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000377
text: I think it'll be over soon if you gather good stones from the Penitence Route of the Cathedral. {nl}Around 150 will do, I'll give you a bag for them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000378
text: I wish there was a well flowing with the materials. {nl}It's my lifelong wish.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000379
text: A Golem? That's strange. {nl}Maybe the goddess helped.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000380
text: Done. Take it. {nl}Send my regards to the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000381
text: I was just going to send you an errand. Sorry for the Golems. {nl}Anyway, I'll provide you my skills as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000382
text: I have no business with you. {nl}I'm busy. Go back.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000383
text: You came to me to learn the skill of a ranger right? {nl}I'll consider it if you do me a favor.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000384
text: I can't grasp what the Evoniphons are doing.{nl}I'm sure it's not something good but I can't even tell their objectives, it's making me mad.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000385
text: So these must be the samples. These will be good enough for our trade. {nl}Alright, I'll help you become stronger.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000386
text: You want to learn my skills? {nl}I'll think about it if you get me the tree I'm looking for.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000387
text: The monsters are carrying grubby looking trees at Pretense Intersection.{nl}When you beat on them, some of them will make clear sounds. Bring those to me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000388
text: Ah, that's right. Just throw it there somewhere. {nl}It's nothing difficult so I'll teach you, but if it disturbs my work, {nl}then I'll stop right away.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000389
text: I don't know whether you would be able to follow even if you want to learn from me.{nl}I will give you an assignment. Find the monster I request and defeat it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000390
text: Keparis from the Starving Demon's Way, Kodomors from the Scattered Stairway and Dendens from the Purple Tree Fault Forest.{nl}Of course, I will give you bait.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000391
text: Since you've done the mission well, I'll teach you about the Hunter's way. {nl}Good work.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000392
text: If you dream to reach to a higher level as a Wugushi, I have an assignment for you.{nl}At the Grand Corridor of the Great Cathedral, collect the special poison from Stoulets.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000393
text: The needle with the medicine that I mixed is in this tube.{nl}If you could hit Stoulets with this, you would be able to collect the poison.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000394
text: It's hard to stray away from the charm of poison. I'm one of them. {nl}I'll let you know how appealing it is too. Let's start slowly from today on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000395
text: It is your assignment to find the hidden monsters.{nl}The location is the Purple Tree Forest.{nl}If you wish to be a Scout, you should be able to do this. Don't you think so?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000396
text: No one can hide perfectly from the scouts.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000397
text: It was easier for you to do than I thought.{nl}Great. I think it'll be fun to teach you. {nl}Come to me anytime you want to learn from me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000398
text: I think you're good enough to be accepted as my disciple but you still need to be tested. {nl}I will welcome you if you bring the rubbings of Lydis Schaffen's gravestone in the Goddess' Ancient Garden.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000399
text: It's the gravestone of the person that all archers look up to. {nl}Do it well so that all the writings are readable.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000400
text: I used to be a Schaffenstar back in the day.{nl}Anyway, I will teach you my skills as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000401
text: Rogue Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000402
text: If you want to learn from me, you must be quick.{nl}At the grand corridor at the Great Cathedral, let's start off by surpassing 5 monsters with Smoke Bombs.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000403
text: Preternatural swiftness is the flower of the Rogues. {nl}The swift movement confuses your mind.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000404
text: I thought it would be difficult but you're great at it. {nl}I will teach you the skills slowly so you better warm up first.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000405
text: You need to show your bravery if you want to learn from me. {nl}Use this note to provoke the monsters at Penitence Route. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000406
text: Are you brave enough to turn the enemy's blade to you when your allies are in danger?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000407
text: I can picture them full of anger. {nl}You've passed the test. You're good enough to learn from me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000408
text: You want to learn from me? Then there's something you should do for me. {nl}Teach the Hackapell Master who believes that there's something in the world that can't be penetrated.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000409
text: The spear is unbeatable and invincible. {nl}I want to see the face of poor Shadowgaler when it's defeated.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000410
text: If that fellow asks, I'll proudly tell him that our skilled Hoplite took it down. {nl}I will acknowledge you with this.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000411
text: You want to learn from me? {nl}Then you have to pass a test. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000412
text: I heard the other Masters are sending their disciples to defeat Yekub in the Cathedral. {nl}But that is what you must bring an end to. Go now.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000413
text: If you have the ability to learn from me, then Yekub will be easy enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000414
text: I want to see their faces when they fight a Yekub that doesn't even exist. {nl}Alright, you're good enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000415
text: You came here to learn the Formations of a Centurion?{nl}Then first I gotta find out if you're competent enough to command other people.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000416
text: You can meet Colimencia when you go to the Layered Rock Forest.{nl}You must be competent enough to defeat it in order to become a Centurion.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000417
text: You're welcome to become a Centurion. {nl}You'll learn step by step about the Centurion formation from now on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000418
text: Squires are strong but helping our partners is where we shine. {nl}Using the rope to make connecting attacks with fellow allies {nl}is an attack that is notably stronger than any other attacks.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000419
text: This is an Arrest rope.{nl}Take this to the Sanctuary of the Great Cathedral and practice as much as you can so you are able to control it well.{nl}Let's talk about learning from me after that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000420
text: In order for connecting attacks to succeed, nobody can make any mistakes. {nl}That is why you need to practice hard.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000421
text: How comfortable are you with it? {nl}I will teach you thoroughly as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000422
text: I heard the monster called Biteregina keeps threatening people at the Sunset Flag Forest.{nl}If you could defeat it, I will teach you my skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000423
text: Since I am a Master, I should also help other people, but I just don't have enough time.{nl}Anyway, as I promised to you, I will teach you my skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000424
text: Going through these dangers can be a good experience.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000425
text: The Peltastas requested help. {nl}We have limited troops but we also can't reject the Peltastas as we have a pledge with them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000426
text: I want you to assist the Peltastas and carry out the mission.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000427
text: We, the Peltastas, receive shield supplies as a condition for keeping our pledge with the Highlanders. {nl}The shields have always been delivered on time but recently the supplies have been cut. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000428
text: Ask the Highlanders what the problem is and if you can, please solve it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000429
text: If you say so, there is a way.{nl}If you could defeat the Moas at Crystal Brook that destroyed my ingredients, I will shift your turn ahead.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000430
text: I'm following the traces of Evoniphons.{nl}Recent information says that they tested something in the Cathedral.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000431
text: Go to the Cathedral right away and get a sample of Moya's fluid. {nl}We'll should know something after examining it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000432
text: I'll give you this flare since you're a novice. {nl}It'll help you find the monsters efficiently.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000433
text: Poison is a two-sided blade, so you should be careful with it. {nl}Especially if you get a finger cut while using poison..

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000434
text: I assume you've come to learn something from me because you have the ability. {nl}To win a duel against me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000435
text: Go to the vacant area above the stairs and wait. {nl}I'll be there after finishing this up.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000436
text: You're faster than you look. {nl}I will teach you my skills from now on, so come anytime.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000437
text: I heard the Minotaur showed up. {nl}If you want to learn from me, you should be able to hunt them down effortlessly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000438
text: If you didn't go, I would have gone myself. {nl}I'm giving the task to you, so you better be thankful for it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000439
text: Great. You have my recognition. {nl}Come by anytime if you want to learn the skills of the Hunters.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000440
text: With your abilities, the Reaverpede in Lonesome Market should be easy to defeat. {nl}If you can't do that, I can't take you on as a Ranger apprentice.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000441
text: I'm relieved you're here. {nl}Everyone is focused there but only us Rangers are not dispatched.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000442
text: I heard you were a step faster than the Hunters. {nl}Good work. I'm a very strict teacher so you better be prepared.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000443
text: Teaching you the skills of the Scouts isn't difficult. {nl}But you need to have the capability to follow it, don't you think?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000444
text: Alright then. {nl}Deadborn appeared at Ruklys Road but the troops there need help. {nl}This should be fairly good hunting material.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000445
text: Good job. You did better than I expected. {nl}Come by anytime if you want to learn something.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000446
text: So you want to learn Sapper skills from me? That's a good idea. {nl}I'm currently lacking materials for a new trap.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000447
text: So you will need to help me with it. {nl}You'll need to defeat the Rocktortuga at Ruklys Memorial and bring me Natural Mano Stones.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000448
text: Rocktortugas at the Ruklys Memorial. {nl}The Rocktortugas in other areas don't give Mano Stones.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000449
text: Alright. Got the Mano Stones..{nl}Come by anytime if you want to learn Sapper skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000450
text: You said you want to learn my skills?{nl}If you could bring me some burnable stones from Yonazolems' central district, I'll think about it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000451
text: In other words, it's impossible.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000452
text: You have unreasonably great skills. {nl}I'd welcome a disciple like you. I shall teach you my skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000453
text: We enhance our immunity by experiencing lots of poisons.{nl}If you could survive from the poison of Rajatoad at the central district, then I will teach you how to control poisons as well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000454
text: Would it make sense if Wugushi is poisoned and weak?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000455
text: Our teachings are harsh so I hope you understand. {nl}Anyway, you can come anytime if you want to learn.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000456
text: I'm so ashamed of my disciples ruining all the commissions. {nl}If you do a good job, I will teach you the Quarrel Shooter skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000457
text: It's the Templeshooter in Downtown. {nl} Even my disciples ran away when it was right in front of them, so prepare yourself for it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000458
text: You defeated it. Now I feel better. {nl}Come for lessons anytime. I'll teach you wholeheartedly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000459
text: Schwarzer Reiter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000460
text: If you want to be a Schwarzer Reiter, then answer this question.{nl}If you want to survive intense battles, what will you need?{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000461
text: Allies? Support? Supply? No, a sword and a gun would be enough for me.{nl}They are the only things that I can trust.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000462
text: And one more thing. Hatred for your enemies!{nl}If you wish to advance to Schwarzer Reiter, you should remember that hatred.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000463
text: Because you won't be able to advance until you beat me.{nl}Come to me when you are prepared.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000464
text: It seems that your luck has run out. {nl}Let's get started.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000465
text: I feel like I am seeing my younger self in you. {nl}Now since you have become a Schwarzer Reiter, we are now mirrors to each other.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000466
text: I need to test if you are qualified to learn my skills. {nl}Defeating Sparnashorn seems fair enough for someone like you, what do you think?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000467
text: I heard Sparnashorn is huge, so it spends most of its time on the ground rather than in the air.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000468
text: I didn't expect you to defeat it. That's pretty good. {nl}Alright. You can come anytime you want to learn skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000469
text: I heard Minotaur have shown up at the Lonesome Marketplace.{nl}Please bring me the proof of your victory.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000470
text: I don't know why, but from some point in time, lots of monsters started appearing from the petrified city.{nl}I heard other masters are having trouble because of that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000471
text: You want to reach a higher stage in life through the calling of Clerics. {nl}I will help you achieve it through service.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000472
text: There are many people waiting for treatment, but there are not enough medicinal herbs. {nl}Please get Nicotia herbs from the Centurion Master in Pilgrim's Way.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000473
text: It will be a long journey. {nl}May the blessings of goddess always be with you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000474
text: Ah, the Cleric Master sent you. {nl}Nice to meet you. I'm the Centurion Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000475
text: Unfortunately, we're out of the Nicotia that the Cleric Master is asking for. {nl}There was an urgent request so it had to be used.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000476
text: But don't worry. {nl}Nicotias grow all over the place so it'll be fine if you just take the young shoots.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000477
text: Nicotia is not far away from here. {nl}Send my regards to the Cleric Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000478
text: Thank you. This will help many people in pain. {nl}The goddess will also be glad that you reached a higher level of Cleric.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000479
text: If you want to step up as a Krivis, then go and worship the goddess Statue in Fedimian. {nl}A pilgrimage is a sure way to fulfill duties to the goddess.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000480
text: Take the offering before you leave. {nl}The Priest Master and Cleric Master will give you the offering needed for worship.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000481
text: You're leaving for the pilgrimage. {nl}I can still remember pilgrimage when I was a young clergy.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000482
text: You can feel your heart filling with faith when you look at the Goddess Statue in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000483
text: I can give you the offerings.{nl}But before that, I have a favor to ask you. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000484
text: Residents are complaining about the Rocktortuga running wild in Siauliai Western Woods. {nl}I will give you the offerings if you defeat that monster.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000485
text: The goddess will also be happy for your mercy.{nl}Here, take the offerings. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000486
text: The goddess will also be happy for your mercy.{nl}I also want to visit Fedimian again if I could.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000487
text: You're going on a pilgrimage to Fedimian.{nl}Here, take the offerings.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000488
text: The Goddess Statue is at the center of Fedimian. {nl}It's huge and wide so be careful not to get lost.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000489
text: There's an interesting legend about the Goddess Statue in Fedimian. {nl}If you have the opportunity, it'll be good to see it too.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000490
text: I can feel that you are full of the goddess' blessings. {nl}Good work. Those blessings will lead you to a higher place.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000491
text: Are you coming from Fedimian? {nl}the Krivis Master is waiting for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000492
text: Will you take on the vocation of Priest and follow the path of goddess? {nl}You can do so by getting rid of evil.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000493
text: Evil forces are showing up in the Starving Demon's Way in Fedimian. {nl}Extract its identity from it and smudge it with the name of goddess.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000494
text: Anyone who follows the words of the goddess can receive her powers to drive out evil spirits. {nl} But that strength will depend on the depth of one's faith.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000495
text: Well done. {nl}In the name of the goddess, please judge the evil in this world so they are unable to get a foothold.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000496
text: If you want to research about the way of Bokor, you should do something for me.{nl}Please get the jewel from the Krivis Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000497
text: The Bokor Master sent you?{nl}So they have decided to dispose of that jewel.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000498
text: It will be very dangerous.{nl}You should prepare yourself.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000499
text: Take it. It is the jewel that is cursed by a vicious being.{nl}Several priests are trying to handle it, but they are having hard time.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000500
text: Since we are also curious about that, please come back sometime later.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000501
text: I have a bad feeling.{nl}I hope nothing bad occurs...{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000502
text: You've brought it.{nl}But...damn.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000503
text: The curse in this jewel is calling Tutu here.{nl}While I figure out how to handle this curse, there is something that you should do.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000504
text: First, tell the Krivis Master to prepare the memorial service.{nl}After that, please go to the East Siauliai Woods and block Tutu.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000505
text: Something could happen when the power of the curse gets stronger.{nl}Our mission is to stop that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000506
text: Yes. In fact, that jewel is the one that a young priest from the village picked up.{nl}After he brought this jewel, he suffered from nightmares so I made a request to the Bokor Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000507
text: Okay anyways. I will prepare the memorial service.{nl}Don't worry about it and just block Tutu from the East Siauliai Woods before it comes to Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000508
text: These things happen because the world is in chaos.{nl}The goddess must feel sad about it...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000509
text: I cleverly dealt with it because of your help.{nl}As a Bokor, I can expect you to grow from now on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000510
text: You defeated that Tutu. Well done.{nl}As a result, I can prepare the memorial service without any problem.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000511
text: Return to the Bokor Master fast and tell her about it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000512
text: It's good that you are learning skills from me, but I want you to also understand the importance of caring after that.{nl}The priests in Klaipeda requested care for Goddess Statue, how about that?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000513
text: I want you to get the perfumed oil used for maintaining the statue first.{nl}If you ask the priests, they will give it to you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000514
text: This is the perfumed oil.{nl}Since Tesla is too old, I was worried that my request may be too much, but I guess it's alright now.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000515
text: This is all I have..{nl}I heard the Krivis Master also has some.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000516
text: Perfumed Oil? Ah, here it is.{nl}Please take care of the statue.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000517
text: Please tell Tesla that I am okay.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000518
text: Meet the Priest Master too.{nl}The amount of perfumed oil you have may not be enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000519
text: That's the task we entrusted to you, so if you need it we will give to you. {nl}Here you go.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000520
text: Even if you receive perfumed oil from the Priest Master, it may not be enough.{nl}You should take great care with it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000521
text: The amount of perfumed oil you have seems a bit lacking.{nl}Since the Bokor Master also has some oil, why don't you go meet him?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000522
text: Perfumed Oil? we will definitely give it to you.{nl}Tesla told us that he doesn't need any pay for that, so we felt sorry about it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000523
text: Too bad I can't go with you since I don't have enough time.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000524
text: The statues that we entrusted to you are the statue in Fedimian and the statue in Klaipeda.{nl}Okay then, I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000525
text: If you use the absolute power of the goddess, your journey to Fedimian should be a little easier.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000526
text: Well done.{nl}Return to Tesla.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000527
text: It is also a task of a Dievdirbys to take care of the work, not just the creation of the work.{nl}Don't forget about this feeling if you want to learn the skills of a Dievdirbys.{nl}{nl}Oh, you came back already. {nl}Well done. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000528
