text: It is also a task of a Dievdirbys to take care of the work, not just the creation of the work.{nl}Don't forget about this feeling if you want to learn the skills of a Dievdirbys.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000529
text: The number of monsters increased a lot at Starving Demon's Way, and they are threatening the villagers there.{nl}If you want to step forward as a true Sadhu, then share your abilities.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000530
text: Doing penance is not just for yourself, but to also be kind to others.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000531
text: As you become kinder to others, you will reach a higher stage.{nl}As the Sadhu Master, I will lead the way for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000532
text: First of all, a Paladin shows by acting rather than telling.{nl}Prove your religious belief of the goddess by dueling against me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000533
text: First of all, the religious belief is the power to us Paladins.{nl}You possess great religious belief.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000534
text: You passed the test.{nl}You should be prepared for me to train your spirit harder from now on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000535
text: Monk Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000536
text: Your religious belief is affirmed when you have a well trained body.{nl}I will test you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000537
text: Good. Your religious belief is very strong.{nl}I will accept you as a monk. You should be prepared since our training is very hard.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000538
text: Pardoner Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000539
text: Ordinarily, the best way to get accepted as a Pardoner is to contribute a lot of money.{nl}But, I think completing an assignment would be better for you.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000540
text: Please bring me the fire pot.{nl}I heard a rumor that the merchants in Fedimian saw it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000541
text: Wow! Welcome.{nl}Do you need anything?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000542
text: Fire pot? I saw it at Crystal Brook. {nl}The Pardoner Master was looking for it as well. I guess he couldn't find it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000543
text: Oh, the Pardoner Master. {nl}There's a lot he doesn't know...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000544
text: Oh. Yes! This is it.{nl}I will accept you as a Pardoner.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000545
text: Please return to the Pardoner Master.{nl}He was looking for the fire pot for a long time.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000546
text: Fire Pot? Of course I know of it.{nl}But you know I am a merchant. If you could get me the hardened oil from the monsters at Starving Demon's Way...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000547
text: If you don't need it, then I am okay with it.{nl}Since I am busy, I will just do my work.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000548
text: Oh, Thank you.{nl}A monster called Mostem keeps his hands on the fire pot at all times.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000549
text: Ask the equipment merchant over there, he said he saw it recently.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000550
text: A Wizard is a magician who focus on the basics of all magic.{nl}If you seek a stronger magic, you should go back to the basics.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000551
text: Please defeat the violent Golem at the West Siauliai Woods.{nl}I will decide whether I will continue to teach you based on your results.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000552
text: Haha.{nl}I remember when you were a probationary wizard.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000553
text: Yes. Well done.{nl}Let's start from the basics. I will help you to the best of my abilities.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000554
text: The Poata are threatening the villagers at the East Siauliai Woods.{nl}If you could defeat those monsters in the name of the Goddess Gabija, I will teach you my magic.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000555
text: One can say that he is stronger upon sharing knowledge with others after learning something.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000556
text: Well done. The Goddess, Gabija, must be very satisfied.{nl}As promised, I will take you to the next stage of Pyromancer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000557
text: You dream to reach a higher stage with the power of chilly air.{nl}Mushcaria at the West Siauliai Woods will be a good assignment for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000558
text: It's not good to see a weak human chasing after strength.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000559
text: You did well without any faults.{nl}As promised, I will train you further.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000560
text: A Psychokino shows his power by believing in his own abilities.{nl}You gotta show how much you trust yourself to receive my lessons.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000561
text: The Red Vubbe Warriors in this forest are hard to fight against.{nl}But, if you trust yourself, you will be able to defeat them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000562
text: How are you going to use this super natural power if you don't trust yourself?{nl}Don't you think so?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000563
text: Your abilities are way better than I expected.{nl}But, if you learn from me, you can reach a higher stage.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000564
text: Before you learn magic from me, I want to see how you control mana.{nl}Defeat the Vubbe Warrior at the West Siauliai Woods using any magic you want.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000565
text: As you know more about a Linker, it is very interesting.{nl}Don't you think so? Reading the string of mana...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000566
text: You possess great abilities indeed.{nl}As a Linker, if I can lead you well, you will become a really powerful magician.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000567
text: Before you learn the magic of a Thaumaturge, I need to test your magical skills.{nl}Defeat the Burning Salamanders at the Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000568
text: It is important to measure your skill.{nl}It will be more important if you don't pass the test.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000569
text: This is nice.{nl}I will help with my best efforts for your future development.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000570
text: Instead of bragging about yourself in words, it's much better to show others that you are competent.{nl}I will give you a test. Defeat slimy Reaverpede at the Remaining Tree Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000571
text: The Reaverpede at the Remaining Tree Dale would be a good fit for your reputation.{nl}I've heard about you enough, but I should check with my own eyes.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000572
text: Very nice.{nl}You have obtained the right to become stronger with this.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000573
text: You had better give up if your will is not strong enough.{nl}If that's not the case, defeat the Devilglove that is around here.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000574
text: Evil spirits are just tools.{nl}I will not do anything that would turn my back on the goddess.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000575
text: You really use every possible means.{nl}Well, we are the same about that. I will permit you to learn magic from me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000576
text: I have prepared something nice down there for someone who would become my disciple.{nl}From there, pick up some corpse fragments.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000577
text: Being a Necromancer is really nice.{nl}But, using humans as ingredients is absolutely forbidden.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000578
text: Very nice indeed.{nl}You have no problem understanding my spells.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000579
text: Chronomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000580
text: If you want to learn my magic, I should first understand your skills.{nl}Defeating Reaverpede at the Remaining Tree Dale should be enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000581
text: No matter how strong a magic is, it can not stop time from flowing.{nl}But, it could be possible if it were Agailla Flurry's work...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000582
text: You did way better than I expected.{nl}I will acknowledge your skills. Please follow my teachings closely from now on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000583
text: I don't know if those Masters really think about the safety of the goddess and the kingdom.{nl}Ironbaum is approaching Klaipeda, but no one is worried about it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000584
text: That attitude is what I wanted.{nl}I will teach you the true magic if you defeat Ironbaum at the West Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000585
text: Especially the attitude of the Cryomancer Master really...pisses me off.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000586
text: I remember when you first arrived in Klaipeda.{nl}If you want, you can start the training right away.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000587
text: Ironbaum is running around the East Siauliai Woods rignt now.{nl}But, the Chronomancer Master is not doing anything about it.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000588
text: I know it is little ridiculous to ask a favor to a person whom has come to learn my magic, but I have no other choice.{nl}I want you to defeat Ironbaum to teach him a lesson.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000589
text: Klaipeda may fall into danger, but he only cares about his safety. That's pathetic.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000590
text: Well done.{nl}The Cryomancer Master woudn't stand and watch now since the Pyromancer trainee also stepped forward.{nl}Until then, let's talk about fire magic in detail.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000591
text: The other masters are all blaming me.{nl}They told me that I am not doing anything even when those monsters are threatening Klaipeda.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000592
text: Do I have to face against those weak monsters?{nl}If you can take care of them, I will teach you the magic of the Choronomancer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000593
text: It's called Ironbaum and it is located at the West Siauliai Woods.{nl}Even if I am not interested in it, I can't help listening since I am not deaf.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000594
text: I wonder what the Pyromancer Master would think when looking at the defeated Ironbaum.{nl}I will teach you the magic of Chronomancer as I promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000595
text: I have a request that I don't want to lose to the Linker Master.{nl}If you could take care of that request on behalf of me, I will teach you how to control your energy. How about it?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000596
text: It is not that hard.{nl}You just have to defeat the Werewolf that is walking around this mine village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000597
text: I had troubles with that a few times in the past.{nl}But if I have a disciple like you, I won't lose to the Linker Master anymore.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000598
text: That's nice!{nl}Leave the Linker Master and let's talk about energy in details.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000599
text: If you want to learn about my magic, there is something that you should do for me.{nl}Defeat the Werewolf that appeared in the Miners' Village quicker than the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000600
text: The Werewolf is not easy, but you will be able to defeat it.{nl}You applied to become a Linker right?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000601
text: Well done. I wonder what the Psychokino Master will feel after looking at the defeated Werewolf.{nl}I will teach you my magic as I promised to you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000602
text: Monsters are causing chaos near Fedimian.{nl}As a result, the masters are working together to defeat them.{nl}How about it, if you are an applicant to become a Thaumaturge, I think you should also help.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000603
text: Oh, that's very brave of you! {nl}Defeat the Netherbovine at Faultline, and then I will advance you when you return.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000604
text: Good. You are qualified as a Thaumaturge.{nl}As I promised, I will advance you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000605
text: All the masters in Fedimian are chasing after the monsters that are causing chaos.{nl}You should defeat those monsters before anybody to learn my magic.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000606
text: The monster is called Netherbovine. {nl}According to a reliable source, it appeared at Faultline recently.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000607
text: I can still picture the faces of the other masters.{nl}Not only that, I am also happy to get a good disciple.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000608
text: It doesn't make sense to stay in a safe place as a master when there are hordes of monsters.{nl}I thought that wasn't right so I ran from Fedimian.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000609
text: I heard that Necroventer appeared again at the old garden of the goddess.{nl}If you dream to be a sorcerer, I hope you follow my request.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000610
text: It is silly to stay in a safe place as a master.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000611
text: I understand your point.{nl}I will teach you magic as I had promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000612
text: I can teach you my magic whenever you want.{nl}But, I am not sure if you can follow my lead well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000613
text: If that's the case, please defeat Necroventer that appeared at the old garden of the goddess.{nl}I can teach you my magic when you can do that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000614
text: You are better than I expected.{nl}But, the magic to control time is really difficult so you should be prepared.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000615
text: Long time no see. You want to be an Alchemist.{nl}I should test if you are worthy enough to be an Alchemist.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000616
text: Good.{nl}Please defeat the Werewolf that is making a mess around here.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000617
text: It is not hard to learn the knowledge of an Alchemmist.{nl}You can learn the basics, such as decomposition of an element and synthesis, slowly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000618
text: Good. I am looking forward to your future.{nl}I will advance you to Alchemist.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000619
text: You should prove your determination to remove evil in order to follow the training of a priest.{nl}Please get pouches imbued with Magi from the Vubbes at the 1st Floor of the Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000620
text: Please talk to the elder of the Crystal Mine if you have a hard time entering the Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000621
text: I will purify these pockets so that they won't release demonic power anymore.{nl}Brother, I welcome you to be a priest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000622
text: Brother. You came far to learn the religious belief of a Krivis, but I don't have the time to greet you at the moment.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000623
text: One of our brothers who was bringing back a sacred relic has disappeared.{nl}I've been praying for the mercy of the goddess. Can you find our brother?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000624
text: Krivis Brother

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000625
text: Don't come near!{nl}The monsters that are after the sacred relic are coming!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000626
text: I was so afraid that I would not be able to bring the sacred relic to Klaipeda.{nl}Brother, you must be a messenger that the goddess sent.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000627
text: The last call stopped at the Crystal Mine.{nl}The brother should be safe...I am so worried.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000628
text: I have a lot more to do.{nl}Don't worry, please pass this sacred relic to the Krivis Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000629
text: How can I say that this object is more important than a person.{nl}This is all due to the blessing of the goddess that our brother is safe.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000630
text: Anyway, we welcome you to be a member of the Krivis.{nl}The goddess must be happy to see you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000631
text: You should prove that you are suited to use a sword if you want to reach a higher level of swordsmanship.{nl}Please obtain the heart of Stone Orca at the 1st Floor of the Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000632
text: There is nothing more important than life.{nl}If you want to use a sword, you should be determined.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000633
text: Okay that's it...you collected it well.{nl}I will teach you how to become a person suited to use swords.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000634
text: Magic can't make a distinguished person, as I don't like a lazy person.{nl}Defeat Shredded at the 1st Floor of the Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000635
text: If you don't train yourself well, I won't accept you as a Wizard.{nl}Learn something a hundred times and train a thousand times to become a real Wizard.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000636
text: I understand your determination.{nl}I will teach you well so that you can become a person well suited for wizardry.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000637
text: You want to learn my skills?{nl}It's not hard to teach, but would you be able to master my lesson?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000638
text: If you cannot bring arrows, you better give up now.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000639
text: Okay, you have passed.{nl}I will teach you to become a talented archer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000640
text: Clerics help others to reach a higher stage.{nl}To cure other people, please get me the green ointment from the Vubbes at the 1st Floor of the Crystal Mine.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000641
text: The goddess told me to help you.{nl}By helping others near you, you will help your spirit as well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000642
text: I think I can relieve the pains of many patients with this.{nl}As a Cleric Master, I will help you contribute more to the goddess.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000643
text: Defeat the bats at the 1st Floor of the Crystal Mine and bring me their wings as proof.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000644
text: If you can give us the blessing of the cure, you will become even closer to the goddess.{nl}By helping others, I will help you reach a higher stage of Cleric.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000645
text: Lots of people come here after receiving injuries from monsters.{nl}But since I ran out of herbs, we have no choice but to only give first aid to the patients.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000646
text: Thanks.{nl}As a Cleric Master, I will help you accomplish a higher mission.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000647
text: The number of people who are hurt due to monster attacks keep increasing, but we don't have enough herbs.{nl}Please bring wild flower alcohol from the Lonesome Marketplace for them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000648
text: {nl}Maybe I can help you, but you must know what real battle feels like before you receive lessons from me.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000649
text: You can find the Honeypin at Deep Indigo Forest.{nl}They will be a good challenge for you at the moment.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000650
text: You should train hard and experience real battle, but do not forget the word careful.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000651
text: Good. I can see that you are much better now.{nl}If you want to learn, please come often.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000652
text: Your heroic stories are good lessons for us Peltastas.{nl}But, I should check you myself before accepting you as my disciple.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000653
text: Stories are always exaggerated.{nl}So forgive me for acting so picky.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000654
text: It was not an exaggeration.{nl}Since your skill has been proven, I will accept you into learning the lessons of a Peltasta.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000655
text: The only thing you can trust in real battles is your experience.{nl}If you want to learn the swordsmanship of a Highlander, it will be good to accumulate more experience.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000656
text: There is a monster called Honeypin at Deep Indigo Forest.{nl}Facing that monster will be a good experience for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000657
text: Well done.{nl}You will become a good swordsman if you gain more experience and learn from me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000658
text: To be called a Hoplite, You should act in such a way that everyone can trust and rely on you.{nl}Your skills are already famous here, but I want to check them with my own eyes.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000659
text: There's a monster called Colimencia at the Layered Rock Forest. {nl}It is a threatening monster, but you should defeat it easily.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000660
text: I thought this would take you more time, you are better than I thought.{nl}I am counting on you as a colleague.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000661
text: It is strange that a skillful person like you would learn from me.{nl}But, there is a cost to any learning.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000662
text: I heard the Poata at the Layered Rock Forest attack people.{nl}It would be more than enough if you could defeat them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000663
text: So I guess it was dealt with easily.{nl}Good. You are qualified.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000664
text: If you want to learn from me, you must first show me your skills.{nl}I think defeating Colimencia at the Layered Rock Forest would be more than enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000665
text: You should become strong to become an example for others. Don't you think so?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000666
text: Good. You skills are enough.{nl}I am happy to teach you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000667
text: If you want to be a Cataphract, you should be able to defeat Gaigalas at the Flowerless Forest.{nl}Come back after defeating it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000668
text: There has been nothing that could obstruct my path since I decided to become a Catapract. {nl}Just peirce through anything that would block us. Don't you think so?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000669
text: You are more than I expected.{nl}Good. Let's continue our good relationship.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000670
text: I am sorry, but I am too busy to accept you at the moment.{nl}I heard someone saw our family's symbol, which was lost on Medzio Diena, so I am looking for it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000671
text: I am the only one left in the Legwyn family, so each symbol is important to me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000672
text: This... is the symbol of the Legwyn family.{nl}Thank you. As I promised you, I will help you reach a higher level.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000673
text: If you want to learn from me, it is courtesy to show your own skills first. {nl}Defeating the Honeypin at Deep Indigo Forest would be enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000674
text: For me, the life of a pirate is fighting, stealing, fighting again, and stealing again.{nl}My fellows, drink up!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000675
text: Very reliable.{nl}Good. I will teach you my skills from now on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000676
text: If you want to learn something from me, defeat Gaigalas at the Flowerless Forest.{nl}If you want to be acknowledged in terms of both your determination and skills.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000677
text: This is a very dangerous request that other masters feel uncomfortable with.{nl}If you want more, you should accept more dangerous requests.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000678
text: I will recognize your skills as promised. {nl}Follow me. I will open the way of the Doppelsoeldner for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000679
text: I will check your skills by seeing whether or not you are able to defeat Gaigalas at the Flowerless Forest. {nl}I wish you the best of luck.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000680
text: ... I guess there's no other way. I think I will be able to test you with this.{nl}I heard there's a person who saw Poata swallowing the crest in the Layered Rock Forest.{nl}Okay then, I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000681
text: I lost an important sacred relic of the Krivis.{nl}If you want to reach a higher stage of Krivis, I will help you find the sacred relic again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000682
text: There is a strong power within the sacred relic so lots of monsters are pursuing it for themselves.{nl}Losing a sacred relic is like losing your faith.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000683
text: Well done. Fortunately, the sacred relic is okay.{nl}I will teach you the training of a Krivis as I promised you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000684
text: I hear that a vicious aura has been coming from Ruklys Street lately.{nl}If you want to walk the way of a Priest, you should exorcise it in the name of the goddess.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000685
text: The vicious aura is really evil.{nl}But I am sure you will be able to exorcise the energy at Ruklys Street.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000686
text: This is an important sacred relic that was being transferred to Klaipeda.{nl}I heard that they were attacked while they were walking on the main street of the Petrified City.{nl}I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000687
text: I am sorry, but the way of Bokor can't be explored by just anyone.{nl}If you could bring me the essence of the petrified whale that appears at Lonesome Marketplace, I will acknowledge your skill.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000688
text: The petrified whale at Lonesome Marketplace has taken many lives.{nl}I need the essence that has the resentment from them in it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000689
text: Well done.{nl}I will teach you everything about Bokor as promised.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000690
text: If I could obtain solid wood from the main street of Petrified City, I would be able to accept any request...{nl}For example, the lesson of Dievdirbys.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000691
text: That is my lifelong wish.{nl}That tree always gestures towards me to make itself into a masterpiece.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000692
text: Oh. That's it.{nl}You can come to me anytime you want to learn the lessons of a Dievdirbys!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000693
text: There is a rumor that many people who have crossed Ruklys Street are suffering from nightmares.{nl}If you want to walk the way of Sadhu, you shall help them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000694
text: When you eliminate the source, the nightmares will be gone.{nl}Please go to Ruklys Street and eliminate the source.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000695
text: You have done a good job.{nl}I'm looking forward to your growth as a Sadhu.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000696
text: I heard enough about you, that you have a firm religious belief.{nl}But I want to check it with my own eyes.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000697
text: Forgive me. I am being picky since this task is in the name of Paladin.{nl}I think defeating Rajapearl at the Lonesome Marketplace would be enough to prove yourself, given your reputation.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000698
text: Prove your religious belief.{nl}There's nothing to be worried about. The goddess will protect you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000699
text: You have done well.{nl}With this, your religious belief is proven, so I will accept you to learn my lessons.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000700
text: A Monk's training is very strict.{nl}If you still want to receive training, go to the central district and defeat Repus, and bring its toe nails.{nl}If you can do that, I will acknowledge you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000701
text: Our training is very harsh. {nl}You should at least defeat Repus at the central district to follow our training.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000702
text: Good. I will accept your determination.{nl}I always tell you, but our Monk training is really harsh.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000703
text: Insteand of an entrance test for Pardoner, there's something you should do for me. {nl}Please find the lost money of indulgence at Ruklys street. You can do it right?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000704
text: I heard he lost it at Ruklys street so go there and find it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000705
text: At the moment when I didn't know what to do, the goddess sent you.{nl}Anyways, I congratulate you in becoming a Pardoner.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000706
text: Oracle Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000707
text: Even when the goddess is absent, an Oracle should pass along the oracle competently.{nl}I will test whether you are qualified to do it by dueling against you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000708
text: I checked your competence well enough.{nl}As an Oracle Master, I will help you interpret the oracle well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000709
text: Are you ready?{nl}I will see you under the stairs.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000710
text: Mirtis

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000711
text: Object Text

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000712
text: Seven Valley Diary

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000713
text: Woods of Attached Bridge

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000714
text: Petrified City

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000715
text: Paladin Follower

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000716
text: The Mine Supervisor

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000717
text: Request Center

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000718
text: The regional information

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000719
text: The stone plate with the revelation

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000720
text: Books

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000721
text: Family

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000722
text: {S35} {nl} The Fletcher Master and Lydia Schaffen {/}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000723
text: Even if someone becomes the world's greatest archer, consumption of arrows will always be a problem. {nl} Lydia Schaffen's bow was used with great care. However, Schaffen too, uses arrows. {nl} But unlike fired arrows, Her bow is permanent even with continued use.  {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000724
text: Even if it was impossible to create arrows that can be used permanently, Lydia Schaffen delved into arrow crafting techniques. {nl} Obtaining materials neccesary to craft arrows was another problem. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000725
text: Troubled greatly by this problem, Lydia Schaffen went on a journey to find the solution. {nl} Whether or not she had been granted blessing by the goddess when she met the Fletcher Master or if she found the solution to her problem, Historians will continue to debate about the topic. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000726
text: Many Fletchers had been produced ever since the dawn of time. But talentless numbers are irrelevant. {nl} People just call him the Fletcher Master, Lydia Schaffen too,was uncertain of his name. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000727
text: Ever since his rise to fame, People called him the Fletcher Master. People who knew his real name were swept away by the passings of the river of time. {nl} His real name, according to some scholars, was said to be John Blacksmith. but the name itself isn't getting any credibility, since you cannot readily accept a famous name that common. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000728
text: Anyway, Lydia Schaffen met this the Fletcher Master who was an arrow expert. Lydia after overcoming her journey, was ready to learn. {nl} However, arrow crafting techniques by the Fletcher Master was a secret at that time, and in the years afterwards, a stuff among legends. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000729
text: However, even if you are the world's greatest archer, the goddess' blessing is important to learn the arrow crafting techniques of the Fletcher Master. {nl} Therefore only someone who has the blessing of the goddess can be molded to create a the Fletcher Master, like how Lydia Schaffen created new and consistent arrows. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000730
text: Another tale is of the Fletcher Master's secret to avoid combat according to the maker's manual is to hit with certainty somewhere in the spleen. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000731
text: The rapid production of arrows by the Fletcher Master is regarded to be his sole talent. However he may have a secret lying in wait somewhere in this world. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000732
text: Lydia Schaffen Crossroads

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000733
text: {S35} {nl} Lydia Schaffen Crossroads {/}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000734
text: This is a record to the Royal Family about a story when King Kadumel asked Lydia Schaffen whether she can hit a target behind a boulder or a tree, and how she simply answered the King with the crisp sound of her arrow hitting the target. However, there are some written inconsistencies from the royal record and the folklore. That is, King Kadumel noted at the time, he was not giving Schaffen a test of her abilities with a bow.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000735
text: A more important fact is what sort of target Lydia Schaffen hit. Or to put it more precisely, who she hit, would be of great significance.{nl}Whenever the royal records and the folklore handle this story, they do not reference the time when it arose.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000736
text: Both versions simply introduce the heroic story by focusing on Lydia Schaffen's great bow skills.{nl}There is a certain reason for this.{nl} The reason is that this story happened in the final days of the Civil War. Differing from the known folklore, Ruklys was not killed by King Kadumel's soldiers in the last layer of the Fortress of the Land. It is said that Ruklys had a particular reason for not letting any outsiders into the heart of his fort.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000737
text: Rather than dying, Ruklys escaped moments before his fort was overrun, and King Kadumel ordered his soldiers to go pursue him.{nl} After the pursuit, Ruklys found himself cornered at the edge of a cliff.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000738
text: There was a large enough rock on the cliff for Ruklys to put his back against while facing the cliff and keeping the King's soldiers at the opposite face of the rock.{nl} Ruklys leaned his back on the rock so the King's archer who tracked him could not attack.{nl} If it were a different location they could have gone to the left and right to surround and rain arrows, but the cliff, alongside the battle formation, was not a place for such attacks.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000739
text: Having no archers who could shoot across the air beyond the cliff, King Kadumel unquestionably drove his soldiers towards the edge of the cliff.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000740
text: However Ruklys and his remaining men repelled the King's soldiers, showing their inhuman ability to persist day and night. This even caused the King's peasant soldiers to begin to waver.{nl} Furthermore, Ruklys' heroic struggle made such an impression to some of Kadumel's men and officers, that some started questioning Kadumel's command.{nl} Already unpopular among people under his rule, King Kadumel could not continue pushing his men to their death, he also could not wait until Ruklys died of hunger or fatigue.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000741
text: And through this situation, King Kadumel asked a clever question to Lydia Schaffen.{nl}  Of course, Lydia did not take King Kadumel's provocation as a chance to show her skills and fire a meek high angle shot to kill Ruklys. There were other reasons that were overlapping here.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000742
text: But considering these reasons, in any case, such as having her master's wishes, or the thought that she ended someone's life through her own hands, we as the current generation can only guess how hurt and conflicted were Lydia Schaffen's emotions. Henceforth, people became knowledgeable of the time when Lydia Schaffen easily pierced a target behind a boulder from the crossroads, however, Lydia would bear an immeasurable complex emotion about the crossroads from that day forward.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000743
text: Lydia Schaffen's Notch

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000744
text: {s35}{nl}Lydia Schaffen's Notch{/}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000745
text: This story is said to have taken place one day at the Astral Tower.{nl}A dispute among the disciples of Lydia Schaffen broke out.{nl}Several disciples gathered after the training and in the process such a dialogue is said to have come up: 'No matter how good your bow is, if your skills are lacking, you can't bring out its full potential. Therefore, what is important in the end is your own skill.'{nl}Such was a claim of a certain disciple, which started the dispute.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000746
text: 'You are forgetting the basics of archery. What is an archer? It is someone who uses a tool called a bow, right?{nl}Do you think an archer existing without a bow is possible? {nl}Even if one gets famous for their skill with sword and spear, can one still call themselves an archer? In the end, archery is the concept of depending on tools, isn't it?'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000747
text: The disciple who had a different view argued back:{nl}'You said tools are important, let's talk about that.{nl}What is a bow? There are various weapons for an archer. Just like there are weapons that don't need much skill to handle, like a crossbow, there are also weapons, effectiveness of which varies a lot based on a user's skill, like the ones of the Wugushi.{nl}The Wind Arrow of the Wugushi is hard to master, it's a difficult weapon to wield for someone without experience, no matter how good the materials of one's bow are.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000748
text: However, calling a catapult or a crossbow a weapon anyone can handle is not correct.{nl}You claim archery exists solely because there are tools, this is wrong.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000749
text: This is the same as saying that since people will die if they don't eat, their lives are less important than food and depend on it.{nl}Are you claiming that since you eat to be able to live on, you are living to eat?'{nl}Upon that, another disciple shared his viewpoint:{nl}'You are arguing about the path of the Archer, but you are only concentrating on one aspect.{nl}What you fail to address is that no matter how famous an archer one is, no matter how eagle-eyed one is, what they are using to their advantage is the wind. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000750
text: The arrow could not be shot if it wasn't for the wind and air that carries it to the mark, how could any sharpshooter exist, or rather, how much would an archer be able to do in that case? In the end, what is necessary for an archer is to sense the wind flow and to be able to act on it.'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000751
text: From then on, the disciples argued to no end, claims became more diverse and interesting, theories fired back and forth.{nl}Finally, they started wondering about what their master, Lydia Schaffen, would think of this.{nl}After having told her about the discussion they've had so far, they waited for her reply.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000752
text: When the disciples came to Lydia Schaffen, she is said to have been eating chestnuts using an arrowhead, dangerously perched on the railing of the Astral Tower.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000753
text: Lydia Schaffen continued eating while listening to the disciples, keeping her position on the railing. After they finished, she kept quiet for a while, but before long she fiddled with her fingers through the pile of shells of chestnuts she had eaten and picked out something, reportedly saying this: {nl}'What is this?'{nl}The disciple with the sharp eyes answered before anyone could.{nl}'It's the inner skin of a chestnut.'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000754
text: It was very obvious that it was indeed the inner skin of a chestnut, so the others nodded in agreement and waited for their master's next words. {nl}And so Lydia Schaffen continued. {nl}'No. This is the notch of my arrow.'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000755
text: Having said so, she pinched the inner skin of a chestnut between her fingers, took her bow that was lying beside her as always and fired into the sky using the inner skin as a notch. {nl}It is said that Lydia Schaffen has settled the dispute of the disciples that way, jumped from the railing she was sitting on and left, leaving the disciples bewildered.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000756
text: Lydia Schaffen and Rumpelstiltskin

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000757
text: {s35}Lydia Schaffen and Rumpelstiltskin {/}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000758
text: This is a story about Lydia Schaffen that has been handed down throughout the Kingdom. {nl}Furthermore, while there are places that Lydia Schaffen has never been to according to historical records, there are stories about what happened when she visited their village.{nl}These stories contain absurd things such as dragons appearing, a strange demon which is different from the demon we know laying a wager with Lydia Schaffen.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000759
text: In spite of that, the villagers from the region believe the story beyond doubt, and they embrace the pride that this story about Lydia Schaffen brings, having originated from their hometown.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000760
text: Compared to Ruklys, who likely died early on during the Civil War, or Flurry, who rarely left the tower she built, Lydia Schaffen definitely went on a greater number of adventures around the world, making her the most suitable as the protagonist of a story.{nl}This is one of those stories.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000761
text: It is not known how true the story really is. Perhaps it was just as absurd in the past as it would definitely be absurd in the present. Still, the fact that it is still told today means the story agrees with the nature of Lydia Schaffen.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000762
text: One day Lydia Schaffen left a certain village alone and walked around at night.{nl} Lydia Schaffen saw a traveler sitting wearily at the roadside on a woodland road. {nl} Out of curiosity, she decided to approach him.{nl} 'Why are you sitting here in the forest in the middle of the night?'{nl}The traveler was hesitant to answer at first, but after being asked multiple times he finally opened his mouth. {nl}The reason was apparently this: {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000763
text: The traveler had met a demon named Rumpelstiltskin when passing through the forest several days ago. {nl}Then he was lured into playing a game with the demon. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000764
text: The reward for winning the game was significant, but the game with the demon was not easy. In the end, the traveler lost to Rumpelstiltskin. {nl}The traveler kept sighing as he waited for Rumpelstiltskin to come back. {nl} After hearing the traveler's story, Lydia Schaffen decided to confront the demon. She promised to the traveler that she'll help him with all her might. Some time passed, and Rumpelstiltskin appeared.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000765
text: Lydia offered Rumpelstiltskin to let the traveler go and play a game with her in exchange. {nl}For better or for worse, Rumpelstiltskin was well aware of Lydia Schaffen's reputation, and the fact that she requested a game with him excited him into accepting her request. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000766
text: In the past, Rumpelstiltskin was quite famous for challenging his opponents to use their best skill and then defeating them. {nl} But, he changed the rules of his game a bit every time. {nl} Lydia Schaffen asked: 'I understand that you want to challenge my archery skill, so what are we going to do?'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000767
text: 'Of course, a game to see who is better with a bow would not be that interesting. Therefore, let's play a game where you fire an arrow at a target, and then I will try to catch and ride the arrow before it reaches the target,' said Rumpelstiltskin. {nl}Lydia replied, questioning the proposal: 'Ride an arrow?'{nl}'That is correct,' averred Rumpelstiltskin.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000768
text: Upon answering, Rumpelstiltskin started to shrink his body.{nl} Once he had reduced himself to the size of a child's fist, Rumpelstiltskin spoke: 'Well, this size will allow me to ride your arrow, right?'{nl}Lydia Schaffen thought for a bit,{nl}'There is a problem with that, though. If you touch the arrow and cause it to fall to the ground without it ever hitting the target, then wouldn't that still be a loss for me regardless of whether you rode the arrow or not?'{nl}Rumpelstiltskin answered her with these words.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000769
text: 'Then how about this. I win if I can ride your arrow until it reaches the target.'{nl} 'And if your arrow falls to the ground,' he continued, 'then we both lose.'{nl}Rumpelstiltskin added, 'The game shall have three rounds, best two out of three.'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000770
text: After Rumpelstiltskin's seemingly honest answer, Lydia Schaffen replied, 'Alright, one more thing: I'm going to shoot at any target, in any direction. I'll tell you what the target is each round. This way, you won't be able to get used to it for rounds two and three. Are you okay with this?{nl}'Alright, let's do that,' agreed Rumpelstiltskin. {nl}After also agreeing upon terms of defeat, the game between two people, err, one person and one demon began.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000771
text: Lydia Schaffen weighed her arrow, then called out the first target:{nl}'The tallest brown tree over there!'{nl}With those words, she released the arrow and it sliced through the air at a frightful speed{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000772
text: Rumpelstiltskin moved nimbly to chase the flying arrow, and after he got on, the arrow impaled the tree. As the arrow continued to oscillate, he danced to the rhythm of the oscillation and sang an unknown tune.{nl}Lydia Schaffen again gauged her arrows, then she called:{nl}'All of the cones on that pine tree on my front-left side!'{nl}Upon calling the target, Lydia Schaffen unleashed her godlike archery skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000773
text: Her arrows poured faster than heavy rain during a hot summer day, as if hundreds, or even thousands of arrows were fired at the same time in the same direction. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000774
text: Rumpelstiltskin couldn't take it as calmly this round. Faster than the human eye could distinguish, Rumpelstiltskin landed on each arrow one by one and transferred to another as the barrage cut through the air. In the end, he was able to get onto the last arrow before it reached the last pine cone.{nl}Rumpelstiltskin spoke to Lydia Schaffen while trying to catch his breath.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000775
text: 'So there, I managed to sit on every single arrow before the last arrow reached the target. I win.'{nl} Lydia Schaffen replied,{nl}' Certainly, I can't deny the fact you sat on every arrow before the last one reached its target.'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000776
text: Rumpelstiltskin gave a wicked grin after hearing Lydia Schaffen's words and said,{nl}'Meaning, I won this game. Now, as for the penalty we agreed on...'{nl}Before Rumpelstiltskin could finish, Lydia Schaffen shook her head and spoke,{nl}'Don't tell me that because you won two rounds, you won't play the final round? It's not acceptable, we clearly promised to play three rounds anyway, didn't we?'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000777
text: 'The game doesn't end before the third round, so I think it's pointless to talk about penalties before the game has actually ended...'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000778
text: Recognizing that he has already won two rounds and had no reason to refuse a third, as well as the fact the game was certainly not over yet, Rumpelstiltskin had no choice but to abide by Lydia Schaffen's words.{nl}And so the final round began, Lydia Schaffen gauged her last arrow, and called out as she pulled the bowstring back:{nl}'My target is... the moon in the sky!'{nl}Rumpelstiltskin side-saddled the arrow as soon as it left the bowstring, and not before long, he realized what he heard.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000779
text: And, as he rode the arrow towards the moon, Rumpelstiltskin also realized the fact that the game couldn't end until he reached it.{nl}As time passed, the power of the arrow subsided and it began falling towards the ground. However, after a time the arrow that Rumpelstiltskin rode on stopped still, floating in the sky.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000780
text: Just as Rumpelstiltskin, grinding his teeth, was about to open his mouth, Lydia Schaffen said,{nl}'For the game to end, you need to ride the arrow until it arrives at its target. The game cannot end before then. If you manage to touched the moon and come back, then I will definitely accept the penalty.'{nl}Having said so, Lydia Schaffen began walking away as Rumpelstiltskin watched, grinding his teeth once again, unable to change the course of the game.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000781
text: According to the anecdote, Rumpelstiltskin has not reached the moon yet, and is still flying there using the magic in his body. {nl}One can only guess if he will manage to return before his demonic life span ends.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000782
text: Nevertheless, as we know, Lydia Schaffen has passed away long ago. So while the demon did not lose the game, he has lost his chance to win the game forever. {nl}Still, the one matter left that we, as the current generation, are curious about is what the agreed penalty between Lydia Schaffen and Rumpelstiltskin was. {nl}Of course, we could ask a particular person, err, demon, that may or may not still be alive. However, as we do not know when he will return, it will be hard to settle this lingering matter for quite some time.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000783
text: The Expansion of Atman

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000784
text: The Expansion of Atman

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000785
text: Congratulations on receiving this book, which no criminal may see. There are many ways to use magic, but the magic used by Linkers are a particular case. Other mages exercise effect-based powers rather than magic. That is to say, to fight an enemy with a fireball, or with lightning, does not truly bind the enemy with magic.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000786
text: These attacks only use magic to make a fireball and lightning. Then, the mages control the magical energy's direction and destination, releasing it after settling on both.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000787
text: In other words, these mages are unable to handle enemies without Linkers; as they need to channel and regulate surrounding energy, these mages do not have the time to easily handle targeting their magic towards an enemy. However, as you have chosen to walk the path of the Linker, the way of your magic will differ completely. The way of a Linker's magic is by directly linking your magic with your opponent's magic, which includes searching for your target within seconds.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000788
text: Also, in the case of linking more than 2 targets, a Linker's way of magic is complicated even further if the targets have mutually opposing properties. In these situations, the Linker must use a viable magical property to connect the targets with opposing properties.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000789
text: Thus to some extent, the Linkers are experienced magic users who still have a lot of new fields to test. Even if there are those predestined to be Linkers, fledging mages who have developed their abilities to control magic are recommended becoming Linkers and walking the path of a Linker. Above all, the most important matter about Linkers is the establishment of their truly resolved soul, or Atman. Without it, it is possible for attacks directed at a magically linked target to return towards the Linker.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000790
text: For this reason, Linkers differ from other mages in which they must remember to use their magically established self as a tool. Particularly, when you must face other Linkers, your Atman is even more important.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000791
text: Congratulations again on receiving this book. The fact that you were able to find this book means that you have successfully found some sort of link between the visible world and the invisible world. Consequently, if you experience difficulty searching for a magical linkage point within a group of targets hereafter, it'll become easier to cast away insincerity.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000792
text: Armor from the Kadumel Era

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000793
text: Armor from the Kadumel Era{/}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000794
text: {nl}{nl}Vados Winterspoon

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000795
text: {nl}{nl}10 years have passed since I began my research. Now, exactly 30 years after the Civil War, I finally have results to show.{nl}Although the purpose of this research is to satisfy my small curiosity, if the scope were to be broadened, it may prove beneficial to the Winterspoon family.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000796
text: Anyway, after spending a long time searching every nook and cranny for information about Ruklys and his followers, I reached a conclusion.{nl}*These notes were compiled after the... from King Kadumel's men..., on the assumption that there are no contradictions.*{nl}During the period when the Civil War took place, there weren't any significant differences between the King's army and rebel army.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000797
text: Both sides had armaments of comparable quality.{nl} King Kadumel's army outnumbered the rebel army, but the Fortress of the Land and its surrounding city (now called Petrified City) was a favourable position to be situated in.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000798
text: Many of the attackers had to attack through a funnel, is my conclusion.{nl}These tactics reduced the numerical advantage from 10-to-1 to 3-to-1. *Ruklys intended to make a heroic defense in the Fortress of the Land*, The likelihood of victory is not great, even with 20 times the amount of troops. A theory commonly accepted by military scholars.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000799
text: King Kadumel had a numerical advantage in troops, but other factors involved are just as important.{nl}A significant difference, for example, is how wars are fought now compared to a thousand years ago.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000800
text: There have been many advances in military science, but the changes created by the development of the magical academy is incomparable. Warfare with magicians as combatants add a lot more elements for commanders to consider.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000801
text: This was the key difference between the armies of Ruklys and King Kadumel.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000802
text: If one side had magicians whereas the other side did not, the difference between troops and equipment is meaningless. It is estimated that the number of magicians in King Kadumel's army was substantial.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000803
text: *Although Ruklys' mentor was against fighting an army that has a considerable number of magicians, the war could not be avoided.*

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000804
text: Typically, the number of soldiers and their equipment greatly influences the tide of battle; however, with the inclusion of magicians, such was not the case as it turns out during the civil war.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000805
text: This phenomenon creates some issues to how the past was analyzed. If King Kadumel had not properly utilized the magicians, then it would be his folly and incompetence. As for the exceptional bravery Ruklys demonstrated, there may be another explanation to it.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000806
text: The perspectives like those are not all invalid. However, one thing must be said about the result of this research. That is the metal Ruklys and his followers used for their armor.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000807
text: The purpose of the research is to examine why magic was not effective in the battle against Ruklys and his followers.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000808
text: In other words, it's a possibility that Ruklys' forces were armed with Mana Metal powerful enough to negate the magical attacks of magicians.{nl}At first, this may sound absurd.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000809
text: The fact that a metal, Mana Metal, with such high resistance against magic exists is strange, but if such a metal does exist, then there couldn't have been enough to make more than one set of armor. The commander, Ruklys, would have been the only one wearing such an armor, otherwise it wouldn't make sense if the Mana Metal were distributed to that many of his troops.{nl}It is just as reasonable that the opposite was true.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000810
text: If one were to write about this, he/she can think of an objection to this immediately.{nl}In order to support this claim, one would need to find evidence of such a phenomena.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000811
text: If I personally have not reached the conclusion myself, I would not have believe such wild hypothesis.{nl} What we have discovered was that the particular type of Mana Metal does not become fractured in the extreme cold temperatures. Other seemingly sturdy metals are highly vulnerable to extreme temperatures. No matter how strong a certain type of metal is, it will crack into many pieces at cold temperatures.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000812
text: However, the Mana Metal Ruklys collected did not have such a weakness.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000813
text: Upon visiting the location of the Fortress of the Land, my conclusion was proven correct. Pieces of the Mana Metal were found. I believe that they were used in battle. My hypothesis is that a small amount of the Mana Metal is sufficient to protect against the Kings' magician's wide area magic spells.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000814
text: Let's move our focus unto Ruklys. According to credible records, all the magic attacks even from the royal magicians were useless against Ruklys so the casualty toll kept rising until they had to use Lydia Schadden's arrow. Such supports my hypothesis.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000815
text: Judging from the clues discovered, Ruklys should have been wearing magic resistant armor at the time.{nl}{nl}Combined with other clues during that period of time, the armor Ruklys was wearing must have been produced using a large amount of Mana Metal.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000816
text: So I shall call this Mana Metal

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000817
text: Cold Iron

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_000818
text: temporarily. {nl}{nl}
