name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001211
text: I'll prove myself through a test

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001212
text: Complete the Mission of an Alchemist [Alchemist Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001213
text: Lens of the Stars [Quarrel Shooter Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001214
text: I'll do you this favor

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001215
text: Sounds suspicious, I'll have to decline

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001216
text: Poison Betrayal [Ranger Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001217
text: I will accept the commission

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001218
text: Talk to the Barbarian Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001219
text: Find the Barbarian Master in East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001220
text: Get the Barbarian Master's recognition through a fight.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001221
text: You can win the Barbarian Master's recognition by going sword to sword with him. Fight the Barbarian Master and prove yourself!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001222
text: You are now recognized by the Barbarian Master. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001223
text: Recognition of the Barbarian Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001224
text: Talk to the Hoplite Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001225
text: Find the Hoplite Master in West Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001226
text: Prove your will and determination.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001227
text: The hoplite explained what it means to have a strong mind. To prove that you are determined to become stronger, please bring Leathers of Grolls from Spineheart Dale, Poisonous Needles of Chafperors from Fallen Worry Forest, and Black Powders of Blue Yukopuses from Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001228
text: Gathered all the materials needed to prove your determination to become stronger. Return to the Hoplite Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001229
text: Talk to the Psychokino Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001230
text: Find the Psychokino Master in Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001231
text: Collect flower alcohol from Matsums at Spineheart Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001232
text: The Psychokino Master asked you if you're interested in this field, and requested you to become his assistant. Go to Matsums Remaining Tree Dale to obtain flower alcohol of Matsums.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001233
text: Give it to the Psychokino Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001234
text: Acquired enough flower alcohols from Matsums at Remaining Tree Dale. Return to the Psychokino Master and hand over the flower alcochol.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001235
text: The Psychokino Master seems to be very happy. Talk to the Psychokino Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001236
text: Check the effects of research.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001237
text: The Psychokino Master told you that he installed Matsum dolls at Remaining Tree Dale and asked you to sprinkle the liquid medicine onto the dolls to check the effects.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001238
text: Hand over the results of the research to the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001239
text: As you sprinkled the liquid medicine, Matsums rushed in and almost cause trouble for you. Tell the Psychokino Master about the results of the research.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001240
text: Talk to the Linker Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001241
text: Find the Linker Master in Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001242
text: Collect Materials for the test.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001243
text: The Linker Master emphasized the abilities of a Linker, and how they open up the minds of people. Obtain the Thornball Nuclues and the Velwriggler Fragments from Gate Route, which can be used to test the abilities of a Linker.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001244
text: Give the materials to the Linker Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001245
text: Got all the materials for the test. Give it to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001246
text: Collect %s

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001247
text: Thornball Nucleus

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001248
text: Velwriggler Fragment

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001249
text: Materials for the test are ready. Talk to the Linker Master to figure out what the test is.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001250
text: Obtain the book from the World Behind at Gate Route.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001251
text: The Linker Master told you that if you are competent, you will be able to find the World Behind from Gate Route. Go into the world behind and find the book there, so you can hand it over to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001252
text: Give the book to the Linker Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001253
text: You passed the test by finding the book from the other world. Give the book to the Linker Master as evidence of your passing of the test.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001254
text: Obtain the book from the World Behind at Gate Route.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001255
text: Talk to the Sapper Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001256
text: Find the Sapper Master in the East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001257
text: Find the Sapper Master's Hidden Goods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001258
text: The Sapper Master wants to donate and return the stolen goods to repent for the past. Find the stolen goods at Flude Island in West Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001259
text: Find the Stolen Goods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001260
text: Give the stolen goods to the Klaipeda Item Merchant.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001261
text: The Sapper Master wants to return the stolen goods to its owners and repent for the past times. Give the stolen good that you found to the Item Merchant in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001262
text: Give the stolen goods to the Klaipeda Equipment Merchant.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001263
text: The Sapper Master wants to return the stolen goods to its owners and repent for the past times. Give the stolen good that you found to the Equipment Merchant in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001264
text: Completed all of the Sapper Master's requests. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001265
text: Gather donations to give to the Cleric Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001266
text: You need to gather more donations for the Cleric Master. Prepare 5000 silver to donate to the Cleric Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001267
text: Give donations to the Cleric Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001268
text: Gathered 5000 silver to donate to the Cleric Master. Give the donation to the Cleric Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001269
text: Gave the donations to the Cleric Master in Klaipeda. Return to the Sapper Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001270
text: Talk to the Hunter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001271
text: Find the Hunter Master in East Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001272
text: Explore the area mentioned by the Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001273
text: The Hunter Master is looking for a book, and he says he'll take you as a Hunter if you help him find it. Search Vubbe Outpost and check if  you can find the book there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001274
text: Give the book to the Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001275
text: Found the book the Hunter Master is looking for. Give it to the Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001276
text: Defeat Vubbe Fighter and obtain %s

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001277
text: This isn't the only book the Hunter Master is looking for. Talk to the Hunter Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001278
text: Collect the Merrog Leather.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001279
text: The Hunter Master told you that you may be able to trade with the Quarrel Shooter Master with the Merrogg Leather you have for the book. Obtain the Merrogg Leather from Fallen Worry Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001280
text: Hand over the Merrogg Leather to the Quarrel Shooter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001281
text: Acquired enough Merrogg Leather that are needed by the Quarrel Shooter Master. Hand over the Merrogg Leather to the Quarrel Shooter Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001282
text: Obtain %s by defeating Merogs

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001283
text: The Hunter Master doesn't express it much, but he seems happy to have found the book. Talk to him about the next book to find.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001284
text: Collect rocks from the Crystal Mine entrance in Miners' Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001285
text: The Archer Master has the next book. Collect rocks from the Crystal Mine entrance in Miners' Village for the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001286
text: Give the rocks to the Archer Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001287
text: Gathered rocks that the Archer Master would need. Go to the Archer Master in Klaipeda and exchange it for the book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001288
text: The Hunter Master doesn't seems pleased to find the next book. Talk to him to find the next book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001289
text: Give the pouch to the Ranger Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001290
text: The Hunter Master asked you to give the pouch to the Ranger Master. Deliver it to the Ranger Master in Klaipeda and exchange it for the book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001291
text: Gave the pouch to the Ranger Master and got the book. Take the book to the Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001292
text: Talk to the Quarrel Shooter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001293
text: Find the Quarrel Shooter Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001294
text: Search the area the Quarrel Shooter Master mentioned

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001295
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master is looking for a book and he says he'll take you as a Quarrel Shooter if you help him find the book. Search the Vubbe Outpost and check if the you can find the book there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001296
text: Give book to the Quarrel Shooter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001297
text: Found the book the Quarrel Shooter Master is looking for. Take it to the Quarrel Shooter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001298
text: This isn't the only book the Quarrel Shooter Master is looking for. Talk to the Quarrel Shooter Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001299
text: Prepare the silver the Hunter Master asked for

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001300
text: The Hunter Master has the book the Quarrel Shooter Master wants. Prepare 5000 silver to get the book from the Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001301
text: Give silver to the Hunter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001302
text: Prepared enough money for the book. Give 5000 silver to the Hunter Master in exchange for the book and take the book to the Quarrel Shooter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001303
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master seems utterly happy to get the book. Talk to him to find the next book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001304
text: Collect rocks at Miners' Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001305
text: Give the rock to the Alchemist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001306
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master is utterly happy to have found the book. Talk to him to find the next book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001307
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master asked you to give the pouch to the Ranger Master. Deliver it to the Ranger Master in Klaipeda and exchange it for the book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001308
text: Gave the pouch to the Ranger Master in exchange for the book. Take the book to the Quarrel Shooter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001309
text: Talk to the Archer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001310
text: Go to the Archer Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001311
text: Explore the area the Archer Master mentioned

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001312
text: The Archer Master is looking for a book and he says he'll take you as an Archer if you help him find the book. Search the Vubbe Outpost and check if the you can find the book there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001313
text: Deliver book to Master Archer

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001314
text: Found the book the Archer Master is looking for. Take it to the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001315
text: This isn't the only book the Archer Master is looking for. Talk to the Archer Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001316
text: The Hunter Master has the book the Archer Master wants. Prepare 5000 silver to get the book from the Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001317
text: Gathered enough money for the book. Give 5000 silver to the Hunter Master in exchange for the book and take the book to the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001318
text: The Archer Master looks very happy to have found the book. Talk to him to find the next book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001319
text: Collect the Merrogg Leather

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001320
text: The Archer Master told you that you may be able to trade with the Quarrel Shooter Master with the Merrogg Leather you have for the book. Obtain the Merrogg Leather from Fallen Worry Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001321
text: There is one last book left. Talk to the Archer Master on how you can get the last book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001322
text: The Archer Master asked you to give the pouch to the Ranger Master. Deliver it to the Ranger Master in Klaipeda and exchange it for the book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001323
text: Gave the pouch to the Ranger Master in exchange for the book. Take the book to the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001324
text: Talk to the Ranger Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001325
text: Go to the Ranger Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001326
text: Defeat Vubbe Fighter and get the book

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001327
text: The Ranger Master is looking for a book and he says he'll take you as an Ranger if you help him find the book. Search the Vubbe Outpost and check if the you can find the book there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001328
text: Give book to the Ranger Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001329
text: Found the book the Ranger Master is looking for. Give the book to the Ranger Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001330
text: Get Lydia Schaffen's book from Vubbe Fighter

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001331
text: This isn't the only book the Ranger Master is looking for. Talk to the Ranger Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001332
text: The Hunter Master has the book the Ranger Master wants. Prepare 5000 silver to get the book from the Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001333
text: The Archer Master doesn't express it much but he seems happy to have found the book. Talk to him about the next book to find.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001334
text: The Ranger Master told you that you may be able to trade with the Quarrel Shooter Master with the Merrogg Leather for the book. Obtain the Merrogg Leather from Fallen Worry Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001335
text: The Ranger Master looks very happy to have found the book. Talk to him to find the next book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001336
text: Collect rocks from the area the Ranger Master mentioned

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001337
text: Collected all the books for the Ranger Master. Talk to the Ranger Master to be acknowledged as a Ranger.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001338
text: Talk to Sculptor Tesla

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001339
text: Meet Sculptor Tesla at Rhombuspaving Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001340
text: Defeat Yekub and get the Blue Crystal

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001341
text: Sculptor Tesla says he'll help you become a Dievdirbys if you get him sculpting materials. Get Blue Crystal from the Yekub in Crystal Mine 2F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001342
text: Give Blue Crystal to Sculptor Tesla

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001343
text: Found the Blue Crystal Tesla wanted. Take it to him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001344
text: Defeat Yekub and get %s

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001345
text: Blue Crystal of Yekub

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001346
text: Talk to the Highlander Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001347
text: Find the Highlander Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001348
text: Hand over the Wooden Buckler's board to the Peltasta Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001349
text: Get help from the Peltasta Master by handing him over Wooden Buckler's 5 boards

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001350
text: Indigo Trees Plateau

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001351
text: Report to the Highlander Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001352
text: Earned the cooperation of the Peltasta Master. Report to the Highlander Master about it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001353
text: Talk to the Peltasta Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001354
text: Go to the Peltasta Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001355
text: You've selected the way of Peltasta. Meet the Peltasta Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001356
text: The Peltasta Master told you that it is important to do everything to keep the pledge that he made with Highlanders regarding the reconstruction of the kingdom. To do all your duties, talk to Uska.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001357
text: Search for the Reconnaisance Squad that disappeared into the Thorny Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001358
text: Look for the traces of Reconnaisance Squad that disappeared as it was looking the new way at Spineheart Dale.{nl}{nl}Uska is requesting you to search for Reconnaisance Squad that was lost a few days ago. Look for the traces of the squad that disappeared while it was looking for the new way at Spineheart Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001359
text: Collect the keepsakes

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001360
text: Unfortunately, everyone in the Reconnaisance Squad was found dead. Collect their keepsakes and hand them over to Uska.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001361
text: Look for the keepsakes of the soldiers who went to reconnoiter to Spineheart Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001362
text: Uska told you that the number of soldiers in the squad was 4, but you only found 3 keepsakes. Has one of them survived? Search for the other areas at Spineheart Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001363
text: Search for the other regions in Spineheart Dale

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001364
text: Hand over the keepsakes to Uska

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001365
text: Unfortunately, you couldn't save any survivor. Hand over the keepsakes to Uska.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001366
text: The revenge of the dead scout

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001367
text: You've completed the mission which Uska gave to you, but you feel somewhat bad about it. Anyways, to report the completion of the mission, go meet the Peltasta Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001368
text: Talk to the Pyromancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001369
text: Find the Pyromancer Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001370
text: Gather the Essence of Fire in the pot

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001371
text: Install the Pot of Fire near the monsters at Descended Tree Garden and collect the enegies of Fire.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001372
text: Report to the Pyromancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001373
text: Gathered the Essence of Fire. Give the pot of fire to the Pyromancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001374
text: Talk to the Cryomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001375
text: Talk to the Cryomancer Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001376
text: Chose the path of Cryomancer. Talk to the Cryomancer Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001377
text: Ask the Miners' Village Mayor about the whereabouts of the book

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001378
text: The Cryomancer Master says he's looking for a precious book and he'll help you become a Cryomancer if you find the book for him. Ask the Mayor at the Miners' Village about the book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001379
text: Search for the book at the Vubbe Outpost

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001380
text: The Miners' Village Mayor says the Vubbes stole everything during their previous raid. Go to the Vubbe Outpost and look for the book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001381
text: Give the book to the Cryomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001382
text: Found the book. Take it to the Cryomancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001383
text: Talk to the Krivis Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001384
text: Go to the Krivis Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001385
text: Offer prayers to Goddess Statue

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001386
text: The Krivis Masters says it is important to throw away everything and offer yourself to the goddess. Offer prayers to all Goddess Statues in Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001387
text: Offered prayers to all Goddess Statues in Siauliai Woods. Return to the Krivis Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001388
text: Talk to the Swordsman Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001389
text: Talk to the Swordsman Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001390
text: Defeat Mentiwood at Seventune Mesa

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001391
text: The Swordsman Master wants to be realized. As you are defeating Mentiwood at Seventune Mesa, realize what the Swordsman Master said.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001392
text: Report to the Swordsman Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001393
text: You begin to understand the words of the Swordsman Master with your heart. Return to the Swordsman Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001394
text: Defeat Mentiwood

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001395
text: Talk to the Priest Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001396
text: Find the Priest Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001397
text: Exorcise the evil spirit from the soldier and defeat it

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001398
text: The Priest Master asked you to prove your sincerity to the goddess. Find the possessed soldier in Miners' Village and perform an exorcism.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001399
text: Report to the Priest Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001400
text: Defeated the evil spirit! Return to the Priest Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001401
text: Defeat the embodiment of the evil spirit

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001402
text: Talk to the Wizard Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001403
text: Go to the Wizard Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001404
text: Collect the materials for the Wizard Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001405
text: Collect the Skins of Grolls in Spineheart Dale, Feelers of Chafperors in Fallen Worry Forest, and the nucleuses of Yukopuses from Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001406
text: Give the materials to the Wizard Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001407
text: Collected the materials for the Wizard Master. Give it to him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001408
text: Collect %s at Spineheart Dale

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001409
text: Collect %s at Fallen Worry Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001410
text: Collect %s at Miners' Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001411
text: The Wizard Master's research starts from now. Talk to wizard Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001412
text: Use the Scroll for data around town

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001413
text: The Wizard Master is studying Klaipeda which has less attacks from the monsters. Help the Wizard Master by going to the marked areas in the map and using the Scroll for collecting data.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001414
text: Report to the Wizard Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001415
text: Used all the scrolls. Return and report to the Wizard Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001416
text: Talk to the Cleric Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001417
text: Go and talk to the Cleric Master at the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001418
text: Receive Holy Water from the Priest Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001419
text: The Cleric Master suggested trying voluntary service if you are having a hard time to decide. Get the Holy Water from the Priest Master and the Krivis Master and treat the patients in Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001420
text: Get Holy Water from the Krivis Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001421
text: Get Holy Water from the Priest Master and the Krivis Master and treat the patients in Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001422
text: Treat the patients at the Miners' Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001423
text: Report to the Cleric Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001424
text: Treated all the patients in at the Miners' Village. Report to the Cleric Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001425
text: Go to the Hoplite Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001426
text: Upgrade Spear type weapon to level 6

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001427
text: The sharpened spear is the pride of Hoplites. Upgrade spear-type item to level 6. Any item will do as long as it is spear-type.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001428
text: Report to the Hoplite Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001429
text: Successfully upgraded spear-type item to level 6. Show it to the Hoplite Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001430
text: Talk to the Psychokino Master in Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001431
text: Collect Demons' Essences in Goddess' Ancient Garden

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001432
text: The Psychokino Master told you that he would help you build your psychic powers, but asked for Demons' Essences in return. Defeat Minotaur and Chapparition in Nardima Twin Falls of Goddess' Ancient Garden to obtain Demons' Essences.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001433
text: Give the Demons' Essences to Psychokino Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001434
text: Got the Demons' Essences. Give the  Demons' Essences to the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001435
text: Go to the Quarrel Shooter Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001436
text: The Quarrel Shooter is looking for someone to find a certain book. Go to the Sapper Master in East Siauliai Woods to learn more about the book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001437
text: Go to the Sapper Master in East Siauliai Woods to learn about the book that the Quarrel Shooter Master is looking for.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001438
text: Look for the map in Mage Tower 3F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001439
text: The Sapper Master told you that he heard that a strange map has been discovered at Mage Tower. Go to Mage Tower 3F and look for the map.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001440
text: Give map to the Quarrel Shooter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001441
text: This seems like the map the Sapper Master mentioned. Return to the Quarrel Shooter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001442
text: Obtain %s from Minotaur

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001443
text: Go to the Archer Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001444
text: Chose the path of Archer. Talk to the Archer Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001445
text: Talk to the Rodelero Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001446
text: Archer Master emphasized on the importance of helping others. Go to the Rodelero Master in Fedimian and ask if you can help with anything.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001447
text: Defeat the giant monster in Mage Tower 3F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001448
text: The Rodelero Master says there aren't enough manpower to rebuild Fedimian and monsters are flooding out of the Mage Tower. Defeat the giant monster in Mage Tower 3F to serve as a warning.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001449
text: Report to the Rodelero Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001450
text: Defeated the Minotaur in Mage Tower 3F. Report back to the Rodelero Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001451
text: Report to the Archer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001452
text: Completed the Rodelero Master's favor. Report back to the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001453
text: Go to the Ranger Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001454
text: Meet the Squire Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001455
text: The Ranger Master asked you to help find Evoniphon. Meet the Squire Master in Fedimian to learn more about Evoniphon.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001456
text: Talk to the Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001457
text: The Squire Master told you that he saw the person who seems to be Evoniphon talking to the Elementalist Master. Meet the Elementalist Master and get information about Evoniphon.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001458
text: The Elementalist Master told you that he remembers a person with a unique scent. Ask the Elementalist Master for the whereabout of the person.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001459
text: Look for Evoniphon in Mage Tower 3F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001460
text: The Elementalist Master gave you the location that the person who seems to be Evoniphon headed for. The person was looking for ingredients and would likely be there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001461
text: Report to the Ranger Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001462
text: You could only find pieces of Evoniphon's clothes in Mage Tower 3F. Return to the Ranger Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001463
text: Defeat Minotaur and find traces of Evoniphon

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001464
text: Talk to the Sapper Master in East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001465
text: Collect Drakes' flame catalysts

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001466
text: Sapper Master told you that he will help you to become Sapper if you help him with his experiment. Collect flame catalysts from Drakes in Mage Tower 1F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001467
text: Hand over the flame catalysts to the Sapper Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001468
text: Acquired all flame catalysts. Hand over the catalysts to the Sapper Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001469
text: Defeat Drakes

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001470
text: Experiments starts now. Talk to the Sapper Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001471
text: Test the bomb

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001472
text: The Sapper Master want you to test the Experimental Bomb. Use the Experimental Bomb on the monsters in East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001473
text: Report to the Sapper Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001474
text: The bomb didn't seem so powerful. Report the results to the Sapper Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001475
text: Talk to the Bokor Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001476
text: Go to the Bokor Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001477
text: Collect Mission or Field Boss Monster Card

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001478
text: The Bokor Master asked you bring a boss monster card. The card can be obtained from any boss monsters in field or mission.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001479
text: Mission Zone/Crystal Mine Field Boss/Tenet Church Field Boss/Royal Mausoleum Field Boss (Except quest boss monsters)

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001480
text: Give a card to the Bokor Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001481
text: Got a Boss Monster Card. Give it to the Bokor Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001482
text: Meet with Sculptor Tesla at Rhombuspaving Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001483
text: Talk to the Item Merchant in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001484
text: Sculptor Tesla is looking for a cat to use as a model. Ask the Item Merchant in Klaipeda if there is a cat suitable to use as a model.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001485
text: Look for the father of the Equipment Merchant in Mage Tower 3F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001486
text: The Equipment Merchant asked you to find the traces of his father, and in return, will give you cat food to lure the cat. Look for the father of the Equipment Merchant on Mage Tower 3F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001487
text: Give the piece of father's clothing to the Item Merchant

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001488
text: Unfortunately, you did not find the Equipment Merchant's father but you found a piece of clothing that may belong to him. Give it to the Equipment Merchant.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001489
text: Defeat Minotaur

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001490
text: Lure the Klaipeda Plaza cat with food

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001491
text: Received special cat food from the Item Merchant. Use it to lure the cat in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001492
text: Give the cat to Sculptor Tesla

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001493
text: Successfully captured the cat! Give the cat to Sculptor Tesla.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001494
text: Meet the Pyromancer Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001495
text: Go to the Reading Room in Mage Tower 1F and put the Pot of the Sun.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001496
text: The Pyromancer Master requested something from you in return for teaching you magic. Go to Mage Tower 1F and put the Pot of the Sun in the Reading Room.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001497
text: Defeat Chapparition

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001498
text: Put the Pot of the Sun in the Reading Room in Mage Tower 1F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001499
text: Placed the Pot of the Sun in the Reading room. Report back to the Pyromancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001500
text: Talk to the Cryomancer Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001501
text: Collect materials requested by the Cryomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001502
text: The Cryomancer Master told you that if you could find the ingredients that he wants, he will help you to become a Cryomancer. Collect Beaks of Cockatries in Crystal Brook and Scales of Armas in Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001503
text: Deliver the materials to the Cryomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001504
text: Collected all the materials the Cryomancer Master needs. Give them to him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001505
text: The Wizard Master considers effort as most important. Collect Piece of Pyracon and Green Drake Scale from Mage Tower.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001506
text: Haven't finished all of the Wizard Master's requests. Talk to Wizard Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001507
text: Use Wizard's Data Measurement Scroll around Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001508
text: The Wizard Master also wants to measure Fedimian's defense capabilities. Go to the marked areas in the map and use the Scroll to help the Wizard Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001509
text: Talk to the Cleric Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001510
text: Use Heal to treat people

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001511
text: The Cleric Master says you better serve others by healing them. Use your or your party member's Heal skills to help heal others.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001512
text: All area

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001513
text: You healed enough people. Report back to the Cleric Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001514
text: Talk to the Sorcerer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001515
text: Go to the Sorcerer Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001516
text: Win a magic duel against the Sorcerer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001517
text: The Sorcerer Master says he will teach you if you win a magic duel against him. Have a duel against him in Fedimian vacant lot and win.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001518
text: Won the duel with the Sorcerer Master. Talk to him again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001519
text: Acknowledgment of the Sorcerer

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001520
text: Talk to the Necromancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001521
text: Talk to the Necromancer Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001522
text: Battle against the Necromancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001523
text: The Necromancer Master told you that you should possess a strong spirit. Duel with the Necromancer Master and win.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001524
text: You won after dueling with the Necromancer Master. Talk to the Necromancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001525
text: Acknowledgment of Necromancer

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001526
text: Talk to the Druid Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001527
text: Find the Druid Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001528
text: Duel against the Druid Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001529
text: The Druid Master told you that your unknown senses be aroused by dueling. Go to the empty square and duel with Druid Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001530
text: You can feel new senses after dueling with the Druid Master. Talk to the Druid Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001531
text: Acknowledgment of Druid

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001532
text: Talk to the Linker Master in Crystal Mine of Siauliai

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001533
text: Duel with the Linker Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001534
text: The Linker Master wants to test the quality of Mana through dueling. Duel against the Linker Master and win.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001535
text: You can feel the quality of Mana enhanced after dueling with the Linker Master. Talk to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001536
text: Acknowledgment of Linker

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001537
text: Evaluate the competence of yourself by dueling with the Hunter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001538
text: The Hunter Master wants you to prove yourself using a bow. Duel against the Hunter Master and win!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001539
text: You've won against the Hunter Master. Report back to the Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001540
text: Acknowledgment of Hunter

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001541
text: Talk to the Highlander Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001542
text: Defeat Sparnas Men in Rhombuspaving Dale

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001543
text: The Highlander Master asked you to prove your skills. Defeat Sparnas Men in Rhombuspaving Dale to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001544
text: You've defeated Sparnasman. Report back to the Highlander Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001545
text: Talk to the Peltasta Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001546
text: Defeat Chapparition

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001547
text: The Peltasta Master told you that if you want to hold a shield, you gotta have courage. Defeat Chapparition in Mage Tower 1F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001548
text: You've defeated Chapparition. Report back to the Peltasta Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001549
text: Talk to the Krivis Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001550
text: Duel with the Krivis Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001551
text: The Krivis Master is emphasizing on the stong determination that won't be changed in any situations. Duel with the Krivis Master in the Highlander Master's Training Room and win.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001552
text: You've won against the Krivis Master. Talk to the Krivis Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001553
text: Acknowledgment of Krivis

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001554
text: Talk to the Priest Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001555
text: Duel with the Priest Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001556
text: The Priest Master told you that your powers lies with your faith. Duel against the Priest Master in the Highlander Master's Training Room and win.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001557
text: You've won against the Priest Master. Talk to the Priest Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001558
text: Acknowledgment of Priest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001559
text: Find the Swordsman Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001560
text: Defeat Minotaur in Mage Tower 3F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001561
text: The Swordsman Master told you that it is unwise to hesitate when using a sword. Defeat Minotaur in Mage Tower 3F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001562
text: You've defeated Minotaur. Report back to the Swordsman Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001563
text: Talk to the Centurion Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001564
text: Find the Centurion Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001565
text: Duel against the Centurion Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001566
text: The Centurion Master told you to prove your skills by dueling against him. Duel against the Centurion Master and win.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001567
text: Talk to the Centurion Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001568
text: You've won after dueling against the Centurion Master. Talk to the Centurion Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001569
text: Acknowledgment of Centurion

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001570
text: Talk to the Sadhu Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001571
text: Talk to the Sadhu Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001572
text: Duel with the Sadhu Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001573
text: Duel against the Sadhu Master in the empty lot in the square and win.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001574
text: You've won against the Sadhu Master. Talk to the Sadhu Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001575
text: Acknowledgment of Sadhu

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001576
text: Call of the Hackapell Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001577
text: The Hackapell Master is looking for you at Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001578
text: Duel against the Hackapell Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001579
text: The Hackapell Master told you that he can teach you when he knows you're lacking. Duel against the Hackapell Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001580
text: Talk to the Hackapell Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001581
text: You've won against the Hackapell Master. Talk to the Hackapell Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001582
text: Acknowledgment of Hackapell

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001583
text: Talk to the Wugushi Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001584
text: Talk to the Wugushi Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001585
text: Duel with the Wugushi Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001586
text: The Wugushi Master told you that the end justifies the mean when it comes to victory and survival. Duel against the Wugushi Master in the empty lot in the square.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001587
text: You've won against the Wugushi Master. Talk to the Wugushi Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001588
text: Acknowledgment of Wugushi

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001589
text: Talk with the Rodelero Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001590
text: Upgrade Shield to level 6

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001591
text: The Rodelero Master ask you to present to her a shield of Lv 6 or above. Upgrade your Shield to get Rodelero Master's Acknowledgment

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001592
text: Successfully upgraded shield to level 6. Report back to Rodelero Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001593
text: Talk to the Squire Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001594
text: Meet the Squire Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001595
text: Prove your skills by dueling against the Squire Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001596
text: Prove your skills by dueling against the Squire Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001597
text: You've won against Squire Master. Talk to the Squire Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001598
text: Duel against the Squire Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001599
text: Talk with the Thaumaturge Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001600
text: Talk with the Thaumaturge Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001601
text: Collect the magic research documents in Mage Tower 3F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001602
text: The Thaumaturge Master told you that if you could help with his task, he will help you to become a Thaumaturge. Collect the magic research documents which the magicians abandoned in Mage Tower 3F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001603
text: Give it to the Thaumaturge Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001604
text: Acquired all the magic research materials. Hand them over to the Thaumaturge Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001605
text: Talk with the Elementalist Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001606
text: Complete the assignment from the Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001607
text: Obtain Body Fluids of Slimes in Mage Tower 2F, Bone Fragments of Hallowventers in Crystal Brook, and the Activating Nuclei from Golems in Grave in Tree Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001608
text: Hand over the assignment to the Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001609
text: You've completed the assignment of the Elementalist Master. Hand over the ingredients to the Elementalist Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001610
text: Slime

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001611
text: Tombstone Golems

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001612
text: Talk to the Scout Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001613
text: Talk to the Scout Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001614
text: Duel against the Scout Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001615
text: The Scout Master told you battle skills are as important as hiding skills. Duel against the Scout Master and prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001616
text: You've won against the Scout Master. Talk to the Scout Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001617
text: Talk to the Paladin Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001618
text: Talk to the Paladin Master in Emerald Bluffs.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001619
text: The Paladin Master told you that it is important to obey the justice and faith in the name of the goddesses. Defeat Spanas Men in Rhoumbuspaving Dale to prove your faithfulness.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001620
text: Report to the Paladin Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001621
text: You've succeeded in defeating Sparnasman. Report back to the Paladin Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001622
text: Talk to the Cataphract Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001623
text: Talk to the Cataphract Master at High Crooked Road.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001624
text: Defeat Sparnas Men in Rhombuspaving Dale to prove your skills to the Cataphract Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001625
text: Report to the Cataphract Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001626
text: You've succeeded in defeating Sparnasman. Report back to the Cataphract Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001627
text: Talk to the Priest Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001628
text: Get the pouch with evil aura from the Vubbes in Crystal Mine 1F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001629
text: The Priest Master ask you to defeat the Vubbes occupying Crystal Mine 1F as a proof of your faith

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001630
text: Imbued Evil Energy Pouch

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001631
text: from the Vubbes.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001632
text: Give the pouches to the Priest Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001633
text: Gathered the pouches with evil energy. Take them to the Priest Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001634
text: Got the pouch with evil energy.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001635
text: Talk to the Krivis Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001636
text: Krivis Brother Investigation

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001637
text: The Krivis Master told you that a Krivis brother has disappeared while carrying a sacred relic. Look for the Krivis brother at Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001638
text: Talk to Krivis Brother

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001639
text: You've found the Krivis brother who disappeared. Talk to him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001640
text: Defeat the Vubbes who are after the sacred relic

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001641
text: Talk to the Swordsman Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001642
text: Collect the hearts of Stone Orcas in Crystal Mine 1F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001643
text: The Swordsman Master asked you prove that you are good at handling swords. Defeat Stone Orcas at Crystal Mine 1F and collect the hearts of Stone Orca.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001644
text: Hand it over to the Swordsman Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001645
text: You've collected enough hearts of Stone Orcas. Hand them over to the Swordsman Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001646
text: Obtained the hearts of Stone Orca

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001647
text: Talk to the Wizard Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001648
text: Defeat Shredded

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001649
text: The Wizard Master spoke about the importance of the strong will. Defeat Shreddeds in Crystal Mine 1F and return to the Wizard Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001650
text: You've defeated enough Shreddeds. Report back to the Wizard Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001651
text: Annhilate Shreddeds

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001652
text: Talk to the Archer Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001653
text: Obtain bats wings by defeating bats

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001654
text: The Archer Master wants to test whether you are qualified to receive the map. Obtain bats wings at Crystal Mine 1F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001655
text: Hand them over to the Archer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001656
text: You've collected enough bats wings. Hand them over to the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001657
text: Obtain bat wings

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001658
text: Talk to the Cleric Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001659
text: Get green ointments from the Vubbes in Crystal Mine 1F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001660
text: The Cleric Master says you can aim to reach higher through service. Defeat the Vubbes in Crystal Mine 1F and gather green ointment.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001661
text: Give them to the Cleric Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001662
text: Gathered enough green ointment. Take them to the Cleric Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001663
text: Collect %s from Vubbes

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001664
text: Obtained green ointment

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001665
text: Found the Krivis brother found. Talk to him and return him back safely.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001666
text: Hand over the sacred relic to the Krivis Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001667
text: The Krivis brother told you to go first with the sacred relic since he had something left to do. Hand the sacred relic to the Krivis Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001668
text: Meet the Swordsman Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001669
text: Meet the Swordsman Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001670
text: Use the provoking orb at Penitence Route of Great Cathedral

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001671
text: The Swordsman Master taught that courage to protect allies is very important. Provoke the monsters using the provoking orb at Penitence Route of Great Cathedral and defeat them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001672
text: You have fulfilled the amount which the Swordsman Master requested. Report back to the Swordsman Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001673
text: Find the Highlander Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001674
text: Find the Highlander Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001675
text: Find the Peltasta Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001676
text: The Highlander Master told you that if you could help the Peltasta Master, he will offer you some lesson. Talk to the Peltasta Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001677
text: The Peltasta Master is in a hurry. Talk to the Peltasta Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001678
text: Meet Uska

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001679
text: The Peltasta Master told you that Uska received a request, but since he doesn't have time, he can't support it. Meet Uska on behalf of the Peltasta Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001680
text: You told him that you will help Uska on behalf of the Highlander and Peltasta Masters. Talk to Uska again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001681
text: Defeat the source of the rumor in Crystal Mine 2F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001682
text: Uska told you that the work needs to start again at Crystal Mine, but he can't due to the gigantic monster in Crystal Mine 2F. Get rid of the source of the rumor in Crystal Mine 2F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001683
text: Report to Knight Commander Uska

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001684
text: The source of the rumor was Bearkaras. Report to Uska when you defeat Bearkaras.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001685
text: It is now time to go back to the Highlander Master again since you completed the request. Talk to Uska again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001686
text: Return to the Highlander Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001687
text: You've completed the request of Uska. Return to the Highlander Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001688
text: Find the Peltasta Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001689
text: Meet the Peltasta Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001690
text: Find the Highlander Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001691
text: The Peltasta Master says the Highlanders are not keeping their promise of supplying shields. He says he will allow you to learn if you take care of this issue. First, go to the Highlander Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001692
text: Talk to the Highlander Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001693
text: The Highlander Master seems very sorry, but you can't give up. Talk to the Highlander Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001694
text: Meet the Fletcher Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001695
text: It seems that something happened to the Fletcher Master whom the Highlander Master requested the trade. Meet the Fletcher Master in Remaining Tree Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001696
text: Talk to the Fletcher Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001697
text: The Fletcher Master told you to go back, but you can't. Speak to him again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001698
text: Defeat Moas in Crystal Brook

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001699
text: The Fletcher Master told you that if you could defeat Moas, he will advance your request. Defeat Moas which is attacking merchants traveling between Crystal Brook and Fedimian.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001700
text: Report to the Fletcher Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001701
text: You succeeded on defeating Moas that were attacking the merchants. Report back to the Fletcher Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001702
text: Since you've defeated Moas, you think you can get a firm promise for receiving the supplies. Talk to the Fletcher Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001703
text: Report to the Peltasta Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001704
text: You've received a firm promise from the Fletcher Master about receiving the supplies. Return to the Peltasta Master and report.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001705
text: Meet the Corsair Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001706
text: Meet the Corsair Master in Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001707
text: Retrieve the objects from the Corsair Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001708
text: Retrieve the items stolen from the Corsair Master in the Great Cathedral area.{nl}The Dock Permit can be found by defeating Moyas, the Navigator's Chart by defeating Stoulets and the Contract can be found by defeating Moyabu.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001709
text: Hand them over to the Corsair Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001710
text: You found all the objects of the Corsair Master. Return to him and report.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001711
text: Find the permission to the Port entry

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001712
text: Find the Sailing Map

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001713
text: Find the Contract

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001714
text: Find the Rodelero Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001715
text: Meet the Rodelero Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001716
text: Duel against the Rodelero Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001717
text: The Rodelero Master will show you how to fight with a sword and a shield. Win in a duel against the Rodelero Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001718
text: You've won against the Rodelero Master. Talk to the Rodelero Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001719
text: Defeat the Rodelero Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001720
text: Find the Archer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001721
text: Talk to the Archer Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001722
text: Meet the Fletcher Master in Remaining Tree Dale

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001723
text: The Archer Master told you that if you could complete his request, he will teach you. {nl}Meet the Fletcher Master in Remaining Tree Dale and check if there are any problems.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001724
text: The Fletcher Master is safe but the materials are late because of supplies. Talk to the Fletcher Master about the materials.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001725
text: Gather Charcoal Stones from Penitence Route

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001726
text: The Fletcher Master is asking you to gather good quality Charcoal Stones. Get them from the Penitence Route. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001727
text: Give them to the Fletcher Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001728
text: Thanks to the Golems, you've gathered a bunch of good quality Charcoal Stones. Give them to the Fletcher Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001729
text: The materials that the Fletcher Master asked for is ready. Talk to the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001730
text: The Fletcher Master is asking you to take the copy and go back to the Archer Master. Return to the Archer Master and show him the copy.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001731
text: Go to the Ranger Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001732
text: Meet the Ranger Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001733
text: Extract the fluids from Moyas at the Great Cathedral

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001734
text: The Ranger Master says he'll teach you if you help him. Collect fluid samples from Moyas hiding in the Cathedral.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001735
text: Deliver it to the Ranger Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001736
text: Collect Moya fluid samples. Give them to the Ranger Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001737
text: Monster Fluid

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001738
text: Find the Sapper Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001739
text: Find the Sapper Master in East Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001740
text: Defeat Biteregina in Sunset Flag Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001741
text: The Sapper Master asked you to defeat Biteregina that threaten people in Sunset Flag Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001742
text: Defeated Biteregina. Report back to The Sapper Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001743
text: Meet the Fletcher Master in Remaining Tree Dale

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001744
text: Collected Whistling Wood

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001745
text: The Fletcher Master seems very busy, but if you could help him, it seems that you may be able to learn from him. At Pretense Intersection, look for grubby looking trees from the monsters and bring the trees that make clear sound among them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001746
text: Collected enough Whistling Wood. Give them to the Fletcher Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001747
text: Go to the Hunter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001748
text: Go to the Hunter Master in East Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001749
text: Hunt for 3 kinds of monsters

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001750
text: The Hunter Master gave you an assignment to hunt for monsters that are scattered in various regions. Use baits to hunt for Keparis in Starving Demon's Way, Kodomors in Scattered Stairways, and Kowaks in Purple Tree Fault Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001751
text: Report to the Hunter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001752
text: Hunted monsters. Report to the Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001753
text: Keparis in Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001754
text: Kodomors in Scattered Stairways

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001755
text: Kowaks in Purple Tree Fault Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001756
text: Go to the Wugushi Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001757
text: Meet the Wugushi Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001758
text: Collect the composite poison

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001759
text: The Wugushi Master gave you an assignment to collect the poison. Collect the poison from Stoulets in the Great Cathedral using temporal tube.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001760
text: Deliver it to the Wugushi Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001761
text: Gathered enough combined poison. Give it to the Wugushi Master,

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001762
text: Get Combined Poison

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001763
text: Go to the Scout Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001764
text: Meet the Scout Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001765
text: Use Flares to detect monsters and defeat them

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001766
text: Use Flares to detect the monsters that are hidden in Purple Tree Fault Forest and defeat them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001767
text: Report to the Scout Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001768
text: Found all hidden monsters. Report back to the Scout Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001769
text: Defeat the monsters

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001770
text: Go to the Quarrel Shooter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001771
text: Get the rubbings from Lydia Schaffen's Gravestone

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001772
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master wants the rubbings of Lydia Schaffen's Gravestone as a test. Get it from Goddess' Ancient Garden.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001773
text: Deliver to the Quarrel Shooter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001774
text: Got the rubbings. Give them to the Quarrel Shooter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001775
text: Go to the Rogue Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001776
text: Go to the Rogue Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001777
text: Use Smoke Bombs to surpass 5 monsters

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001778
text: The Rogue Master told you that before teaching his skills, he needs to give you a test. Use Smoke Bombs on the monsters that rushed into the training field that is prepared in Grand Corridor of the Great Cathedral to confuse them and defeat them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001779
text: Report to the Rogue Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001780
text: You passed all the test from the Rogue Master. Report back to the Rogue Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001781
text: Go to the Hoplite Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001782
text: Find the Hoplite Master in West Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001783
text: Defeat Shadowgaler in the main chamber of the Great Cathedral

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001784
text: Before you learn from the Hoplite Master, he wants you to defeat Shadowgaler before the Hackapell Master. As she wishes, defeat Shadowgaler in the main chamber of the Great Cathedral and return.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001785
text: Report to the Hoplite Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001786
text: You have defeated Shadowgaler. Report back to the Hoplite Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001787
text: Defeat Shadowgaler

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001788
text: Meet the Barbarian Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001789
text: Talk to the Barbarian Master in East Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001790
text: Defeat Yekubs in the main chamber of the Great Cathedral

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001791
text: The Barbarian Master wants you to defeat Yekubs prior to other people chasing after Yekubs. Defeat Yekubs in the main chamber of the Great Cathedral.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001792
text: Report to the Barbarian Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001793
text: You have defeated Yekubs. Report back to the Barbarian Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001794
text: Defeat Yekub

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001795
text: Meet the Squire Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001796
text: Talk to the Squire Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001797
text: Use the tie rope

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001798
text: The Squire Master asked you to practice Arrest rope as much as you can so you can control it without any problem. Practice the rope to the monsters in Sanctuary of the Great Cathedral.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001799
text: Return to the Squire Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001800
text: You familiarized with using the tie rope now. Report to the Scout Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001801
text: Meet the Centurion Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001802
text: Meet the Centurion Master at Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001803
text: Defeat Colimencia in Layered Rock Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001804
text: The Centurion Master told you that you need to be competent enough to control other people. Defeat Colimencia in Layered Rock Forest to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001805
text: Return to the Centurion Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001806
text: Defeated Colimencia. Report back to the Centurion Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001807
text: Defeat Colimencia

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001808
text: Call of the Archer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001809
text: Call of the Archer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001810
text: The Archer Master in Klaipeda is looking for you

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001811
text: Defeat Sparnashorn in Ruklys Street

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001812
text: Defeated Sparnashorn. Report back to the Archer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001813
text: Defeat Sparnashorn

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001814
text: Call of the Ranger Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001815
text: The Ranger Master in Klaipeda is looking for you

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001816
text: Defeat Reaverpede in Lonesome Marketplace

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001817
text: The Ranger Master told you that he has regrets in his work so he wants to be helpful like other masters. Defeat Reaverpede in Lonesome Marketplace.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001818
text: You've defeated Reaverpede. Report back to Ranger Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001819
text: Defeat Reaverpede

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001820
text: Call of the Quarrel Shooter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001821
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master in Klaipeda is looking for you

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001822
text: Defeat the Templeshooter of Town Center

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001823
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master says his disciples are giving ruining works and becoming an embarrassment for him. Go to the town center for the disciples and defeat the Templeshooter.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001824
text: Report to the Quarrel Shooter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001825
text: You've defeated Templeshooter. Report back to the Quarrel Shooter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001826
text: Defeat Templeshooter

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001827
text: Call of the Sapper Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001828
text: The Sapper Master in East Siauliai Woods is looking for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001829
text: Get Natural Mano Stones from Rocktortugas on Ruklys Street.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001830
text: The Sapper Master wants Natural Mano Stones for a new trap. Defeat the Rocktortuga on Ruklys Street and get the Natural Mano Stones.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001831
text: Got the Natural Mano Stones. Talk to Sapper Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001832
text: Obtained Natural Mano Stones

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001833
text: Call of the Hunter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001834
text: The Hunter Master in East Siauliai Woods is looking for you

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001835
text: Defeat frantic Minotaur in Lonesome Marketplace

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001836
text: The Hunter Master told you that Minotaur has appeared and you should be able to defeat that monster if you are a Hunter. Defeat Minotaur in Lonesome Marketplace and bring the huge canine as a proof.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001837
text: Hand it over to the Hunter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001838
text: You've defeated Minotaur and received a gigantic Canine. Give it to the Hunter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001839
text: Obtain the gigantic canine

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001840
text: Call of the Wugushi Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001841
text: The Wugushi Master in Fedimian is looking for you

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001842
text: Defeat Rajatoad in the central district

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001843
text: The Wugushi Master told you about the importance of poison immunity. Defeat Rajatoad in the central district and go back to the Wugushi Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001844
text: Report back to the Wugushi Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001845
text: Defeated Rajatoad. Report back to Wugushi Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001846
text: The Call of the Scout Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001847
text: The Scout Master in Fedimian is looking for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001848
text: Defeat Deadborn in Ruklys Street

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001849
text: Scout Master told you that if you want to be learned, you should be competent enough. Defeat Deadborn in Ruklys Street and report back to the Scout Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001850
text: Report to the Scout Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001851
text: Defeated Deadborn. Talk to the Scout Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001852
text: Call of the Rogue Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001853
text: Go to the Rogue Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001854
text: Duel with the Rogue Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001855
text: The Rogue Master asked you to prove yourself through a duel. Win the duel against Rogue Master in the vacant lot above the stairs.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001857

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001858
text: Dominate the Rogue Master

text: Collect flammable stones

text: Duel against Schwarzer Reiter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001869
text: The Schwarzer Reiter Master told you that the guns and the swords are important, but you also need to possess the hatred. Duel against Schwarzer Reiter Master and win.

text: Talk to the Schwarzer Reiter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001871

text: Obtain Wildflower Stamen from Lonesome Marketplace

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001877

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001878

text: Wildflower Stamen

text: Retrieve the lost Holy Materials in the Town Center

text: The Krivis Master says the Holy Materials were stolen during a raid on its way to Fedimian. Find the lost Holy Materials in the Town Center and bring it to the Krivis Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001882
text: Deliver it to the Krivis Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001883

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001889

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001890

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001893
text: Deliver it to the Bokor Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001894
text: Got the essence of Stone Whale. Bring it to the Bokor Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001895

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001900

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001926

text: Duel with the Oracle Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001931
text: The Oracle Master wants to test whether you are competent enough to possess the guidelines of the oracle and spread them well. Duel against the Oracle Master and win.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001946
text: Defeated all the Vubbes. Report back to the Peltasta Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001947
text: Defeat the Vubbes in Crystal Mine 1F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001949

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001950
text: Defeat the Vubbes in Crystal Mine 1F

text: Talk to the Pyromancer Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001955
text: Summoned Evil

text: Report to the Cryomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001960
text: Opened the Pyromancer Master's box. Report to the Cryomancer Master.

text: Defeat the Guardian of Contract

text: Find the Cleric Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001963
text: The Cleric Master says you can reach a higher stage in life by service. Go to the Centurion Master at the Starving Demons' Road in Pilgrim's Way area to receive the medicinal herbs needed for service.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001964
text: Go to the Centurion Master in Starving Demons' Road

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001965
text: The Cleric Master says you can reach a higher level by service. Go to the Centurion Master at the Starving Demons' Road in Pilgrim's Way area to receive the medicinal herbs needed for service.

text: Dig the young shoot of Nicotia

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001969
text: Collect medicinal herbs

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001970

text: Help the Priest Master's work

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001976

text: Meet with the Cleric Master

text: Defeat the evil force

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001987

text: Meet the Bokor Master

text: Get the jewel from the Krivis Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001991
text: The Bokor Master says there is something you need to do to become a stronger Bokor. Go to the Krivis Master and get the jewel that he is keeping.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001992
text: The Bokor Master says there is something you need to do to become a stronger Bokor. Go to the Krivis Master and get the jewel that he is keeping.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001993
text: Return to the Bokor Master

text: Told the Krivis Master to prepare the memorial service. Now it's time to defeat Tutu. Defeat it in East Siauliai Woods before it reaches Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_001999
text: Defeated Tutu. Report to the Bokor Master.

text: Meet with Sculptor Tesla

text: Talk to Sculptor Tesla in Rhombuspaving Dale

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002002
text: Receive balm from the Cleric Master

text: Tesla emphasized the importance of post management as virtue and asked you to manage the Goddess Statue. Get the balm needed for the Goddess Statue from the Cleric Master in Klaipeda.

text: Received balm from the Cleric Master but it does not seem enough. Talk to the Cleric Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002005
text: Get balm from the Krivis Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002006
text: The balm is not enough for the Goddess Statue. Get more from the Krivis Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002007
text: Received balm from the Krivis Master but it does not seem enough. Talk to the Krivis Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002008
text: Receive balm from the Priest Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002009
text: The balm is not enough for the Goddess Statue. Get more from the Priest Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002010
text: Received balm from the Priest Master but it does not seem enough. Talk to the Priest Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002011
text: Receive balm from the Bokor Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002012
text: The balm is not enough for the Goddess Statue. Get more from the Bokor Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002013
text: You have enough balm for the Goddess Statue. Talk to the Bokor Master again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002014
text: Restore the Goddess Statues in Fedimian and Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002015
text: Received enough balm. Restore the Vakarine Statue in Fedimian and Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002016
text: Report to Tesla

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002017

text: Meet the Sadhu master

text: Talk to the Sadhu Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002020
text: Defeat Monsters in Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002021

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002022

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002023

text: Defeat Monsters in Starving Demon's Way

text: Go to the Paladin Master in Emerald Bluffs

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002029
text: Pass the duel test with the Paladin Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002030
text: Meet the Monk Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002031
text: Talk with the Monk Master in Remaining Tree Dale

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002032
text: Duel with the Monk Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002033
text: The Monk Master says strong faith resides in a strong body. Win the duel with the Monk Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002034

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002035
text: Pass the Monk Master's test

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002036
text: Meet the Pardoner Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002038
text: The Pardoner Master asked you to get the Fire Pot as your acceptance test. Go to The Equipment Merchant in Fedimian to get information about the fire pot.
