text: Meet the Item Merchant in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002040
text: The Equipment Merchant says the Mothstem took the Fire Pot as a price for the hardened oil. Talk to the Item Merchant and ask where you can meet Mothstem.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002041
text: Acquired Fire Pot

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002042
text: The Item Merchant in Fedimian has seen a Mothstem in Crystal Brook. Defeat the Mothstem in Crystal Brook and get the Fire Pot.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002043
text: Got the Fire Pot the Pardoner Master wanted. Give it to the Pardoner Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002044
text: Defeat Mothstem and obtain %s

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002045
text: Defeat Mothstem

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002046
text: Talk to Equipment Merchant in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002047
text: The merchants in Fedimian knows about the Fire Pot. Talk to the Equipment Merchant first.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002048
text: Collect the condensed oil from Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002049
text: As a return for his information, the Equipment Merchant wants the condensed oil. Obtain the condensed oil from the monsters in Starving Demon's Way and take it to the Equipment Merchant.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002050
text: Give it to the Equipment Merchant in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002051
text: Gathered enough hardened oil. Give it to the Equipment Merchant in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002052
text: Obtain %s by defeating the monsters that are rushing in

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002053
text: Obtain the items after defeating the monsters.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002054
text: Talk to the Wizard Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002055
text: Remove the threats of West Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002056
text: The Wizard Master says he'll test your fundamentals. Defeat the wild Golems in West Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002057
text: Defeated the Golems in West Siauliai Woods. Report to the Wizard Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002058
text: Eliminate the danger in Sunset Flag Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002059
text: You need to show your skills to the Cataphract Master. Defeat Biteregina that threaten people at Sunset Flag Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002060
text: Defeated Biteregina. Report to the Cataphract Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002061
text: Talk to the Pyromancer Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002062
text: Defeat the Poata in East Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002063
text: Pyromancer asked you to defeat the Poata in East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002064
text: Defeated the Poata in East Siauliai Woods. Report to the Pyromancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002065
text: Defeat the Mushcaria in West Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002066
text: Prove your strength to the Cryomancer Master by defeating the Mushcaria in West Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002067
text: Defeated Mushcaria in West Siauliai Woods. Return and report to the Cryomancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002068
text: Talk to the Psychokino Master in the Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002069
text: Defeat the Vubbe Fighter at the Miners' Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002070
text: Psychokino says the power to believe in yourself is the most important. Prove your confidence by defeating the Red Vubbe Fighter in Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002071
text: Report to Psychokino master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002072
text: Defeated Red Vubbe Fighter. Return and report to the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002073
text: Defeat Red Vubbe Fighter

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002074
text: Talk to the Linker Master at the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002075
text: Defeat the unusual Vubbe Fighter in East Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002076
text: The Linker Master wants to know how Mana is used. Show how it is used by defeating the Unusual Vubbe Fighter in East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002077
text: Report to the Linker Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002078
text: Defeated the unusual Vubbe Fighter in East Siauliai Woods. Return and report to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002079
text: Defeat the unusual Vubbe Fighter

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002081
text: The Thaumaturge Master says you need basic talent to receive enlightenment. Defeat the Salamander in Mage Tower 1F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002082
text: Report to the Thaumaturge Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002083
text: Defeated Salamander. Report to the Thaumaturge Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002084
text: Defeat Reaverpede in Remaining Tree Dale for the test of the Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002085
text: Report to the Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002086
text: You've succeeded in defeating Reaverpede. Report to the Elementalist Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002087
text: Meet the Sorcerer Master in Crystal Brook

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002088
text: Defeat Devilglove in Crystal Brook

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002089
text: The Sorcerer Master wants to check your skills. Defeat Devilglove in Crystal Brook to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002090
text: Report to the Sorcerer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002091
text: Defeated Devilglove. Report to the Sorcerer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002092
text: Talk with the Necromancer Master in Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002093
text: Collect the corpses of monsters in Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002094
text: Necromancer told you to bring the corpses of the monsters. Bring Blue Fisherman Bone, Lepusbunny's Guts, and Harpeia's Beak from Starving Demon's Way.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002095
text: Hand over the corpses to the Necromancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002096
text: You've collected some parts of the corpses. Return to Necromancer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002097
text: Obtain %s

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002098
text: Go to the Swordsman Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002099
text: Defeat Honeypin at Deep Indigo Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002100
text: The Swordsman Master is emphasizing the importance of training with actual fights. Defeat Honeypin at Deep Indigo Forest and accumulate the experiences.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002101
text: Defeated Honeypin. Report to the Swordsman Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002102
text: Go to the Peltasta Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002103
text: Defeat Gaigalas in Flowerless Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002104
text: The Peltasta Master wants you to prove your skills. Defeat Gaigalas in Flowerless Forest and prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002105
text: Defeated Gaigalas. Report to the Peltasta Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002106
text: Defeat Gaigalas

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002107
text: Find the Highlander Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002108
text: The Highlander Master wants you to accumulate more experiences. Defeat Honeypin at Deep Indigo Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002109
text: Defeated Honeypin. Report to the Highlander Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002110
text: The Hoplite Master possesses the skill which his colleagues can rely on. Defeat Colimencia in Layered Rock Forest to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002111
text: Defeated Colimencia. Report to the Hoplite Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002112
text: Go to the Barbarian Master in East Siauliai Woods

text: Meet the Barbarian Master at East Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002114
text: The Barbarian Master wants to make other people to respect him by defeating Poata that are known for attacking people. Defeat Poata in Layered Rock Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002115
text: Defeated Poata. Report to the Barbarian Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002116
text: Meet the Rodelero Master in Fedimian.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002117
text: The Rodelero Master wants to accumulate real experiences. Defeat Colimencia in Layered Rock Forest to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002118
text: Defeated Colimencia. Report to Rodeleo Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002119
text: Meet the Cataphract Master in High Crooked Road.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002120
text: The Cataphract Master told you that it is important to break anything that disturbes your way. Defeat Gaigalas in Flowerless Forest to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002121
text: Defeated Gaigalas. Report to the Cataphract Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002122
text: Go to the Squire Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002123
text: Defeat Poata and find the seal of family

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002124
text: The Squire Master has the symbol of the Legwyn family. Defeat Poata in Layered Rock Forest to find the symbol.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002125
text: Report to the Squire Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002126
text: Found the family's ornament. Report to the Squire Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002127
text: Acquire the ornament of the Legwyn Family

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002128
text: Talk to the Corsair Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002129
text: Meet the Squire Master in Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002130
text: Corsair Master wants you to prove your skills. Defeat Honeypin in Deep Indigo Forest to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002131
text: Report to the Corsair Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002132
text: Defeated Honeypin. Report to the Corsair Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002133
text: Talk to the Doppelsoeldner Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002134
text: Meet the Doppelsoeldner Master in Forgotten Port.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002135
text: The Doppelsoeldner Master wants you to prove your skills by defeating Gaigalas in Flowerless Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002136
text: Report to the Doppelsoeldner Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002137
text: Defeated Gaigalas. Report to the Doppelsoeldner Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002138
text: Talk to the Chronomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002139
text: Talk to the Chronomancer Master in High Crooked Road.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002140
text: Defeat Reaverpede in Remaining Tree Dale

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002141
text: For the test of the Chronomancer Master, defeat Reaverpede in Remaining Tree Dale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002142
text: Report to the Chronomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002143
text: Defeated Reaverpede. Report to Chronomancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002144
text: Meet the Wizard Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002145
text: Meet the Wizard Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002146
text: Defeat Ironbaum in East Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002147
text: The Wizard Master is unsatisfied with the situtaion. No one is fighting against the monsters up front. Go to East Siauliai Woods and defeat Ironbaum.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002148
text: Defeated Ironbaum. Return to the Wizard Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002149
text: Meet the Pyromancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002150
text: Meet the Pyromancer Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002151
text: The Pyromancer Master is not pleased with the Cryomancer Master who isn't doing anything when Klaipeda is under threat. Defeat Ironbaum in East Siauliai Woods and show him how it should be done.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002152
text: Defeated Ironbaum. Return to the Pyromancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002153
text: Meet the Cryomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002154
text: Meet the Cryomancer Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002155
text: The Cryomancer Master says other Masters are teasing him, he wants you to take care of it. Defeat Ironbaum in East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002156
text: Defeated Ironbaum. Return to the Cryomancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002157
text: Meet the Psychokino Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002158
text: Meet the Psychokino Master at the Miners' Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002159
text: Defeat the Werewolf at the Miners' Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002160
text: The Psychokino Master is busy but doesn't want to pass on the chance of defeating the Werewolf to the Linker Master. Defeat the Werewolf in Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002161
text: Defeated the Werewolf. Return and report to the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002162
text: Meet the Linker Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002163
text: Meet the Linker Master in Siauliai Miners' Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002164
text: Defeat Werewolf in Siauliai Miners' Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002165
text: The Linker Master wants a Linker apprentice to defeat the Werewolf and show the Psychokino Master who's the boss. Defeat the Werewolf at the Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002166
text: Defeated the Werewolf. Return and report to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002167
text: Meet the Thaumaturge Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002168
text: Meet the Thaumaturge Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002169
text: Defeat Netherbovine at Faultline

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002170
text: The Thaumaturge Master told you that all the Masters are working toghther to defeat the monsters that are making mess so if you want to be a Thaumaturge, you should participate as well. Defeat Netherbovine that are making mess in Faultline.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002171
text: Defeated Netherbovine. Return and report to the Thaumaturge Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002172
text: Meet the Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002173
text: Meet the Elementalist Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002174
text: Defeat Netherbovine in Faultline

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002175
text: The masters in Fedimian are chasing after the monsters that are disappearing after making a mess. As an applicant of the Elementalist, defeat Netherbovine that appeared in Faultline.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002176
text: You've succeeded in defeating Reaverpede. Report to the Elementalist Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002177
text: Meet the Sorcerer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002178
text: Meet the Sorcerer Master in Crystal Brook

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002179
text: The Sorcerer Master says you can't just stay in peace when the demons are roaming around. Go to the Goddess' Ancient Garden and defeat the Necroventer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002180
text: Defeated Necroventer. Return and report to the Sorcerer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002181
text: Meet the Chronomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002182
text: Meet the Chronomancer Master in High Crooked Road

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002183
text: The Chronomancer Master is suspicous of your abilities. Defeat the Necroventer in Goddess' Ancient Garden to prove yourself.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002184
text: Defeated Necroventer. Return and report to the Chronomancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002185
text: Meet Vaidotas

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002186
text: Find Vaidotas in Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002187
text: Vaidotas says learning is not difficult but you have to be qualified for it. Defeat the Werewolf in the Miners' Village to prove yourself.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002188
text: Report to Vaidotas

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002189
text: You've defeated the Werewolf. Report back to Vaidotas.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002190
text: Talk to the Quarrel Shooter Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002191
text: Find the lens in Crystal Mine 1F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002192
text: The Quarrel Shooter says he's been looking through the telescope in the Astral Tower and he found clues to the lens. Go to Crystal Mine 1F and look for the lens.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002193
text: Found the lens. Give it to the Quarrel Shooter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002194
text: Defeat Shadowgaler and get %s

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002195
text: Go to the Ranger Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002196
text: Collect Bat Venom Sample

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002197
text: The Ranger Master mentioned an assassin named Evonipon and wants the venom sample he used. Collect samples of venoms from the bats in Crystal Mine 1F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002198
text: Colleted all the poison samples needed. Take it to the Ranger Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150317_002199
text: Defeat the bats and get %s

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002200
text: The leather of Glizardon and the canine of Galok in Tenet Church B1.{nl}And black powders of Egnome from the 2F. Please bring those to me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002201
text: Psychokino. I will guarantee that it is a really nice field.{nl}But, if you could help my investigation

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002202
text: Please collect the flower alcohol from Doyors at Veja Ravine.{nl}They break easily so it will be hard to get decent ones.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002203
text: Good. The flower alcohol is intact.{nl}You will learn from me how great this is.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002204
text: Good. Before the test, I need some ingredients.{nl}Please bring me the core of Corylus and the blood of Galok in Tenet Church 1F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002205
text: I will start the test. {nl}There is a gap of the two dimensional world in Tenet Church 1F.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002206
text: Not yet?{nl}Move to Tenet Church 1F and go straight to the marked place on the map.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002207
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master must have the next book.{nl}He was looking for the tough leather of Glizardon before, so maybe you can try dealing with him with that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002208
text: The tough leather of Glizardon from the Hunter Master has not arrived yet?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002209
text: The Glizardons are Tenet Church B1. The Quarrel Shooter Master is in Klaipeda.{nl}Other person may go first for it so please hurry.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002210
text: Ah, You came at the right moment.{nl}If you can get me the tough leather of Glizardon from the Quarrel Shooter Master, I will make a copy of the next book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002211
text: The tough leather of Glizardon from the Archer Master has not arrived yet?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002212
text: The Glizardons can be seen in Tenet Church B1.{nl}Take the leather off from it and take it to the Quarrel Shooter Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002213
text: You came at the right moment. {nl}If the Quarrel Shooter Master could get me the tough leather of Glizardon, I'll make you a copy of the next book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002214
text: Didn't the Ranger Master tell you anything?{nl}I requested the tough leather of Glizardon from him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002215
text: The Glizardons are in Tenet Church B1. The Quarrel Shooter Master is in Klaipeda.{nl}You should hurry before someone takes the book first...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002216
text: Please support us with the 5 tree skins as compensation for our help.{nl}Tipios at Veja Ravine will be enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002217
text: Peltastas once received help from the Highlander Master before.{nl}If you want to be a member of Peltastas, you should commence the duty to compensate for the help.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002218
text: The Peltasta Master sent these? That's very thankful.{nl}Tell him that I will use them usefully.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002219
text: It's good to hear that the Highlander Master liked it.{nl}As I promised to you, I will let you learn the lessons of Peltasta.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002220
text: I heard that the Highlander Master is looking for the toe nails of Beetow.{nl}I think this duty will be adequate for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002221
text: Go to Tenet Garden and put this pot on the ground.{nl}If you could defeat monsters after that, the energies will be accumulated in the pot.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002222
text: If that's the case, fight against Beetow at Veja Ravine.{nl}You will realize something from it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002223
text: First, please bring Glizardon's bone from the 1st basement and Galok's hair from the 1st floor of Tenet Church.{nl}And also bring me the fragments of Egnome from the 2nd floor. Okay then I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002224
text: Reality changes as I wish. And it becomes possible just by thinking!{nl}That's called super natural power.{nl}The amount of the power depends on how one belives in his power...{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002225
text: Okay, so you want to be a Psychokino?{nl}If you could help my work a bit, I will help you find your hidden abilities.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002226
text: Please bring me the essences of Minotaur and Chapparition from Gate Route.{nl}Okay... I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002227
text: Okay. This is it. I can tell it's full of demonic power by just looking at its color.{nl}I will teach you what the real Psychokino is from now on so you should get ready!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002228
text: My old colleague who went to Sirdgela Forest told me that he saw a strange looking map.{nl}I am sure that it is the map we are looking for.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002229
text: I heard Minotaur has it somewhere in the Sirdgela Forest.{nl}That monster is not easy so you should be prepared a lot.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002230
text: Evoniphon...{nl}The Ranger Master still seems to have some regret.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002231
text: I saw the Elementalist Master talking to a man wearing a hood.{nl}I can't say for sure if that's him, but I can never forget the fragrance.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002232
text: After talking to the Elementalist, he disappeared into darkness.{nl}You better go and talk to him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002233
text: I told him that it would be obtainable in Sirdgela Forest.{nl}That's the place where even the famous the Rodelero Master's search team ran away from.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002234
text: I am looking for a trace of a man. His name is Evoniphon.{nl}I heard the Sadhu Master at Akmens Ridge has his information so go there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002235
text: It's not a huge task. I want you to help my experiment...{nl}First, please bring me Burnable Juice of Tontulia from Zachariel Crossroads.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002236
text: In fact, Tonturia is nothing, but the fact that there are lots of other monsters nearby is more dangerous.{nl}Hmm... Good luck!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002237
text: My father is a merchant who comes to Fedimian often.{nl}But after he went into Sirdgela Forest do some transaction, he never returned.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002238
text: I heard a soldier at Fedimian saw the luggage of a merchant in Sirdgela Forest.{nl}The only one I can trust right now is you. Please... I am counting on you!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002239
text: This is the symbol that I engraved on my father's sleeve...{nl}This is so precious to me... Thank you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002240
text: Just put this pot on Ramstis Ridge.{nl}The problem is Chapparition there... You would be able to defeat it easily.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002241
text: Please bring me Hogma Shamans and Canines of Guards at Plateau of Rex.{nl}It won't be hard or you.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002242
text: I like your determination.{nl}Please defeat Sparnasman at Vieta Gorge to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002243
text: Cataphract is a warrior who stands in front of anyone and fight.{nl}If there are barriers in the way, just penetrate into them.{nl}I came with a good idea.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002244
text: I heard monsters called Biteregina are attacking tourists in Manacle Grave.{nl}I will acknowledge your skill if you could defeat those monsters.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002245
text: Contratulations for passing the test.{nl}My lessons are strict so I hope you follow well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002246
text: Sparnasman at Vieta Gorge is said to be threatening people.{nl}He will not be an easy opponent, but he will be enough to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002247
text: The most important attribute Peltasta considers valuable is courage.{nl}Since Peltasta shouldn't avoid enemies' attacks and block them with their shields.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002248
text: Before you learn lessons from me, you should show me how brave you are.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002249
text: Defeat Chapparition in Ramstis Ridge.{nl}That bleakness will be appropriate to test your guts.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002250
text: Don't worry since I will adjust the level of dueling to your level.{nl}Okay, then I will begin!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002251
text: I will show you any weapon such as a bow or a gun. Come on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002252
text: As I was transferring the research materials that I discovered before, a few of them flew away due to the wind.{nl}They are at Ramstis Ridge, but I don't have the time to find them. I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002253
text: You found them sooner than I expected.{nl}Good, I will help you use your abilities as a Thaumaturge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002254
text: Please get me the blood of the Hogma Shaman and the Hogma Scout from King's Plateau,{nl}and lastly, the blood of the Hogma Captain from Zachariel Crossroads.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002255
text: Sparnasman at Vieta Gorge would fit your reputation...{nl}Show it what the true power of serving the goddess is like.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002256
text: How many times has this happened already?{nl}I am sorry but please go meet Fletcher Master to find out what happened.{nl}Go to Escanciu Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002257
text: That dumb assistant captain took all of them and ran away to Poslinkis Forest.{nl}Maybe the monsters have them, I hope so.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002258
text: There are fishing rods which Red Fishermen are carrying at Saknis Plains.{nl}When you knock on them, a whistling sound will come out. Please bring me those.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002259
text: Although you learned lessons from me, I don't know if you could use all of them.{nl}I will give you an assignment. Hunt for various monsters.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002260
text: Bushspiders from Kateen Forest Entrance, Ellomagos from Owl Burial Ground, and green Pokubons from Poslinkis Forest.{nl}Of course, I will give you some baits.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002261
text: If you dream of reaching a higher stage as a Wugushi, there's an assignment I will give to you.{nl}Collect special poisons from Bites at Saknis Plains.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002262
text: There are needles with the ointment on them that I crafted in this pot.{nl}When you hit Bites with these, you would be able to collect poisons.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002263
text: It is your assignment to hunt for hidden monsters.{nl}The location is Saknis Plains. {nl}If you want to be a Scout, you should do it. Dont you think so?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002264
text: If you want to learn anything from me, your feet have to be quick.{nl}Surpass 5 monsters using Smoke Bombs at the entrance of Kateen Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002265
text: You want to learn from me. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002266
text: If that's the case, I want you to make a bet with the Hackapell Master on behalf of me.{nl}He thinks there is something in the world that can't be penetrated.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002267
text: If he asks you, I will tell him that our competent Hoplite defeated it.{nl}I will now acknowledge your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002268
text: I heard that the other masters sent the disciples to defeat Yekub at Owl Burial Ground.{nl}But that's the task you should complete. Go there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002269
text: Leadership needs to be supported by the faith of the colleagues and the accumulated experiences.{nl}I will first have to find out if you are competent enough to command other people.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002270
text: When you go to the Greene Manor, you can meet Colimencia.{nl}You are worthy to be a Centurion if you can defeat it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002271
text: This is the rope to tie people up.{nl}Practice with it enough at Poslinkis Forest so you are able to manage it well.{nl}Let's talk about my lesson after that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002272
text: Biteregina are threatening people at Owls' Village.{nl}What do you think? I want you defeat them as compensation for my lessons.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002273
text: Carrying the title of 'Master', I should help others around, but I just don't have the time.{nl}Anyways, I will teach you my skills as I promised to you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002274
text: If you tell me like that, I can tell you there is a solution.{nl}If you could defeat Moas at Fedimian Suburbs, who destroyed all my ingredients, I will change your turn.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002275
text: I heard the Hackapell Master is going to defeat the Shadowgaler at the Owl Burial Ground...{nl}It will be good for him to see you defeat it first.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002276
text: A skilled person like you could defeat Reaverpede at Roxona Marketplace easily.{nl}If you can't do this, I can't accept you as a Ranger applicant.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002277
text: Some idiot baron opened a portal that was connected to the Demon Prison.{nl}I heard that the demons there keep trying to come out.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002278
text: Defeat Deadborn which is the most dangerous demon there.{nl}It will be a good hunt, don't you think?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002279
text: You want to learn my skills?{nl}If you could bring me burnable woods from Jonna Jolems at Aqueduct Bridge Area, I will think about it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002280
text: Do you know this?{nl}I heard that Rajatoad at the 1st zone of Demon Prison possess dangerous poison.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002281
text: We increase our level of immunity by controlling many different types of poisons.{nl}If you could survive from that poison, I will teach you how to control poison well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002282
text: You want to become a Schwarzer Reiter?{nl}It is very easy to learn how to control guns.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002283
text: But, it becomes a totally different story if you want to keep aiming at the enemy rushing in.{nl}I mean courage. Why don't we check it out?{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002284
text: Demon Prison, I heard some dumb landlord opened the portal to the place that is full of monsters.{nl}Hunt for Deadborn there, it will be very fun.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002285
text: Very nice. I feel like I am seeing myself in the past.{nl}Since you are Schwarzer Reiter now, we can be mirrors to each other from now on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002286
text: I heard that Minotaur have shown up at Roxona Marketplace.{nl}Please bring me the proof of its death.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002287
text: It seems like the number of demons are constantly increasing.{nl}I heard other masters are also having some troubles.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002288
text: The number of Blue Puragis at Saknis Plains has increased a lot recently and threatening villagers there.{nl}If you want to reach a higher level as a true Sahdu, show your abilities there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002289
text: Mothstem? I saw it from Fedimian Suburbs. {nl}the Pardoner Master was also looking for it. I guess he hasn't found it yet.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002290
text: Instead of introducing yourself in words, it will be way better to show your abilities.{nl}My assignment for you is to defeat Reaverpede at Escanciu village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002291
text: Reaverpede at Escanciu Village would fit your reputation.{nl}I heard your name enough already, but I should see for myself.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002292
text: I left a nice gift at the lower side for my future disciple.{nl}I hope you like the gift.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002293
text: What present?{nl}What do you think will be the most precious gift for Necromancer?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002294
text: If you want to learn my magic, I should first know how competent you are.{nl}Reaverpede at Escanciu Village would fit your reputation.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002295
text: Oh, such great courage.{nl}If you could defeat Netherbovine from Poslinkis Forest, I will help you advance.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002296
text: All the masters around here are chasing after the monsters.{nl}You should defeat the monsters quicker than anybody to learn my magic's.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002297
text: It is called Netherbovine.{nl}According to a reliable source, it recently appeared at Poslinkis Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002298
text: There are more wounded people, but the amount of herbs we have is lacking.{nl}Please collect Wildflower Alcohol from Roxona Marketplace for them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002299
text: There's a monster called Colimencia at Grynas Hills.{nl}It is a threatening monster, but you should defeat it easily.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002300
text: The Poata at Grynas Hills is well known for attacking people.{nl}If you could defeat it, then that will be enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002301
text: If you want to learn from me, you should first show your skills to me.{nl}Colimencia at the Greene Manor would fit your reputation.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002302
text: If you want to become a true Cataphract, then you should be able to defeat Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm.{nl}Understood? Now, hurry up.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002303
text: This... It must be the symbol of the Legwyn family.{nl}Thank you. As I promised, I will help you to reach to a higher level.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002304
text: You must first show your abilities before you start to learn from me. That's the manner.{nl}I think Honeypin at Tenants' Farm would be enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002305
text: If you want to learn something from me, then come back after defeating Gaigalas in Tenants' Farm.{nl}If you want to be acknowledged in terms of both your determination and your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002306
text: I will be able to check your skills if you could defeat Gaigalas at Grynas Training Camp.{nl}Good luck.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002307
text: Okay then... I think I can test your skills with this.{nl}I heard there's a person who saw Poata at the Greene Manor swallowing the symbol.{nl}Okay then, I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002308
text: I am sorry, but the way of Bokor can't be searched by just anyone.{nl}If you can bring me the essence of Stone Whale at Roxona Market, I will acknowledge your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002309
text: The Stone Whale at Roxona Market has killed many people.{nl}I need the essence with the hatred from the people who were killed.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002310
text: It is important for Sadhu to understand others' pains.{nl}Understanding their minds will be the source to increase the power of the Sadhu.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002311
text: I mean we should defeat the monsters that hurt other people.{nl}From what I heard, Colimencia is creating a chaos at the Greene Manor.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002312
text: Please forgive me for being too picky since this task is being done in the name of Paladin.{nl}Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm would fit your name.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002313
text: If you want to reach a higher level of a Monk, show me your determination that you can endure a strict training.{nl}Bring me proof that you have defeated Netherbovine at Poslinkis Forest and I will then acknowledge your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002314
text: Our training is very strict.{nl}You would be able to follow our training if you could defeat Netherbovine at Poslinkis Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002315
text: There's a something that you should do instead of an entrance test to become a Pardoner.{nl}Retrieve the money of the lost indulgence at the region near Aqueduct Bridge Area. You can do it right?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002316
text: I heard it was lost in the region near Aqueduct Bridge Area, so please find it from Aqueduct Bridge Area.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002317
text: Ask what you should do

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002318
text: I am not responsible to do it

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002319
text: The Silent Investigator [Ranger Advancement] (1)

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002320
text: The Silent Investigator [Ranger Advancement] (2)

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002321
text: Notice/Please put the pot of the sun at the area where Chapparition was positioned!#8

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002322
text: The Way to Become A Wizard [Elementalist]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002323
text: Tell him you would challenge for it

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002324
text: Tell him its too dangerous

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002325
text: I will bring burnable woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002326
text: The Task of Gaining the Mind [Sadhu]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002327
text: Ask what to do

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002328
text: Tell him it won't be helpful

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002329
text: An Important Test [Elementalist]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002330
text: Decline since it seems too dangerous

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002331
text: Ask what the gift is

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002332
text: Completing the Elementalist's Mission [Elementalist Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002333
text: Defeat %s

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002334
text: To prove your determination to be stronger, please collect Glizardon's Leather in Tenet Church B1, Galok's Canine in 1F, and Black Powders from Egnome in 2F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002335
text: Collect the flower alcohol of Doyor from Veja Ravine

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002336
text: Psychokino offered you to become his assistant if you are interested in this kind of field. Obtain flower alcohol of Doyor from Veja Ravine which the Psychokino Master is interested in.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002337
text: You have obtained enough flower alcohol of Doyor from Veja Ravine. Return to the Psychokino Master and hand him the alcohol.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002338
text: Flower Alcohol of Doyor

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002339
text: The Linker Master is emphasizing on the importance of the ability to open one's mind as a linker. To test the competency of a Linker, please obtain Corylus Core and Galok Blood in Tenet Church 1F.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002340
text: Corylus Core

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002341
text: Galok Blood

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002342
text: Collect the touch leather of Glizardon

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002343
text: The Hunter Master told the Quarrel Shooter Master that they could engage in an exchange with Glizardon's tough leather for the book. Obtain Glizardon's tough leather in Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002344
text: Hand over Glizardon's tough leather to Quarrel Shooter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002345
text: You have obtained enough Glizardon's tough leather which Quarrel Shooter Master was looking for. Hand over Glizardon's tough leather to Quarrel Shooter Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002346
text: The Archer Master told the Quarrel Shooter Master that they could engage in an exchange with Glizardon's tough leather for the book. Obtain Glizardon's tough leather in Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002347
text: The Ranger Master told the Quarrel Shooter Master that they could engage in an exchange with Glizardon's tough leather for the book. Obtain Glizardon's tough leather in Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002348
text: Meet Sculptor Tesla at West Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002349
text: Obtain the coarse tree barks from Tipios in Grass Riverside

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002350
text: As a compensation for getting support from the Peltasta Master in Klaipeda, obtain 5 Tipio's tree barks and give them to him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002351
text: Cobalt Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002352
text: Hand them over to the Peltasta Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002353
text: You have obtained the tree barks to make the shield. With these, go meet the Peltasta Master to request support.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002354
text: Collect %s from Tipios in Grass Riverside

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002355
text: Collect Beetow toe nails from Veja Ravine

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002356
text: The Peltasta Master wants to compensate for the Highlander Master's help. Collect the toe nails of Beetow from Veja Ravine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002357
text: Hand them over to the Highlander Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002358
text: You have obtained the toe nails of Beetow. Hand them over to the Highlander Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002359
text: The toe nails of Beetow

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002360
text: You have completed the mission. Return to the Peltasta Master and report.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002361
text: Collect the energies of fire by placing a pot of fire nearby monsters at Tenet Garden.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002362
text: Defeat Beetow at Veja Ravine

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002363
text: The Swordsman Master wants to realize something. Defeat Beetow in Septyni Glen and learn what the Swordsman Master told you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002364
text: Defeat Beetow

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002365
text: Please obtain Glizardon's Bone from Tenet Church B1, Galok's Hair in 1F, and the fragments of Egnome in 2F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002366
text: Collect the Demon Essences at Gate Route

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002367
text: Psychokino told you that he will help you release a supernatural power, but he wants the essence of demons as a reward. Defeat Minotaur and Chapparition at Gate Route and obtain the Demon Essences.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002368
text: Find the map at Sirdgela Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002369
text: The Sapper Master heard that a strange looking map was discovered in Sirdgela Forest. Go to Sirdgela Forest and look for the map.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002370
text: Meet the Sadhu Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002371
text: The Ranger Master told you to find the traces of Evoniphon. Listen to the information about Evoniphon from the Sadhu Master at Akmens Ridge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002372
text: Talk to the Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002373
text: The Sadhu Master told you that he saw a man who seemed to be Evoniphon talking to the Elementalist Master. Meet the Elementalist Master and listen to the information about Evoniphon.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002374
text: The Elementalist Master remembers the man with the strange fragrance. Talk to the Elementalist Master about the whereabout of that man.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002375
text: Look for the traces of Evoniphon at Sirdgela Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002376
text: The Elementalist Master remembers the man with the strange fragrance. Talk to the Elementalist Master about the whereabout of that man.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002377
text: You only could find some pieces of clothes of Evoniphon in Sirdgela Forest. Return to the Ranger Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002378
text: Burnable Juice of Tontulia

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002379
text: The Sapper Master told you that he will help you becoming a Sapper if you could help him with his experiment. Collect burnable juice from Tonturia at Zachariel Crossroads first.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002380
text: Hand them over to the Sapper Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002381
text: You have collected all the Burnable Juice of Tontulia. Hand them over to the Sapper Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002382
text: Meet the Sculptor Tesla at the West Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002383
text: Look for the father of the Equipment Merchant at Sirdgela Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002384
text: The Equipment Merchant requested you to look for the traces of his father as a compensation for the cat food that will lure cats. Look for the father of the Equipment Merchant at Sirdgela Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002385
text: Look for the Pyromancer Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002386
text: Put the pot of the sun at Ramstis Ridge

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002387
text: The Pyromancer Master requested you something in return for teaching his magic. Put the pot of the sun at Ramstis Ridge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002388
text: Pyromancer asked you to do something for her as a reward for teaching her magic. Put the pot of the sun at Ramstis Ridge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002389
text: Please get Hogma Shaman at the King's Plateau and the canine of the guard which are the ingredients that the Cryomancer wants.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002390
text: Defeat Sparnasman at Vieta Gorge

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002391
text: The Highlander Master wants you to show yourself that you are qualified. Prove yourself that you are qualified by defeating Sparnasman at Vieta Gorge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002392
text: Defeat Chapparition at Ramstis Ridge

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002393
text: The Peltasta Master told you that you should possess the courage in order to handle the shield. Defeat Chapparition at Ramstis Ridge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002394
text: Talk to the Sadhu Master at Akmens Ridge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002395
text: Get a win from the Sadhu Master from dueling.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002396
text: Talk to the Wugushi Master at Tiltas Valley.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002397
text: The Wugushi Master told you that the one who survives at the end is the true winner even if he uses tricks. Duel against the Wugushi Master at Tiltas Valley.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002398
text: Talk to the Rodelero Master at the Gateway of the Great King.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002399
text: Talk to the Thaumaturge Master at Overlong Bridge Valley.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002400
text: Obtain the magic research materials at Ramstis Ridge

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002401
text: The Thaumaturge Master told you that if you could help him, he will help you to become Thaumaturge. Collct the lost magic research materials at Ramstis Ridge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002402
text: Talk to the Elementalist Master at Akmens Ridge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002403
text: Complete the assignments of the Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002404
text: Obtain Hogma Shaman, the blood of Hogma Scout from the King's Plateau and the blood of Hogma Captain at Zachariel Crossroads.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002405
text: Hand over the assignments to the Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002406
text: You have successfully completed the assignements of the Elementalist Master. Give him the ingredients that were in the assignments.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002407
text: Talk to the Scout Master at Overlong Bridge Valley.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002408
text: Talk to the Paladin Master at Nefritas Cliffs.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002409
text: The Paladin Master told you that it is important that you act with justice and faith in the name of the goddess. Defeat Sparnasman at Vieta Gorge and prove your religious belief.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002410
text: Talk to the Cataphract Master at Overlong Bridge Valley.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002411
text: Defeat Sparnasman at Vieta Gorge to prove your skills to the Cataphract Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002412
text: Something wrong happened to the Fletcher Master whom the Highlander Master requested to. Find the Fletcher Master at Escanciu Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002413
text: Defeat Moas at Fedimian Suburbs

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002414
text: The Fletcher Master told you that if you could defeat Moas who broke the ingredients, he will change the turns. Defeat Moa at Fedimian Suburbs that are attacking the merchants.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002415
text: Meet the Corsair Master at Akmens Ridge

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002416
text: Retrieve the items stolen from the Corsair Master in the Poslinkis Forest. The Dock Permit can be found by defeating High Vubbes, the Navigator's Chart by defeating High Vubbe Archers and the Contract can be found by defeating Green Pokuborns.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002417
text: Meet the Rodelero Master at the Gateway of the Great King

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002418
text: Find the Fletcher Master at Escanciu Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002419
text: The Archer Master told you that if you could do him a favor, he will give you a lesson. As the Archer Master requested, go find the Fletcher Master at Escanciu Village and check what has happened to him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002420
text: Defeat Biteregina at the Owl Burial Ground.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002421
text: The Sapper Master told you to defeat Biteregina threatening the people at the Owl Burial Ground.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002422
text: Find the Fletcher Master at Escanciu Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002423
text: Get the Red Fisherman Rod in Saknis Plains and take only the woods with whistling sound.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002424
text: Hunt for 3 kinds of monsters using baits

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002425
text: The Hunter Master gave you the assignments for monsters that are scattered throughout various regions.{nl}Use bait to hunt for Bushspider at the entrace of Kateen Forest, Ellomago at the Owl Burial Ground, and green Pokuborns at Poslinkis Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002426
text: Bushspiders at the entrance of Kateen Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002427
text: Ellomagos at the Owl Burial Ground

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002428
text: Green Pokuborns at Poslinkis Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002429
text: Go look for the Wugushi Master at Tiltas Valley.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002430
text: Collect the synthesized poison from Bites

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002431
text: The Wugushi Master gave you an assignment to collect poison. Collect the synthesized poison from Bites at Saknis Plains using the simplified tube.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002432
text: Obtain %s from Bites

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002433
text: Meet the Scout Master at Overlong Bridge Valley.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002434
text: Find the hidden monsters using flash bombs and defeat them

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002435
text: Find the hidden monsters at Saknis Plains using flash bombs and defeat them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002436
text: Defeat the detected monsters

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002437
text: The Rogue Master told you that you need to take a test before she can teach you her skills. At the training field of the entrance of Kateen Forest, use smoke bombs on the monsters that are rushing in and defeat them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002438
text: Defeat Shadowgaler at the Owl Burial Ground

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002439
text: The Hoplite Master told you that before you learn a lesson, he wants you to defeat Shadowgaler first before the Hackapell Master defeates them. As she requested, defeat Shadowgaler at the Owl Burial Ground and come back.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002440
text: Defeat Yekub at Owl Burial Ground

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002441
text: The Barbarian Master wants you to defeat the Yekub faster than anyone else. Defeat Yekub at Owl Burial Ground.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002442
text: The Squire Master told you that you should continuously practice until the skill becomes yours. Practice the skill against the monsters at Poslinkis Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002443
text: Defeat Colimencia

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002444
text: The Centurion Master told you that you should possess the skills to command other people. Defeat Colimencia and prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002445
text: Defeat Reaverpede at Roxona Marketplace

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002446
text: The Ranger Master feels doubts on his job and he wants to do something helpful like other Masters. Defeat Reaverpede at Roxona Marketplace.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002447
text: Defeat Minotaur at Roxona Marketplace

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002448
text: The Hunter Master told you that a Minotaur has appeared and you should possess the skills to defeat that monsters if you are a true Hunter. Defeat the Minotaur at Roxona Marketplace and bring its gigantic canine as proof.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002449
text: The Wugushi Master at Tiltas Valley is looking for you

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002450
text: Defeat Rajatoad at the 1st zone of the Demon Prison

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002451
text: The Wugushi Master is talking about the blood's immunity. Defeat Rajatoad at the 1st zone of the Demon Prison and return to the Wugushi Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002452
text: The Scout Master at Overlong Bridge Valley is waiting for you

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002453
text: Defeat Deadborn at the 1st zone of the Demon Prison

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002454
text: The Scout Master told you that you need to be skillful in order to receive the lesson. Defeat Deadborn at the 1st zone of the Demon Prison and return to the Scout Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002455
text: The Fletcher Master of Escanciu Village is looking for you

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002456
text: Collect the burnable wood coals

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002457
text: The Fletcher Master told you that if you could bring him some burnable wood coals, he will accept you as his disciple, but it seems that he's not telling the truth. Defeat Jonna Jolems at Aqueduct Bridge Area and collect burnable wood coals.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002458
text: Acquired burnable wood coals. Give them to the Fletcher Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002459
text: The Schwarzer Reiter Master at Awating Stone Bridge is looking for you

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002460
text: Schwarzer Reiter told you that you need to have the courage to face against enemy til the end. Defeat Deadborn at the 1st zone of the Demon Prison and go back to Schwarzer Reiter.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002461
text: Report to the Schwarzer Reiter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002462
text: You succeeded in defeating Deadborn. Talk to the Schwarzer Reiter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002463
text: Obtain the alcohol of wild flowers at Roxona Marketplace

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002464
text: The Cleric Master told you that he ran out of herbs so he wants you to bring the alcohol of wild flowers. Get it from Roxona Marketplace and bring it to the Cleric Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002465
text: Obtain the Essence of Stone Whale at Roxona Marketplace

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002466
text: The Bokor Master will test you to see if you could obtain the Essence of Stone Whale. Defeat the Stone Whale at Roxona Marketplace and bring him the Essence of Stone Whale.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002467
text: Find the Sculptor Tesla at Vieta Gorge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002468
text: Find the Sadhu Master at Akmens Ridge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002469
text: The Sadhu Master wants you to defeat Colimencia that cause harm to people.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002470
text: You completed the request of the Sadhu Master. Return and talk to him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002471
text: Find the Paladin Master at Nefritas Cliff.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002472
text: Defeat Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002473
text: The Paladin Master wants to check your religious belief. Defeat Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002474
text: You defeated Gaigalas. Return to the Paladin Master and report.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002475
text: Find the Monk Master at Escanciu Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002476
text: Get the sharp canines of Netherbovine in Poslinkis Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002477
text: The Monk Master told you to bring the proof of the will to become a Monk. Defeat Netherbovine at Poslinkis Forest an obtain the Canine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002478
text: Acquired the Canine of Netherbovine. Take it to the Monk Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002479
text: Meet the Pardoner Master at Fedimian Suburbs.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002480
text: The Pardoner Master wants you to retrieve the money of the lost indulgence for the assignment. Retrieve the lost money at the region near Aqueduct Bridge Area.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002481
text: Defeat Yonazolem that suddenly appeared

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002482
text: The Oracle Master is looking for you at Awaiting Stone Bridge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002483
text: Obtain Pawndel's Soul Essence and Pawnd's Soul Essence in Tenet Church 1F.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002484
text: You can make a Bokor Doll by pressing the S key.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002485
text: Talk to the Sculptor Tesla at West Siauliai Woods

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002486
text: Talk to the Sadhu Master at Akmens Ridge

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002487
text: Defeat Blue Puragi at Saknis Plains

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002488
text: The Sadhu Master told you to defeat the monsters that threaten villagers. Defeat Blue Puragis at Saknis Plains.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002489
text: You've defeated all Blue Puragis that threaten villagers. Return to the Sadhu Master and report.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002490
text: Defeat Blue Puragis

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002491
text: Talk to the Monk Master at Escanciu Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002492
text: The Equipment Merchant of Fedimian once saw a Mostem at Fedimian Suburbs. Go to Fedimian Suburbs and obtain the pots in flames by defeating Mostems.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002493
text: Obtain the hardened oil at Saknis Plains

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002494
text: The Equipment Merchant wants the hardened oil as a reward for the information. Obtain the hardened oil from Puragis at Saknis Plains and take them to the Equipment Merchant.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002495
text: Get rid of the danger at the Owl Burial Ground

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002496
text: You need to show your skills to the Cataphract Master. Defeat Biteregina at the Owl Burial Ground that threatens people.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002497
text: Defeat Reaverpede at Escanciu Village for the test of the Elementalist Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002498
text: Report to the Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002499
text: You successfully defeated Reaverpede. Report to the Elementalist Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002500
text: Defeat Devilglove at Fedimian Suburbs

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002501
text: Find the gift of the Necromancer Master at Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002502
text: Collect Blue Pawndel's Bone, Internal Organ of Black Pawnd and Beak of Harpia from Starving Demon's Way.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002503
text: Report about the gifts to the Necromancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002504
text: You have found all the gifts of the Necromancer Master. Return to the Necromancer Master and report.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002505
text: Defeat Honeypin at the way of Grynas Trails

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002506
text: The Swordsman Master is emphasizing on the trainings that are like real battles. Experience a real battle by defeating Honeypin at the way of Grynas Trails.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002507
text: Defeat Gaigalas at Grynas Training Camp

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002508
text: The Peltasta Master wants you to prove your skills. Prove your skills by defeating Gaigalas at the Grynas Training Camp.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002509
text: The Highlander Master wants you to experience more. Defeat Honeypin at the way of Grynas Trails.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002510
text: Defeat Colimencia at Grynas Hills

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002511
text: The Hoplite Master wants you to be skillful, so that colleagues can rely on your skills. Defeat Colimencia at Grynas Hills to prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002512
text: Defeat Poata at Grynas Hills

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002513
text: The Barbarian Master wants people not to ignore him by defeating Poata who is well known for attacking people. Defeat Poata at Grynas Hills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002514
text: Meet the Rodelero Master at the Gateway of the Great King

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002515
text: The Rodelero Master wants real experiences. Defeat Colimencia and prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002516
text: Meet the Cataphract Master at Overlong Bridge Valley.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002517
text: The Cataphract Master told you that you should overcome any difficulties. Prove your skills by defeating Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002518
text: The Squire Master is looking for the ornament of the Legwyn family. Defeat Poata at Greene Manor and retrieve the ornament.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002519
text: Find the Corsair Master at Akmens Ridge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002520
text: Defeat Honeypin at Tenants' Farm

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002521
text: The Corsair Master is telling you to prove your skills. Defeat Honeypin at Tenants' Farm and prove your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002522
text: Meet the Doppelsoeldner Master at Paupys Crossing.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002523
text: The Doppelsoeldner Master wants you to prove your skills by defeating Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002524
text: Defeat Reaverpede at Escanciu Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002525
text: Defeat Reaverpede of Escanciu Village to take the test of the Chronomancer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002526
text: Meet the Thaumaturge Master at Overlong Bridge Valley.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002527
text: Defeat Netherbovine at Poslinkis Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002528
text: The Thaumaturge Master told you that all the Masters are collaborating to defeat monsters so if you want to become a Thaumaturge, you should participate. Defeat Netherbovine at Poslinkis Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002529
text: Meet the Elementalist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002530
text: Meet the Elementalist Master at Akmens Ridge

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002531
text: Defeat Netherbovine at Poslinkis Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002532
text: The Masters at Akmens Ridge are after the monsters that are running away. As an applicant to become an Elementalist, defeat Netherbovine which appeared at Poslinkis Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002533
text: You have succeeded in defeating Netherbovine. Report to the Elementalist Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002534
text: Meet the Sorcerer Master at Fedimian Suburbs

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150323_002535
text: Meet the Chronomancer Master in Stele Road

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150401_002536
text: For my future disciple, I have prepared a nice gift at Starving Demon's Way.{nl}I hope you like it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150401_002537
text: Meet the Sorcerer Master at Fedimian Suburbs.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150401_002538
text: The Sorcerer Master wants to test your skills. Prove your skills by defeating Devilglove at Fedimian Suburbs.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150401_002539
text: Talk to the Necromancer Master at Mullers Passage

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150401_002540
text: Find the gift of the Necromancer Master at Starving Demon's Way

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150401_002541
text: Bring Blue Pawndel's Bone, Black Pawnd's Entrails and Harpeia's Beak, which the Necromancer Master has prepared at Starving Demon's Way.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150401_002542
text: Meet the Doppelsoeldner Master at Fedimian.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150401_002543
text: Talk to the Chronomancer Master at Stele Road

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150406_002544
text: Ah, one more thing.{nl}There is a hidden object at Flude Island in West Siauliai Woods.{nl}Before you go to Klaipeda, find it first and return it to its original owners.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150406_002545
text: I can afford it

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150406_002546
text: I don't have money for that

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150406_002547
text: Obtain the book from the two dimensional world in Tenet Church 1F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150406_002548
text: The Linker Master told you that if you are competent enough, you would be able to find the two dimensional world in Tenet Church 1F. Find the book from the two dimensional world and give it to the Linker Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150406_002549
text: Obtain the book from the two dimensional world in Tenet Church 1F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150406_002550
text: Obtain the tree barks from Tipios from Veja Ravine

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150406_002551
text: Obtain %s from Tipios at Veja Ravine

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150406_002552
text: The Swordsman Master wants you to learn something. Defeat Beetow at Veja Ravine and learn what Swordsman has told you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150406_002553
text: Obtain Fishing Rods from Red Fisherman at Saknis Plains and check them, distinguishing the ones that make whistling sounds

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150406_002554
text: Obtain the sharp canine by defeating Netherbovine at Poslinkis Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002555
text: If you truely want to learn something, you should first prove yourself that you are qualified.{nl}I will give you an assignment. Defeat the Vubbes at the 1st floor of Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002556
text: Thank you for your determination to learn my swordsmanship, but I am not sure if you would follow well.{nl}I will test you by seeing how you face the Vubbes at the 1st floor of Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002557
text: Go to Tenet Garden and put this pot on the ground.{nl}When you defeat the monsters near the pot, the energies will gather into the pot.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002558
text: Just put the pot on the ground of Ramstis Ridge.{nl}The problem will be Chapparition there...but, I think you are competent enough to face it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002559
text: I heard a monster called Biteregina attacks travelers at the Owl Burial Ground.{nl}If you could defeat that monster, I will acknowledge your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002560
text: Show your power of the goddess to the Chapparition at Ramstis Ridge.{nl}That monster will be enough to test your courage.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002561
text: If you want to learn something from me, you should be quick.{nl}Defeat the monsters at the entrance of Kateen Forest using smoke bombs.{nl}You should be careful since some of them are pretty powerful.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002562
text: Oh, you came back already.{nl}Well done.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002563
text: If you want to learn something from me, defeat Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm.{nl}If you want your will and skills to be acknowledged.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002564
text: Stop the wrongdoings of the monsters.{nl}I heard that Colimencia are causing trouble at the Greene Manor.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002565
text: Are you ready?{nl}I will see you at the training hall of the Highlander Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002566
text: Falconer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002567
text: So you want to become a Falconer Master.{nl}I don't know which bird will be your friend, but when you are intereacting with it, the best thing you can use is its food.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002568
text: Anything will be alright. Get some food from animal type monsters.{nl}I will test your abilities as a Pardoner by that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002569
text: If the monsters are strong, they are easier to get.{nl}If the monsters are weak, it won't be easy.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002570
text: It is a rare meat. You must have spent a hard time getting it.{nl}I am counting on you from now on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002571
text: Picky Taste [Falconer Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002572
text: I can't do such tiresome duties

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002573
text: Obtain the heart of Stone Orca at Crystal Mine 1F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002574
text: Crystal Mine 1F Area

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002575
text: Defeat monsters using smoke bombs

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002576
text: The Oracle Master is waiting for you in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002577
text: The Oracle Master wants to know whether you have abilities to possess the guidelines of the oracle and how well you would spread the oracle. Duel against the Oracle Master at the Highlander Master's room and obtain the victory.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002578
text: Call of the Falconer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002579
text: The Falconer Master in Klaipeda is looking for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002580
text: Obtain the meat that the hawk likes

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002581
text: Defeat animal-type monsters to obtain the meat that you will give to the hawk. Any monsters are fine, but as monsters get stronger, it will be easier for you to get the meat.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002582
text: Talk with the Falconer Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150414_002583
text: You have obtained all the meat to use for the Hawk's food. Talk with the Falconer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150428_002584
text: Infiltrate the Pyromancer Master's room and take what's in the box.{nl}Do as you wish with anything else.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150428_002585
text: All the books are gathered now. Well done.{nl}As I promised to you, I will teach you the skills of Hunter.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150428_002586
text: And this is for your compensation. {nl}This will be enough to get Velheider.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150428_002587
text: Magics won't distinguish people, but I don't like a lazy person.{nl}I will test your guts by seeing whether you could defeat Stone Orcas at at the 1st floor of Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150428_002588
text: This is a rare meat. You must had hard time getting it.{nl}As a Falconer, I am counting on you from now on.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150428_002589
text: And, it will be difficult to get a hawk at first.{nl}I will help you with this since we are the same Pardoners.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150428_002590
text: All regions at Veja Ravine

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150428_002591
text: Defeat Stone Orca

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150428_002592
text: The Wizard Master is emphasizing the importance of will. Defeat the Stone Orca from the 1st floor of Crystal Mine and go back to the Wizard Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150428_002593
text: You've defeated all the Stone Orcas. Return to the Wizard Master and report.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150511_002594
text: I heard that Minotaur have it somewhere in Sirdgela Forest.{nl}I heard that monster is not easy so you should be prepared a lot.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150511_002595
text: He disappeared into darkness after talking to the Elementalist Master.{nl}You better go talk to him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150511_002596
text: Actually, Tontulias are not that hard, but the other enemies are more dangerous.{nl}Hmm... Good Luck!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150511_002597
text: You should be quick in order to learn from me.{nl}Use smoke bombs at the training field in front of Kateen Forest entrance, and defeat the monsters.{nl}Some of them are really strong, so be ready.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150511_002598
text: First, you should gather the perfumed oil that is needed for the maintenance of the Goddess Statue.{nl}If you request it to the priests in Klaipeda, they will give it to you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150511_002599
text: If you want to learn from me, you should first show me your skills.{nl}Honeypin at Tenants' Farm would be good.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002600
text: Congratulations for the birth of new Bokor.{nl}When I selected the way of Bokor, I started off by making my own doll.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002601
text: We don't accept just anyone as a Peltasta.{nl}I will give you an assignment. First, defeat all Vubbes that are occupying the 1st floor of Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002602
text: I can see your passion to become a Pyromancer, but that passion is not enough.{nl}I will make the decision based on how well you support my research.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002603
text: I can now move on to the next stage of the research because of you.{nl}You can always come to learn magic. Well done.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002604
text: Welcome. You shall eliminate the evil that I summon.{nl}I will record the unique wavelength that will come out of this process.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002605
text: I am researching about the 4th state about the substance.{nl}It can't be done without support from the Bokor Master who controls spirits.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002606
text: Good. {nl}Since that research is being progressed with the Bokor Master, she will tell you what to do when you go meet her.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002607
text: You want to learn magic from me?{nl}Of course I can teach you. If you could do me a favor.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002608
text: This will be enough.{nl}It will be hard from this stage so you should follow well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002609
text: You want to be a Ranger? Then I will request something to you. {nl}I will decide whether I should teach you based on how well you complete the task.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002610
text: So the books are all gathered. Well done.{nl}As I promised to you, I will permit you to become a Hunter.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002611
text: And this is my present. {nl}You will be able to purchase Velheider.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002612
text: Well done. {nl}I expect you to fulfill my expectations.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002613
text: When you and your opponent fight with swords, you will find out your opponent's skill.{nl}If you could prove to me your qualifications as a warrior, I will teach you what a true warrior is.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002614
text: Nice.{nl}You are more than enough to be a warrior.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002615
text: That's good. There are many eyes here so go ahead to the base camp. {nl}I will follow you soon.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002616
text: Why are you lingering? {nl}Didn't I tell you to go to camp already?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002617
text: It's easy to teach you how to use a spear, but your mind should be ready for it.{nl}The assignment is easy, but it's little troublesome.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002618
text: Glizardon Leather in Tenet Church B1, Galok's canine in Tenet Church 1F.{nl}And black powders from Egnome... I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002619
text: Defeat Carcashus at Septyni Glen to collect the seeds.{nl}They break easily so it's not easy to get the decent ones.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002620
text: Good. The seeds are okay.{nl}When you start to learn from me, you will realize how great this is.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002621
text: Anyway, well done.{nl}Let's get along well from now on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002622
text: I was looking for a book. Four books of Lydia Schaffen.{nl}If you could help me finding those books, I will permit you to become a Hunter.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002623
text: I heard enough about your achievements. You still have lots of potentials.{nl}We are looking for someone who could find the books of Lydia Schaffen and you've shown up at the right time. You will help us right?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002624
text: Good. This is it!{nl}As I promised to you, I will teach you high level Quarrel Shooter skills.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002625
text: If you want to learn skills of Archer, I have a request to you.{nl}I hope you help us finding the books of Lydia Schaffen.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002626
text: Finally, I am seeing this with my own eyes!{nl}Well done. I will teach you a new skill right away.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002627
text: There are books that I wish to collect. They are Lydia Schaffen's books.{nl}If you could collect them, I will teach you high level Ranger skills. How about it?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002628
text: The problem is the Hunter Master. I don't want to see such woman's face.{nl}So I want you to purchase the next volume from her and think of it as your next lesson fee.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002629
text: I think about 5,000 silver should be enough.{nl}You can afford it right?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002630
text: Finally, I collected them all. Well done.{nl}It's easy to teach, but it's your responsibility to follow well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002631
text: A sculptor needs to be competent, but he also needs to identify good ingredients.{nl}If you could bring me Blue Crystal which I am looking for, I will help you to become a Dievdirbys.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002632
text: Finally, you don't look like a newbie anymore. I will give you an important task.{nl}If you do a good job, I will promise to help you become the next level Highlander.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002633
text: The task is to receive help from Peltastas.{nl}They will welcome you if you could bring coarse tree barks of Mentiwood from Septyni Glen.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002634
text: You've done a good job completing the mission.{nl}The kingdom's rebuild will not be far if we, the masters, keep a close relationship.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002635
text: You seem to be ready to progress to the next level Peltasta.{nl}Good, but you should complete the task well in order to receive the learning.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002636
text: I once receive a help from the Highlander Master.{nl}We, Peltastas value the moral rights that humans should abide the most.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002637
