text: It's good to hear that the Highlander Master liked it.{nl}Now, come to me anytime.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002638
text: Collect the toe nails of Biteroses at Septyni Glen and hand them over to the Highlander Master.{nl}I think that task should be appropriate for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002639
text: It's not hard to teach you high level magic... but, you should help be before I teach them to you.{nl}I should collect the energies of fire that are needed for the research, but I just don't have time for that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002640
text: The book I am looking for is very valuable.{nl}If you could find that book for me, I will help you learn new magic of the Cryomancer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002641
text: A true Krivis should be humble and make offerings to the goddesses.{nl}You should pray and make offerings to every Goddess Statue in Siauliai Woods.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002642
text: I can sense that you are full of blessings from the goddesses.{nl}Brother, I will lead you the way of a true Krivis.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002643
text: According to an old saying, those who seek death shall live.{nl}You should first realize the meaning of this saying before I teach you further.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002644
text: If that's so, fight Carcashus at Septyni Glen.{nl}You will learn something from it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002645
text: The most important thing for a true Priest is to trust the goddesses and prove it to them.{nl}Please exorcise the evil spirit from a soldier in the name of the goddesses.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002646
text: You can learn high level magic after helping my research first.{nl}Let's see whether you are qualified to learn them after you help me first.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002647
text: First, get me Glizardon Horn from Tenet Church B1, Galok Feather from 1F, {nl}and Egnome FragmentS from 2F. Thanks.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002648
text: Well done. We've collected good documents as a result.{nl}Since we successfully completed the urgent research, let's start the lesson again.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002649
text: As a Cleric, I think the most effective way to get nearest to the goddess is dedication.{nl}If you could help me curing the soldiers at Crystal Mine, I will certainly help you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002650
text: You can use the divine water as much as you want in the name of the Cleric Master.{nl}He is so kind, I am jealous of him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002651
text: When you are getting the divine water from the Masters, I want you to pass my regards as well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002652
text: Well done.{nl}I may not be competent enough, but I will help with my best so you could bet nearer to the goddesses.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002653
text: If I were to be your spear, I would be really happy.{nl}Good. Are you ready to become the owner of the spear?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002654
text: Good.{nl}Please show me the spear that is completed to level 6.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002655
text: The reality moves as I imagine. Thoughts solely make it possible!{nl}The power of them differs by how one trusts himself...{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002656
text: That's called the super natural power.{nl}Okay. If you could help my task, I will help you so that you could show your real abilities.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002657
text: Asking me to help you become the greatest Quarrel Shooter, you have such a high ambition. {nl}That's good to hear. I was looking for someone who could help me as well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002658
text: Oh, so this is the map. Well done.{nl}I think you may surpass me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002659
text: It's silly to hear that you want to be the greatest Ranger.{nl}But, that's okay. If you could help me, that dream may not be just a dream.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002660
text: This fragrance... Yes. This is Evoniphon's.{nl}This will be enough. Shall we start the lesson again?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002661
text: So the best is Sapper, right?{nl}But, you can't become it for free. You should do me a favor.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002662
text: Anyway, well done.{nl}If you want to learn new skills, come to me anytime.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002663
text: I can see the stronger light from you.{nl}Please get me the card that you could obtain from the strong monster.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002664
text: Sometimes, the destined cruel fate may lead you to dark future.{nl}I wish the goddesses lead you safely as you walk on the way of Bokor that you've chosen.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002665
text: It is a completely different story to simply carve from blazing a new stage.{nl}Of course, I could help you a bit.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002666
text: I am looking for a cat that can be a model, but it's so hard due to my old age.{nl}It will be so good if you could bring a suitable cat for me.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002667
text: You are already at the stage to learn high level magic? {nl}As a compensation for teaching you, I have a favor to ask you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002668
text: It is simple, but little dangerous. {nl}You want to challenge for it?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002669
text: Just put this pot on Ramstis Ridge.{nl}The problem is the Chapparition there... But, you would be enough to defeat it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002670
text: Well done.{nl}Now, is this going to be the last lesson...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002671
text: I can promise you the higher stage power if it were me.{nl}But, of course you should pay for the lesson fee.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002672
text: From the 1st floor of Royal Mausoleum, please bring me hard skins of Varvs and rigid horns of Zinutekas.{nl}It will not be hard since you are my disciple.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002673
text: Well done.{nl}I will help you to Cryomancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002674
text: Cataphract. {nl}I am not sure if that's going to suitable for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002675
text: A true Cataphract is the warrior who fights at the front.{nl}If anything obstructs the way of a Cataphract, just destroy it.{nl}Ah, I just remembered something.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002676
text: I heard monsters called Biteregina attack the tourists at Mannacle Grave.{nl}If you could defeat them, I will teach you what is the true Cataphract.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002677
text: I knew you would do it.{nl}It will be hard from now on, so follow me well.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002678
text: Only battles can make us strong.{nl}If you want to be a true Barbarian, prove yourself!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002679
text: Our method is simple. You are qualified if you are alive, and you are not if you are dead.{nl}You are more than qualified since you are alive.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002680
text: Follow me to the north of the base camp. {nl}I shall review your strength over there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002681
text: Not here, it's north of the base camp.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002682
text: Now is the time to enhance the qualities of Manas that you possess as a Linker.{nl}Any magic is okay. I will test you by dueling.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002683
text: Hunters only speak in terms of bows. {nl}I will adjust myself to your level, so if you want to be a stronger Hunter, try defeating me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002684
text: The highest level of Highlander... You seem to still be hesitating.{nl}But, having no hesitation is also the part of the way of the Highlander. Are you ready?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002685
text: Respond with a shield without avoiding enemies' attacks.{nl}Bravery is the most important quality in Peltastas.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002686
text: I can open up the way to become the highest level Peltasta for you.{nl}But, you should also prove to me your bravery.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002687
text: Now is the time, brother. Sincerity is the power of Krivis.{nl}Prove your sincerity that you've accumulated so far by dueling against me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002688
text: Your sincerity is like the rigid stone pole.{nl}I will help you to reach higher level.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002689
text: The devotion of Priests shall not change in any circumstances.{nl}I will test whether your devotion would stand still even in the worst circumstances by dueling against you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002690
text: Throw away your hesitation and fill your heart in with the blessings of the goddesses.{nl}With these blessings, I will help you to reach the highest level.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002691
text: We Wugushi do not hesitate to use poison.{nl}We will first show you how to fight. We will use bows, blowguns, whatever is available.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002692
text: Good. Let me teach you a lesson. {nl}This place is too tight so go ahead to the vacant lot down the Karas Highway.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002693
text: You must be scared, still standing there. {nl}If not, then wait in Karas Highway.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002694
text: So you want to be a Rodelero? Then check your shield first. {nl}When I first chose this path, I started out by getting a 4th degree shield.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002695
text: Prepare a shield enhanced 4 degrees. {nl}I need to check your will at least.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002696
text: If you wish to become a Thaumaturge, it is an honor for me.{nl}But, before that, I want you to do a simple errand.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002697
text: You found it faster than I expected.{nl}Okay then let's start the lesson right away.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002698
text: Please get me Varv Resin, Zinutekas Tail Fragments, and Boowook Activation Cores.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002699
text: Well done indeed.{nl}Since you've completed the mission, I will start the lesson of Elementalist right away.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002700
text: If you could prove your skills by dueling against me, I will teach you the true skills of Scout.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002701
text: As there's a lot to prepare, go on ahead to the vacant lot below Karas Highway, I'll go there as soon as I finish.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002702
text: It's troublesome to duel here. There is a vacant lot below Karas Highway, I'll meet you there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002703
text: It is very impressive to find someone who wants to learn from me.{nl}Okay. If could find my belongings, I will accept you as a Corsair.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002704
text: That idiot of a captain took everything and fled to the Forest of Prayer.{nl}It's possible that monsters may have taken them. I hope that's the case.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002705
text: Fight against me with everything you've got. I will show you how to fight with a sword and a shield.{nl}I may teach you more or eliminate you depending on your skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002706
text: I cannot determine your true potential here, so show it to me at the vacant lot below Karas Highway.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002707
text: You have a bad habit on your body, but there's a room for improvement.{nl}As you know, my teaching is very strict so you should be well prepared for it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002708
text: You want to learn skills from me?{nl}I will think about it, if you collect the wood I am looking for.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002709
text: The level of the strongest Hunter... I am not sure if you could follow well.{nl}I will give you an assignment. Hunt for various types of monsters.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002710
text: Duckies from Sunset Flag Forest, Black Drakes from the 5th floor of Mage Tower, and Kowaks from Forest of Prayer.{nl}It will not be easy to find them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002711
text: If you want to be a stronger Wugushi, I will give you an assignment.{nl}Collect special Poison from Bites in Saknis Plains.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002712
text: It is hard to get away from the attraction of poison. I am one of those people.{nl}Okay, then shall we start?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002713
text: It is your assignment to hunt for the monsters that are hidden.{nl}The location is Apsimesti Crossroads. {nl}You should do it if you want to become a stronger Scount. Don't you think so?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002714
text: You've done it easily.{nl}Okay then, shall me move on to the Intensified stage?{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002715
text: Rogues should be fast.{nl}Fight against the monsters at the training field near the entrance of Kateen Forest using smoke bombs.{nl}Some of them are really strong so you should aware of them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002716
text: Elusiveness is the most attractive property of Rogue.{nl}With swift movements, Rogue makes it's enemies dizzy.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002717
text: The perfect stage of Hoplite destroys everything.{nl}Unfortunately, my colleague the Hackapell Master does not believe in such a thing.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002718
text: If you could help prove it for me, he will realize the truth.{nl}How about it?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002719
text: Spears are mighty and never lose.{nl}I want to see the guy's pitiful face after Shadowgaler is dead.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002720
text: If my friend asks us, I will tell him that our competent Hoplite defeated it.{nl}You reached the level of a master, but if you need any help, you can come to me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002721
text: You want to become the greatest Barbarian.{nl}There's something you should do.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002722
text: The other masters sent the disciples to Owl Burial Ground to eliminate Yekubs.{nl}But, that should be done by you. Destroy them and return to me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002723
text: Yekub will be easy for the greatest Barbarian.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002724
text: When you go to the Greene Manor, you would be able to meet Colimencia.{nl}You should be competent enough to face them in order to become a Centurion.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002725
text: Squire shines more when he is with his partner instead of being alone.{nl}Especially the attacks that involve ropes with a partner is stronger than any other attacks.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002726
text: This is an arrest rope.{nl}Take this to the Poslinkis Forest and practice so you can catch at least 3 at once.{nl}Let's talk about Squire afterwards. {nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002727
text: Did you get used to it?{nl}Let's learn slowly from now on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002728
text: I heard the monsters called Biteregina in Manacle Grave are attacking people there.{nl}How do you think about it? I want you to think of it as a compensation for learning my skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002729
text: Since I am a Master, I should help the others, but I just don't have enough time.{nl}Anyway, it is really splendid. But, get ready to become more stronger Sapper.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002730
text: If you say so, there's another way.{nl}If you could defeat Moas at Fedimian Suburbs, I will let you go first.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002731
text: I will give you this flare. {nl}You would be able to find the hidden monsters more easily.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002732
text: I was waiting for you. I knew that you would come to find me.{nl}But, I guess you came here since you are competent enough. Right?{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002733
text: For example, dueling against me and win.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002734
text: Nice.{nl}You could start the next level training whenever you want.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002735
text: Now the time has come. It is so great that you came this far.{nl}But, your skills should be more than the average to reach the next level.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002736
text: I heard some idiotic baron opened the portal that is connected to Demon Prison.{nl}I received the request to block the demons from coming out from the Wing of Vaivora.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002737
text: I want to pass the task of defeating Deadborn to you.{nl}I think they will be good for hunting.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002738
text: Very good indeed. You are competent enough.{nl}If you want to learn a new skill, you are always welcomed.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002739
text: That's why you should help me.{nl}Could you bring me natural Mano stones from Rocktortuga at Ruklys Memorial site?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002740
text: Don't be greedy on learning a new skill and just continue on what you were doing.{nl}I will think again if you could bring burnable coals from Yonazolems at Aqueduct Bridge Area.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002741
text: You possess splendid skills.{nl}I am happy to accept such disciple. I will teach you my skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002742
text: I received a request to block Rajatoad of Demon Prison from the Wings of Vaivora.{nl}If you aim to be the greatest Wugushi, I think you should defeat them. How about it?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002743
text: What did you do to open that portal?{nl}Very good, good.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002744
text: You never let down my expectations. Well done.{nl}Okay. Shall we proceed again?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002745
text: Nice. I feel like I am seeing myself in old days.{nl}You are truly a Schwarzer Reiter.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002746
text: Strange incidents are occurring because the world is like this.{nl}I heard the other masters are also having hard times.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002747
text: The villagers are complaining because of Rocktortugas in the West Siauliai Woods.{nl}If you could defeat those monsters, I will give you precious offerings.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002748
text: I am sorry, but there's something you should do for me.{nl}Let's get to the conversation later... First, please bring me the jewel I left to the Krivis Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002749
text: It is also a Dievdirbys' task to take special care about the work with affections instead of just making it.{nl}If you dream to become a Dievdirbys that will be remembered for a long time, please do not forget this feeling.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002750
text: The number of Red Tree Ambulos has increased a lot at Apsimesti Crossroads and threatening the villagers there.{nl}If you want to step forward as a true Sadhu, share your abilities.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002751
text: Good. But we're in front of the Holy Goddess Statue. {nl}I will test it in Shiluma Altar Site.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002752
text: Your faith is splendid indeed. {nl}I will permit your entrance. The training of us, monks is harsh so you should be prepared for it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002753
text: Yes, that's it! It's been there all along.{nl}Anyway, I grant your entrance to the road of Pardoner.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002754
text: Fire Jar? Sure I know about it. {nl}But I'm a merchant. So unless you get me Hardened Oil from Puragis in Saknis Plains...

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002755
text: The poatas at Siauliai east forest is threatening the villagers.{nl}If you could defeat that monster in the name of the goddesses, I will teach you my magic.{nl}{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002756
text: Well done. The goddesses would be satisfied.{nl}As I promised, I will take you to the higher level of Pyromancer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002757
text: Psychokinos show their powers by trusting their abilities.{nl}You should show how much you trust yourself to go into the perfect Psychokino's level.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002758
text: Red Vubbe Warriors in this forest are hard to face against.{nl}But, if you trust yourself, you will be able to face them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002759
text: The highest level of Linker... I want to know how you control Mana.{nl}I don't care what kind of magic you would use, just defeat Vubbe Warriors at East Siauliai Woods.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002760
text: You have the most splendid abilities among the ones that I've met before.{nl}But if you learn the new control, you will be the greatest Linker.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002761
text: Before we learn the next level magic, I should test your magical knowledge.{nl}The Salamanders who climb Mage Tower would be enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002762
text: Nice.{nl}With this, you will be able to learn new magic without any problem.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002763
text: Without exaggerating your words, it's way better to show yourself.{nl}Defeat Reaverpede at Escanciu village will be your next assignment for the next level.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002764
text: If you want to become my disciple, I should first understand your skills.{nl}The Reaverpede at Escanciu village will be enough.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002765
text: I knew you would come.{nl}You felt the limit as a Thaumaturge right?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002766
text: But, there are still remaining levels.{nl}First, I will check whether you would be able to defeat Netherbovine near Fedimian.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002767
text: There is no limit for Thaumaturges.{nl}But, if one has the limit, there is no other way.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002768
text: Anyway, you've successfully completed the assignment.{nl}Shall we learn the next magic?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002769
text: The masters near here are chasing after the monsters that are making chaos.{nl}If you are the greatest Elementalist, you should first defeat those monsters faster than anyone else.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002770
text: I can picture the faces of the other masters.{nl}Not only that, I am so happy to hear that you are suitable to become the true Elementalist.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002771
text: I heard Necroventer appeared again at Goddess' Ancient Garden.{nl}If you want to learn high magic of Sorcerer, I think it would be adequate opponent. What do you think?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002772
text: It is so silly.{nl}Do nothing in front of such a nice quarry.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002773
text: So you don't disappoint me at all.{nl}Now, you know what to do next right?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002774
text: I can always teach higher level magic. {nl}But, I am not sure if you could follow me.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002775
text: You are more than my expectations.{nl}But, you should be prepared since it's going be harder than before.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002776
text: Long time no see. You want to become an Alchemist.{nl}First, we should find out if you can be an Alchemist.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002777
text: Good. {nl}I am looking forward from now on.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002778
text: To follow the training of a Priest, you should first demonstrate your willingness to drive out evil forces.{nl}Take the bags with demonic power away from the Vubbes at Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002779
text: You will probably be find a lot of Vubbes at the Vubbe Outpost and their refugee camp.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002780
text: While magics does not choose its wielder, I don't like a lazy disciple.{nl}Defeating Stone Orcas in Crystal Mine 1F as a test of your guts.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002781
text: Clerics must be of service to others if they wish to achieve a higher stage in life.{nl}Please collect Green Ointments from the Vubbes at Miners' Village so you could cure more people.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002782
text: Eliminate the bats in Crystal Mine 1F and bring their wings as a proof.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002783
text: There is a monster called Colimencia in Grynas Hills. {nl}It is a threatening monster, but you should be able to defeat it easily.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002784
text: Finally, you are a true Rodelero.{nl}But, how about Colimencia... The dangerous monster at the Greene Manor.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002785
text: If there's something lacking, that means we have a room to improve.{nl}Don't worry. I can fill that in for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002786
text: If you dream to become the greatest Cataphract, you should be able to defeat Gaigalas in Tenants' Farm easily.{nl}If you understand, come back quickly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002787
text: Once you decide to become the greatest, there's nothing to be afraid of. {nl}Assignments or whatever... I will just destroy everything. Don't you think so?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002788
text: I like you more as I see you more.{nl}Okay. Let's get started.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002789
text: I am busy personally... I am sorry.{nl}I heard a report saying that someone saw the symbol of the lost family so I am chasing after it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002790
text: This... is the symbol of the Legwyn family.{nl}Thanks. As I promised, I will teach you new skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002791
text: Pirates have their levels and Corsairs too.{nl}Maybe the Honeypin at Tenants' Farm will be able to locate you exactly.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002792
text: Wow, this is unexpected.{nl}It will be okay even if I teach you harder skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002793
text: If you want to become a Doppelsoeldner, hunt for Gaigalas at Tenants' Farm.{nl}If you want to acknowledged in terms of your determination and skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002794
text: This is usable.{nl}Good. I welcome you as a Doppelsoeldner.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002795
text: You will feel that is too much.{nl}But, you should realize your weaknesses in order to reach higher level Rodelero.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002796
text: I know that you are growing well as a competent Paladin.{nl}But, I want to check with my own eyes.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002797
text: Very well indeed.{nl}I will lead you to become the highest level Paladin.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002798
text: You want to advance? Then there's something you should do for me instead of a test.{nl}Please retrieve the lost indulgence money from Aqueduct Bridge Area. You can do it right?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002799
text: At the time when I didn't know what to do, the goddesses have sent you.{nl}Anyway, congratulations on your advancement.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002800
text: During the duel, I found out that the one who led you to the way of an Oracle were the goddesses.{nl}You should do the interpretations, but I will help you to make correct interpretations.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002801
text: Actually, it's pretty hard to get your first Hawk.{nl}But you are a Falconer too now, so I will help you with that.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002802
text: Notice/Gather offerings and give it to the Cleric Master!#10

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002803
text: Notice/Cure the patients in Siauliai Miners' Village!#5

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002804
text: What should I help you with?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002805
text: Tell me about it

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002806
text: Luring

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002807
text: Notice/The cat is showing interest!#5

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002808
text: Extracting wildflower alcohol

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002809
text: Notice/Empty Box

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002810
text: Yes

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002811
text: Collect the seeds of Carcashus from Septyni Glen

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002812
text: The Psychokino Master asked you to become his assistant if you are interested in this field. Obtain the seeds of Carcashus that are needed by the Psychokino Master from Septyni Glen.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002813
text: Acquired enough seeds of Carcashus from Septyni Glen. Return to the Psychokino Master and hand over the flower alcohol.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002814
text: The Hunter Master told you that if you help him finding the books, he will acknowledge you as a Hunter. As the Hunter Master told you, search for the books at Vubbe Outpost.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002815
text: The Quarrel Shooter Master asked you to help him search for the books. As the Quarrel Shooter Master told you, search for the books at Vubbe Outpost.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002816
text: The Archer Master asked you to help him search for the books. As the Archer Master told you, search for the books at Vubbe Outpost.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002817
text: The Ranger Master asked you to help him search for the books. As the Ranger Master told you, search for the books at Vubbe Outpost.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002818
text: Obtain the coarse tree barks from Mentiwood at Septyni Glen

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002819
text: Obtain the coarse tree barks of Mentiwood as a compensation for receiving help from the Peltasta Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002820
text: Collect the toe nails of Biteroses at Septyni Glen

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002821
text: The Peltasta Master handed over a mission to you. Obtain the toe nails of Biteroses from Septyni Glen.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002822
text: All regions in Septyni Glen

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002823
text: Acquired the toe nails of Biteroses. Hand them over to the Highlander Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002824
text: The toe nails of Biteroses

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002825
text: The Cryomancer Master told you that there's a valuable book which he is looking for and he wants you to bring that book. Meet the Siauliai Miners' Village Mayor to ask him about the whereabout of the book.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002826
text: Defeat Carcashus at Septyni Glen

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002827
text: The Swordsman Master wants to be realized. While you are defeating Carcashus at Septyni Glen, realize the words that the Swordsman Master told you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002828
text: Get Glizardon Horns from Tenet Church B1, Galok Furs from 1F, {nl}and Egnome Fragments from 2F that the Wizard Master wants.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002829
text: The Cleric Master asked you to help curing the patients. Obtain the Holy Water from the Priest Master and the Krivis Master and cure the patients at Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002830
text: The Psychokino Master told you that he will help you to spurt your real abilities, but he wants demonic essences as a compensation. Defeat Minotaur and Chapparition and obtain demonic essences.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002831
text: The Sapper Master asked you to help his experiment. First, collect the Burnable Juice from Tontulias from Zachariel Crossroads.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002832
text: The Pyromancer Master requested to you something in return for teaching high level magic. Put the Pot of the Sun on Ramstis Ridge.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002833
text: Collect Varv Hard Bark and Zinutekas Strong Horn which are the ingredients the Cryomancer Master wants from the 1st floor of the Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002834
text: The Sadhu Master wants to know whether or not you are ready to accept the training. Duel against the Sadhu Master and win.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002835
text: Talk to the Wugushi Master in Gateway of Great King

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002836
text: The Wugushi Master says that even if cowardly, the last one standing is the true winner of the combat. Have a duel with the Wugushi Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002837
text: Enhance Shield type item up four levels.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002838
text: The Rodelero Master asked you to bring your shield with an enhance level of 4. Enhance a shield-type item and bring it to the Rodelero Master to earn his recognition.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002839
text: Successfully enhanced shield type item up 4 levels. Report to the Rodelero Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002840
text: Talk to the Thaumaturge Master in Gateway to Great King.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002841
text: Obtain Varb Resin, Zinutekas Tail Fragments, and Boowook Activation Cores from the 1st floor of Royal Mausoleum.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002842
text: Talk to the Scout Master in Gateway to Great King.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002843
text: Talk to the Cataphract Master in Gateway to Great King.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002844
text: Obtain the Imbued Evil Energy Pouches from the Vubbes at the Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002845
text: The Priest Master asked you to defeat Vubbes around the Miners' Village to prove your sincerity.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002846
text: Collect Green Ointments from Vubbes in Siauliai Miners' Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002847
text: The Cleric Master told you that you can see higher level through dedications. Defeat the Vubbes in Siauliai Miners' Village and collect Green Ointments.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002848
text: Retrieve the items stolen from the Corsair Master in the Forest of Prayer. Find the Dock Permit, Navigator's Chart and the Contract by defeating the Prison Fighters.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002849
text: Go to the Fletcher Master in Goddess' Ancient Garden

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002850
text: Hunt for 3 kinds of monsters in various regions

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002851
text: The Hunter Master gave you an assignment regarding hunting for monsters that are scattered in various regions.{nl}Hunt for Duckies in Sunset Flag Forest, Black Drakes in the 5th floor of Mage Tower, and Kowaks from Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002852
text: %s of Sunset Flag Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002853
text: %s of Mage Tower 5F

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002854
text: %s of Forest of Prayer

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002855
text: Go to the Wugushi Master in Gateway to Great King

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002856
text: Go to the Scout Master in Gateway to Great King

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002857
text: Use Flares to find the hidden monsters in Apsimesti Crossroads and defeat them.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002858
text: The Hoplite Master wants you to find and defeat Shadowgaler which the Hackapell Master promised to defeat. As she wishes, come back after defeating Shadowgaler at Manacle Grave.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002859
text: The Squire Master asked you to practice Arrest rope as much as you can so you can control it without any problem. Practice to use the rope on three monster at once in Poslinkis Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002860
text: Go to the Centurion Master in Forest of Prayer

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002861
text: The Wugushi Master is waiting for you in the Gateway of Great King.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002862
text: The Scout Master is waiting for you in the Gateway of Great King.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002863
text: The Scout Master wants to check your abilities. Defeat Deadborn at District 1 of Demon Prison and return to the Scout Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002864
text: The Fletcher Master is waiting for you in Goddess' Ancient Garden.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002865
text: The Fletcher Master told you that if you could bring him Well-Burnable Firestones, he would teach you better skills, but you can't really trust him. Defeat Yonazolem in Aqueduct Bridge Area and collect Well-Burnable Firestones.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002866
text: The Schwarzer Reiter is waiting for you in Forest of Prayer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002867
text: Go to the Monk Master in Goddess' Ancient Garden

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002868
text: Collect a Sharp Canine from Netherbovine at Poslinkis Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002869
text: The Monk Master asked you to bring the proof of the determination. Defeat Netherbovine at Poslinkis Forest and bring a Sharp Canine as a proof.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002870
text: Go to the Pardoner Master in Akmens Ridge

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002871
text: The Pardoner Master will let you skip the advancement assignment, but asked you to retrieve the Lost Indulgence Offerings. Find the Lost Indulgence Offering at Aqueduct Bridge Area.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002872
text: Defeat Red Tree Ambulos at Apsimesti Crossroads

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002873
text: The Sadhu Master asked you to defeat the monsters that are threatening the villagers. Defeat Red Tree Ambulos from Apsimesti Crossroads.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002874
text: Talk to the Monk Master in the Goddess' Ancient Garden.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002875
text: The Item Merchant wants Hardened Oil in exchange for information. Gather Hardened Oil from Puragis in Saknis Plains and give it to the Item Merchant.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002876
text: Go to the Sorcerer Master in Forest of Prayer

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002877
text: The Rodolero Master told you that you are now a true Rodelero, but also told you that you can still improve. Defeat Colimencia at the Greene Manor and find out what's lacking in you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002878
text: Go to the Cataphract Master in Gateway of Great King

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002879
text: Go to the Thaumaturge Master in Gateway of Great King

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002880
text: The Thaumaturge Master wants to know whether you would be able to surpass the next level. Defeat Netherbovine that is making a mess in Poslinkis Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002881
text: Masters in Akmens Ridge are chasing the monster causing mayhem and disappearing. Defeat Netherbovine that appeared in Poslinkis Forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002882
text: Meet the Sorcerer Master in Forest of Prayer

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150714_002883
text: The Sorcerer Master told you that you should not stay still since the monsters are going crazy these days. Go to Goddess' Ancient Gardens and defeat Necroventer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002884
text: I've done business for a long time with the Item Merchant in Klaipeda so I may be able to help you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002885
text: Legwyn Family's Seal [Squire Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002886
text: Honor of the Old Sea [Corsair Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002887
text: Royal Army Corps Machine [Centurion Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002888
text: Missing Delegation's Whereabouts [Doppelsoeldner Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002889
text: Invincible Lady [Sorcerer Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002890
text: Alchemist's Story [Chronomancer Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002891
text: Things Left Behind Death [Necromancer Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002892
text: Past of Crystal Mine (1) [Alchemist Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002893
text: Past of Crystal Mine (2) [Alchemist Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002894
text: No One Knows [Rogue Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002895
text: Lydia Schaffen and the Black Family [Fletcher Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002896
text: Handling Monsters [Falconer Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002897
text: Perfect Marksmanship [Schwarzer Reiter Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002898
text: Responsibility of the Olpas Painting [Monk Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002899
text: Reserved Records of the Cleric [Pardoner Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002900
text: Disaster is a Great Sample [Druid Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002901
text: Reception Error [Oracle Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002902
text: Give the stolen goods to the Klaipeda Item Merchant

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002903
text: The Sapper Master want to return the stolen belongings to its owner and repent for the past. Return the stolen things to Item Merchant in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002904
text: Collect Boss Monster Card

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002905
text: The Bokor Master asked you bring the card obtained from boss monster.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002906
text: Talk to Klaipeda Item Merchant

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002907
text: Sculptor Tesla is looking for a cat to use as his model. Ask the Item Merchant in Klaipeda if there is a cat he can use.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002908
text: Find the Item Merchant's father in Sirdgela Forest

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002909
text: In exchange for the baits to lure the cat, Item Merchant asked you to find traces of her father. Find the merchant's father in Sirdgela forest.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002910
text: Give the piece of father's clothes to Item Merchant

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002911
text: You weren't able to find the merchant's father but you found some clothing that seems have belonged to him. Give it to the Item Merchant.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002912
text: Received special bait feed from the Item Merchant. Use this to lure the cat in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002913
text: Meet Fedimian Item Merchant

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002914
text: In exchange for Hardened Oil, the Item Merchant of Fedimian told you that a monster named Mothstem has a Fire Jar. Ask the merchant where you can meet Mothstem.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002915
text: The Item Merchant says he has met Mothstem in Fedimian Suburbs. Defeat the Mothstem in Fedimian Suburbs and get a Mothstem's Fire Jar.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002916
text: Go to the Squire Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002917
text: Piece of Legwyn Family Seal

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002918
text: The Squire Master says he needs the Seal of Legwyn family. Defeat the monsters and collect pieces of the Legwyn Family Seal in Residence of the Fallen Legwyn Family.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002919
text: Collected all the pieces of Legwyn Family Seal. Return to the Squire Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002920
text: Things to do

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002921
text: Return to the Corsair Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002922
text: Go to the Centurion Master in Forest of Prayer

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002923
text: Return to the Centurion Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002924
text: Go to the Doppelsoeldner Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002925
text: Return of the Doppelsoeldner Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002926
text: Go to the Sorcerer Master in Forest of Prayer

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002927
text: Return to the Sorcerer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002928
text: Go to the Chronomancer Master in Stele Road

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002929
text: Return to the Chronomancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002930
text: Go to the Necromancer Master in Mullers Passage

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002931
text: Return to the Necromancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002932
text: Past of the Crystal Mine

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002933
text: Talk to the Alchemist Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002934
text: Go to the Alchemist Master in Siauliai Miners' Village.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002935
text: Return to the Alchemist Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002936
text: Go to the Rogue Master in Fedimian

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002937
text: Return to the Rogue Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002938
text: Go to the Fletcher Master in Goddess' Ancient Garden

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002939
text: Return to the Fletcher Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002940
text: Go to Falconer Master in Stele Road

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002941
text: Return to Falconer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002942
text: Talk to the Schwarzer Reiter Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002943
text: Go to the Schwarzer Reiter Master in Forest of Prayer

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002944
text: Return to the Schwarzer Reiter Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002945
text: Return to the Monk Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002946
text: Return to the Pardoner Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002947
text: Return to the Druid Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002948
text: Go to the Oracle Master in Klaipeda

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150717_002949
text: Return to the Oracle Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002950
text: Please collect Tail Pins from Desmoduses in Tenet Church B1.{nl}They break easily so it's hard to get the decent ones.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002951
text: Nice. The Tail Pins are not broken.{nl}After our lesson, you will realize how great this is.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002952
text: You should get support from the Peltasta Master.{nl}She will welcome you if you obtain Coarse Tree Bark from Yognomes at Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002953
text: Please collect black needles from Glizardons in Tenet Church B1 and hand them over to the Highlander Master.{nl}I think that will be an adequate mission for you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002954
text: If that's so, fight against Glizardons in Tenet Church B1.{nl}You'll come to realize something by doing so.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002955
text: You want to become an Alchemist.{nl}I'll find out if you are suitable.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002956
text: You want to be a better Squire.{nl}If you could fulfill my request, I will certainly help you.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002957
text: The Legwyn family once had a mansion that's now ruins.{nl}It got that way because of some incident... but, I don't want it to remain that way.{nl}I can't do anything about it at the moment, but please at least return the seal of the Legwyn family from there.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002958
text: You will find the seal which once shined brightly when you go to the ruins of the Legwyn family mansion.{nl}It is either broken or you may have hard time identifying it's original shape... hopefully it hasn't been totally destroyed by the monsters.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002959
text: How awful... If I become the official heir of the Legwyn family, I won't let it remain that way.{nl}Of course, I will remember to reward you as the Squire who completed my request.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002960
text: I don't mind meeting someone who wants to learn from me.{nl}But, that doesn't mean I will accept just anyone.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002961
text: When the coral plain was once underwater, {nl}I fought with the great pirate Vladslovas to decide who was the strongest.{nl}I won, but Vladslovas's necklace, which I should have taken as proof of my victory, fell into the sea.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002962
text: I gave up since it was far too deep back then, but I may be able to find it since the area has turned into land.{nl}Go to Cranto Coast and look for the necklace.{nl}It is quite dazzling, so you won't have hard time finding it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002963
text: If I could find it, the people who thought I was bluffing will be very surprised!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002964
text: You really found it!{nl}It is badly damaged, but I am sure this is it.{nl}Okay, I will teach you my skills as I promised to you!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002965
text: A centurion needs to contribute to the kingdom and thinks of it as his fame.{nl}Recently, I am collecting the flags of several Kingdom military squads that were annhilated on Medzio Diena.{nl}I hope you also help this task for the fame of kingdom soldiers.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002966
text: I heard there are kingdom soldiers who went lost at the training field of conflict on Medzio Diena.{nl}I don't expect that they are alive, but to remember their loyalty to the kingdom, I want you to find their flag.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002967
text: The flag is not in a good status... It would've been better if you had found it little sooner...{nl}My heart aches to see the flag is in this status, but I can't forget you who helped me a lot.{nl}I will help you so that you could develop yourself to a higher stage.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002968
text: You came here to learn more as a Doppelsoeldner?{nl}But, right now, I have some important task to do now...{nl}Yes, since I trust you, can you do this instead of a test?{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002969
text: There's something I am preparing right now so I should meet someone, but he can't be contacted lately.{nl}I want to go and check him myself, but since the task I am preparing is being progressed quietly, I can't go there since I will be spotted by lots of people.{nl}Can you go there for me?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002970
text: The person I am trying to meet is the envoy of General Ramin.{nl}I didn't hear anything from him since we had contacted each other at Pilgrim's Way 36_2.{nl}Go there and find out whether something is happening.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002971
text: Damn... I don't want to believe it, but according to what you just told me, it seems that he died due to the attacks from the monsters.{nl}I guess I should contact General Ramin with another method.{nl}Ah, and please keep this secret to other people.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002972
text: Of course, I didn't forget the promise to you.{nl}I will help you to grow up to be a better Doppelsoeldner.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002973
text: I am researching about the eternal life recently.{nl}I am investigating various documents, but it will be the best to listen from the one who is living an eternal life.{nl}I want to listen from a few of Amjinas that are still present in this world...{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002974
text: It's not good for me to visit them as a master and we masters were separated for a long time.{nl}This is also a part of the research as a Sorcerer so ask them how they live eternal lives.{nl}If you could do that for me, I will upgrade your abilities as a Sorcerer one level up.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002975
text: Among the Amjinas, the whereabouts of the Dievdirbys Master from the West Siauliai Woods, the Necromancer Master at Mullers Passage, and the Chronomancer Master at Stele Road have been confirmed.{nl}Ask each of them how they live an eternal life.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002976
text: Amjinas are indeed different.{nl}I should think more widely and find them out.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002977
text: Good, I will lead you to a higher level Sorcerer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002978
text: You've come to enhance you abilities as a Chronomancer.{nl}But, right now I am helping the task which the Alchemist Master from the Winterspoon family requested to me so I can't help you at the moment.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002979
text: {nl}If you are okay, could you help me with this task little more?{nl}If that's so, I will finish it quickly and help you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002980
text: It seems that the Alchemist Master is investigating about Crystal Mine. {nl}To do so, he asked me to lend him my orb to that reads the past of the person which the orb used to belong to.{nl}Explore all the regions of the 1st district and the 2nd district in Crystal Mine.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002981
text: If you had explored the regions completely in the past, the orb will read your memories and records the past.{nl}Then the task will be much easier.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002982
text: It's been recorded completely.{nl}Good. I will pass this to the Alchemist Master.{nl}Now is my turn to help you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002983
text: The power of Necromancer will always be expressed through the materials that act as catalysts.{nl}That power will be influenced by the abilities of Necromancer himself and his power.{nl}If you want to advance more as a Necromancer, it's important that you obtain those materials.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002984
text: Strong grudge is swirling around Videntis Shrine according to what I found out.{nl}When you go there, you will find the materials that possess the thoughts of the dead ones.{nl}If you could obtain those, I will open the door of a higher level Necromancer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002985
text: The bigger the grudge or regrets spirits have in their past lives, the stronger the power of their keepsakes.{nl}Find the keepsakes in which strong regrets can be felt.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002986
text: This is the object that I can feel strong regret.{nl}If you will be able to pick out this kind of object, you will become a stronger Necromancer.{nl}For now, I will help you as a reward for the object.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002987
text: So you've come here to learn higher level abilities of Alchemist.{nl}But, there's something I should do fast so I can't teach at the moment.{nl}It could be dangerous if I leave it like that so I am trying to finish it quickly.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002988
text: Could you help for the task?{nl}If that's so, I will teach you the abilities of Alchemist as a return.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002989
text: So the Alchemist Master sent you here?{nl}I've prepared it since the head of the Winterspoon family requested it.{nl}Please go back with this.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002990
text: Good.{nl}I am investigating Crystal Mine... I need the orb that records the memories of the Chronomancer Master.{nl}He is the head of our Winterspoon family so I've requested it to him in advance. Tell him that I've sent you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002991
text: Lucid... Actually have you met the Chronomancer Master well?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002992
text: You've brought the orb well.{nl}The orb that records the past has the power to read the memories of the possessor and record.{nl}If it acknowledges you as its possessor, it will read the memories and if there's more to be investigated, you should find them on your own.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002993
text: Explore all the areas in the 1st district and the 2nd district in Crystal Mine with this orb.{nl}If you've explored it completely in the past, the orb will read the memories of the possessor and record the past.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002994
text: This is the orb of the Chronomancer Master.{nl}It's been recorded well.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002995
text: I want to check this right away, but I guess I should keep the promise with you first.{nl}I will teach you the abilities of Alchemist.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002996
text: This story is said to have taken place one day at the Astral Tower.{nl}A dispute among the disciples of Lydia Schaffen broke out.{nl}Several disciples gathered after the training and in the process such a dialog is said to have come up: 'No matter how good your bow is, if your skills are lacking, you can't bring out its full potential. Therefore, what is important in the end is your own skill.'{nl}Such was a claim of a certain disciple, which started the dispute.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002997
text: 'You are forgetting the basics of archery. What is an archer? It is someone who uses a tool called a bow, right?{nl}Do you think an archer existing without a bow is possible? {nl}Even if one gets famous for their skill with sword and spear, can one still call themselves an archer? In the end, archery is the concept of depending on tools, isn't it?'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002998
text: The disciple who had a different view argued back:{nl}'You said tools are important, let's talk about that.{nl}What is a bow? There are various weapons for an archer. Just like there are weapons that don't need much skill to handle, like a crossbow, there are also weapons, effectiveness of which varies a lot based on a user's skill, like the ones of the Wugushi.{nl}The Wind Arrow of the Wugushi is hard to master, it's a difficult weapon to wield for someone without experience, no matter how good the materials of one's bow are.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_002999
text: This is the same as saying that since people will die if they don't eat, their lives are less important than food and depend on it.{nl}Are you claiming that since you eat to be able to live on, you are living to eat?'{nl}Upon that, another disciple shared his viewpoint:{nl}'You are arguing about the path of the Archer, but you are only concentrating on one aspect.{nl}What you fail to address is that no matter how famous an Archer one is, no matter how eagle-eyed one is, what they are using to their advantage is the wind. {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003000
text: The arrow could not be shot if it wasn't for the wind and air that carries it to the mark, how could any sharpshooter exist, or rather, how much would an archer be able to do in that case? In the end, what is necessary for an archer is to sense the wind flow and to be able to act on it.'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003001
text: Lydia Schaffen continued eating while listening to the disciples, keeping her position on the railing. After they finished, she kept quiet for a while, but before long she fiddled with her fingers through the pile of shells of chestnuts she had eaten and picked out something, reportedly saying this: {nl}'What is this?'{nl}The disciple with the sharp eyes answered before anyone could.{nl}'It's the inner skin of a chestnut.'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003002
text: It was very obvious that it was indeed the inner skin of a chestnut, so the others nodded in agreement and waited for their master's next words. {nl}And so Lydia Schaffen continued. {nl}'No. This is the notch of my arrow.'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003003
text: One day Lydia Schaffen left a certain village alone and walked around at night.{nl} Lydia Schaffen saw a traveler sitting wearily at the roadside on a woodland road. {nl} Out of curiosity, she decided to approach him.{nl} 'Why are you sitting here in the forest in the middle of the night?'{nl}The traveler was hesitant to answer at first, but after being asked multiple times he finally opened his mouth. {nl}The reason was apparently this: {nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003004
text: In the past, Rumpelstiltskin was quite famous for challenging his opponents to use their best skill and then defeating them. {nl} But, he changed the rules of his game a bit every time. {nl} Lydia Schaffen asked: 'I understand that you want to challenge my archery skill, so what are we going to do?'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003005
text: 'Of course, a game to see who is better with a bow would not be that interesting. Therefore, let's play a game where you fire an arrow at a target, and then I will try to catch and ride the arrow before it reaches the target,' said Rumpelstiltskin. {nl}Lydia replied, questioning the proposal: 'Ride an arrow?'{nl}'That is correct,' averred Rumpelstiltskin.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003006
text: Upon answering, Rumpelstiltskin started to shrink his body.{nl} Once he had reduced himself to the size of a child's fist, Rumpelstiltskin spoke: 'Well, this size will allow me to ride your arrow, right?'{nl}Lydia Schaffen thought for a bit,{nl}'There is a problem with that, though. If you touch the arrow and cause it to fall to the ground without it ever hitting the target, then wouldn't that still be a loss for me regardless of whether you rode the arrow or not?'{nl}Rumpelstiltskin answered her with these words.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003007
text: 'Then how about this. I win if I can ride your arrow until it reaches the target.'{nl} 'And if your arrow falls to the ground,' he continued, 'then we both lose.'{nl}Rumpelstiltskin added, 'The game shall have three rounds, best two out of three.'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003008
text: After Rumpelstiltskin's seemingly honest answer, Lydia Schaffen replied, 'Alright, one more thing: I'm going to shoot at any target, in any direction. I'll tell you what the target is each round. This way, you won't be able to get used to it for rounds two and three. Are you okay with this?{nl}'Alright, let's do that,' agreed Rumpelstiltskin. {nl}After also agreeing upon terms of defeat, the game between two people, err, one person and one demon began.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003009
text: Lydia Schaffen weighed her arrow, then called out the first target:{nl}'The tallest brown tree over there!'{nl}With those words, she released the arrow and it sliced through the air at a frightful speed{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003010
text: Rumpelstiltskin moved nimbly to chase the flying arrow, and after he got on, the arrow impaled the tree. As the arrow continued to oscillate, he danced to the rhythm of the oscillation and sang an unknown tune.{nl}Lydia Schaffen again gauged her arrows, then she called:{nl}'All of the cones on that pine tree on my front-left side!'{nl}Upon calling the target, Lydia Schaffen unleashed her godlike archery skills.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003011
text: 'So there, I managed to sit on every single arrow before the last arrow reached the target. I win.'{nl} Lydia Schaffen replied,{nl}' Certainly, I can't deny the fact you sat on every arrow before the last one reached its target.'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003012
text: Rumpelstiltskin gave a wicked grin after hearing Lydia Schaffen's words and said,{nl}'Meaning, I won this game. Now, as for the penalty we agreed on...'{nl}Before Rumpelstiltskin could finish, Lydia Schaffen shook her head and spoke,{nl}'Don't tell me that because you won two rounds, you won't play the final round? It's not acceptable, we clearly promised to play three rounds anyway, didn't we?'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003013
text: 'The game doesn't end before the third round, so I think it's pointless to talk about penalties before the game has actually ended...'{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003014
text: Recognizing that he has already won two rounds and had no reason to refuse a third, as well as the fact the game was certainly not over yet, Rumpelstiltskin had no choice but to abide by Lydia Schaffen's words.{nl}And so the final round began, Lydia Schaffen gauged her last arrow, and called out as she pulled the bowstring back:{nl}'My target is... the moon in the sky!'{nl}Rumpelstiltskin side-saddled the arrow as soon as it left the bowstring, and not before long, he realized what he heard.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003015
text: Just as Rumpelstiltskin, grinding his teeth, was about to open his mouth, Lydia Schaffen said,{nl}'For the game to end, you need to ride the arrow until it arrives at its target. The game cannot end before then. If you manage to touched the moon and come back, then I will definitely accept the penalty.'{nl}Having said so, Lydia Schaffen began walking away as Rumpelstiltskin watched, grinding his teeth once again, unable to change the course of the game.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003016
text: I will retrieve the seal

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003017
text: Tell you don't want to get involved in a family matter

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003018
text: Tell that it's absurd

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003019
text: I will certainly help

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003020
text: I am not interested

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003021
text: Tell to believe in you

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003022
text: I don't want to get involved in a suspicious task

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003023
text: Telling him the circumstances/TALK/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003024
text: Eternal Amjinas [Sorcerer Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003025
text: I will ask him

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003026
text: Tell him to go there himself

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003027
text: Passing what you heard/TALK/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003028
text: I will quit since it's scary

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003029
text: Tell him to do his task on his own

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003030
text: Collect Desmodus' Tail Pins at Tenet Church B1

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003031
text: The Psychokino Master told you that he is interested in this field and he asked you to become his assistant. Please obtain Desmodus' Tail Pins in Tenet Church B1 that are needed by the Psychokino Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003032
text: Acquired enough Desmodus' Tail Pins. Return to the Psychokino Master and give them to him.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003033
text: Obtain Coarse Barks from Yognome in Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003034
text: As a condition for requesting cooperation from the Peltasta Master in Klaipeda, obtain Coarse Barks from Yognomes in Tenet Church B1 and give them to her.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003035
text: Collect Glizardon's Black Nails in Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003036
text: The Peltasta Master gave you a mission. Obtain Glizardon's Black Nails in Tenet Church B1.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003037
text: Acquired the Glizardon's Black Nails. Hand them over to the Highlander Master in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003038
text: Glizardon's Black Nails

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003039
text: Defeat a Glizardon in Tenet Church B1

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003040
text: The Swordsman Master wants you to realize something. Defeat a Glizardon in Tenet Church B1 and realize the words that the Swordsman Master said.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003041
text: Look for the objects of the Great Pirate Vladslovas

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003042
text: The Corsair Master wants to look for the objects of the Great Pirate Vladslovas and use them as a proof of the victory. Look for the objects of Vladslovas that went under the sea at Coral Plain 32_1 which once was sea.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003043
text: You've found the broken necklace of the Great Pirate Vladslovas. Return to the Corsair Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003044
text: Retrieve the ripped Royal Army's Flag

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003045
text: The Centurion Master wants to retrieve the flag of the Royal Army that was annihilated on Medzio Diena. Defeat the monsters at the Training Field of Confict and retrieve the ripped flag of the Royal Army.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003046
text: You've collected all the ripped flags of the Royal Army. Return to the Centurion Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003047
text: Find the whereabouts of the disappeared

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003048
text: The Doppelsoeldner Master told you that he lost the contact of envoy that is supposed to meet you at Pilgrim's Way 36_2. Find the whereabout of the envoy to find out what happened.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003049
text: Defeat %s that rushed in

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003050
text: Collect the information regarding Amjinas

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003051
text: The Sorcerer Master told you that he is researching about the eternal life. Collect the information about Amjinas that are living the eternal life. You can hear more from Dievdirbyss Master at the West Siauliai Woods, the Necromancer Master at Mullers Passage, and the Chronomancer Master at Stele Road.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003052
text: You've heard something from Amjinas. Return to the Sorcerer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003053
text: Explore the Crystal Mine

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003054
text: The Chronomancer Master will investigate the incident that occurred in Crystal Mine due to the request from the Alchemist Master. With the glass orb that reflects the past, reach 100% of exploration rate in both the 1st and 2nd districts in Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003055
text: The memories of Crystal Mine are recorded enough in the orb. Return to the Chronomancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003056
text: Obtain the keepsakes which you could feel strong regrets

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003057
text: The Necromancer Master wants to create stronger Undead with more stronger materials. When the grudge of the dead ones become stronger, they will become good materials so obtain the keepsakes that you can feel strong regrets from Videntis Shrine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003058
text: The Alchemist Master told you that in order to investigate Crystal Mine, he needs the orb that has the memories of the past of the Chronomancer Master. Obtain the orb that records the memories of the past from the Chronomancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003059
text: Acquired the orb that records the memories of the past. Return to the Alchemist Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003060
text: Acquired the orb that records the memories of the past. Talk with the Alchemist Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003061
text: Explore Crystal Mine

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150729_003062
text: The Alchemist Master wants you to investigate the incident that occurred in Crystal Mine. With the glass orb that reflects the past which the Chronomancer Master gave to you, accomplish the exploration rate 100% in all regions of the 1st and 2nd district of Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003063
text: Alchemist is not an easy way.{nl}We should first find out if you are suitable for it.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003064
text: The world knows me as the Squire Master.{nl}But, I am also the sole survivor from the Legwyn family.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003065
text: As the last head of the family, I am trying to raise the family once more.{nl}If you could find the seal from the mansion of the Legwyn family, I will teach you everything about the Squire.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003066
text: It's okay if it's not intact.{nl}If we have the seal of the family, we can let the rest of the world know that the Legwyn family is still alive.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003067
text: So horrible...{nl}If I become the official heir of the Legwyn family, I will not forgive about this.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003068
text: Of course, I should return your favor first as the Squire Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003069
text: This was when the Coral Plain was still sea.{nl}I once fought with the Great Pirate Vladslovas for the throne of sea.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003070
text: I won at that time, but I fell his necklace which I obtained after beating him into the sea.{nl}The sea was very deep at then, but I may able to find it now.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003071
text: If I could find that, the people who said my words were bluffs will be surprised.{nl}It will be around Coral Plain 32_1. You are the Corsair who I acknowledged so you will find it easily.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003072
text: Good!{nl}I will teach you everything.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003073
text: Well done. It would have been better if we were able to find that a little sooner.{nl}I will teach you the new formation as a reward. It's precise, so it's much stronger.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003074
text: If you are a Doppelsoeldner, you should do something for the kingdom.{nl}I want to do it myself, but since it has to be done quietly, I don't trust my ability to take care of the situation.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003075
text: Thanks for saying so. Please find the envoy of General Ramin as secretly as possible.{nl}His last contact was from Pilgrim's Way 36_2.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003076
text: What a pity. I guess he was attacked by the monsters.{nl}Anyway, since you've become a member of Doppelsoeldners, I will support you with my all.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003077
text: Ah, and please keep this a secret.{nl}I have to find another way to contact General Ramin.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003078
text: If you've explored the area completely in the past, just record it in the orb.{nl}After exploring all the areas in Crystal Mine, use the orb to record your past.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003079
text: Explore every area in the 1st and 2nd districts with this orb.{nl}If you've completely explored the areas already, just record it in the orb.{nl}After obtaining a 100% exploration rate for these areas, use the orb to record your past.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003080
text: Accept

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003081
text: Reject

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003082
text: Piece of Legwyn Family Seal

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003083
text: The Squire Master says he needs the Seal of the Legwyn family. Defeat the monsters and collect pieces of the Legwyn family's Seal in Residence of the Fallen Legwyn Family.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003084
text: Talk to the Squire Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003085
text: Collected all the pieces of Legwyn Family Seal. Return to the Squire Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003086
text: Search for the necklace of the Great Pirate Vladslovas

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003087
text: The Corsair Master wants to look for the objects of the Great Pirate Vladslovas, and use them as a proof of the victory. Look for Vladslovas' objects that went under the sea at Coral Plain 32_1 which have since dried up.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150730_003088
text: It seems that the envoy is dead. Return and report to the Doppelsoeldner Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003089
text: I have recently been researching eternal life.{nl}I am investigating various documents, but it will be the best to listen from those who are already living an eternal life.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003090
text: Those that have eternal life are called Amjinas. I want you to ask them how they live eternal lives.{nl}It's not good for me to visit them as a master since we masters are living in different places.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003091
text: Among the Amjinas, there is Sculptor Tesla at West Siauliai Woods...{nl}The Necromancer Master at Mullers Passage, and the Chronomancer Master at Stele Road. I am counting on you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003092
text: These Amjinas all seem to have different reasons behind their situations.{nl}I should look harder at each...{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003093
text: Anyway, thank you for helping my research.{nl}In return, I'll teach you any remaining knowledge of what it is to be a Sorcerer.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003094
text: You've come to learn a higher level of our magic, {nl}but, right now I am helping Vaidotas from the Winterspoon family, so I can't help you at the moment.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003095
text: {nl}If you are okay, could you help me investigate the Crystal Mine?{nl}If so, I will finish up quickly and focus on helping you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003096
text: With this orb, explore all of District 1 and 2 of the Crystal Mine.{nl}If you've done this already, then you just need to record it in the orb.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003097
text: It's been recorded completely.{nl}Good. I will pass this to Vaidotas.{nl}Now is my turn to help you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003098
text: The thoughts of the dead... All Necromancers want to possess them, {nl}especially those regarding lost keepsakes.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003099
text: According to what I found out, there's a strong grudge swirling around Videntis Shrine.{nl}If you could obtain whatever it is causing this grudge, I will open the door to a higher level of Necromancy.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003100
text: If you will be able to pick out this kind of object, you will become a stronger Necromancer.{nl}For now, I'll reward you if you can find one.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003101
text: Ah, you came at the right time. {nl}I am investigating the Crystal Mine, but it will be dangerous if we leave it as is, so I want to take care of it quickly.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003102
text: If you could help me, I think the investigation would be done sooner.{nl}It will be also a great chance to test your skills as an Alchemist.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003103
text: I am glad that Vaidotas asked me for a favor.{nl}Return with this.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003104
text: Good.{nl}I need the orb that records the memories of the past from the Chronomancer Master.{nl}He is the head of our Winterspoon family, so I've requested it from him in advance. Tell him that I've sent you.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003105
text: Lucid... Actually have you met the Chronomancer Master well?

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003106
text: The orb reads the past memories of its owner and records them.{nl}Completely explore District 1 and 2 in the Crystal Mine with this.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003107
text: When you use this orb after exploring completely, it will read the memories of the possessor and record the past.{nl}If you had explored the regions in the past, then record it into the orb right away.{nl}

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003108
text: Well done. {nl}It will take some time to investigate this, so in the meantime, I will teach you new alchemy techniques.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003109
text: Eternal Amjinas [Sorcerer Advancement]

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003110
text: Tell him that it will be better to listen directly

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003111
text: I don't have guts for it

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003112
text: Received enough balm. Restore the Statue of Goddess Vakarine in Fedimian and Statue of Goddess Ausrine in Klaipeda.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003113
text: The Sorcerer Master wants to hear more from the Amjinas. You can meet the Dievdirbys Master in West Siauliai Woods, the Necromancer Master in Mullers Passage, and the Chronomancer Master in Stele Road.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003114
text: You've heard about eternal lives from the Amjinas. Return to the Sorcerer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003115
text: Obtain the keepsakes that emit a strong sense of regret.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003116
text: The Necromancer Master wants keepsakes with a stronger grudge. Obtain the menacing keepsakes from Videntis Shrine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003117
text: You've collected the keepsakes that have a heavy aura about them. Return to the Necromancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003118
text: Meet Vaidotas at Siauliai Miners' Village

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003119
text: Vaidotas told you that in order to investigate Crystal Mine, he needs the Orb Recorder of Past Memories. Obtain the Orb Recorder of Past Memories from the Chronomancer Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003120
text: You've borrowed the orb that records the memories of the past. Return to Vaidotas.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003121
text: Acquired the orb that records the memories of the past. Talk with Vaidotas.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003122
text: Vaidotas wants you to investigate the incident that occurred in Crystal Mine. With the glass orb that the Chronomancer Master gave to you, and its ability to reflect the past, gain a 100% exploration rate in the 1st and 2nd district of Crystal Mine.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003123
text: The memories of Crystal Mine are recorded in the orb. Return to Vaidotas.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003124
text: Secretly give the present to the Scout Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003125
text: The Rogue Master wants to give a surprise present to the Scout Master. Find the Scout Master in Gateway of Great King and place the present secretly in her pocket.  It seems that this is fairly important for him - they must have been close at one point.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003126
text: You've succeeded in placing the present without being detected. Return to the Rogue Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003127
text: Search for the traces of Lydia Schaffen

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003128
text: The Fletcher Master wants you to look for the bow that the first Fletcher Master made for Lydia Schaffen. Find the bow from 31_1 of Canyon Area.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003129
text: Give them to the Fletcher Master

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150803_003130
text: You've found the bow of the first Fletcher Master. Return to the current Fletcher Master.

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150908_003131
text: Give the Sappers Master's item to people of Klaipeda!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150908_003132
text: Collect a donation and deliver it to the Cleric Master!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150908_003133
text: Cure the patient in Siauliai Miners' Village!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150908_003134
text: The cat is showing interest!

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150908_003135
text: Put the Sun Essence on the spot that Chapparition was guarding

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150908_003136
text: It's an empty box

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150908_003137
text: Explaining the situation

name: QUEST_JOBSTEP_20150908_003138
text: Explaining what you heard
